htmlDescription/htmlText:
Experience the Essence of Medellin in Laureles

Apartment located in the heart of the vibrant Laureles neighborhood, our apartment offers you an unbeatable location to discover the best of Medellin. Surrounded by a rich gastronomic offer, bars and exciting nightlife, you will be just steps away from Laureles Park and the lively Avenida Nutibara, and the famous avenue known as' La 70 '.

The space
Este Hermoso Apartamento Te Recibe con Commodidad y Estilo

Relax in our cozy space, perfect for your stay in Medellín. The apartment is equipped with all necessary for a comfortable experience:

-Air conditioning
- Double bed, 1 semi-double bed
-TV for your entertainment.
- Equipped American kitchen, ideal for preparing quick meals.
-Modern bathroom, designed for your comfort.
-Sofá Cama, perfect for extra guests or to relax.
-Balcon

to access you must climb stairs.

Other things to note
Important information about your stay:

Access to this unit is restricted exclusively to guests registered in the reservation. If you want to receive visitors, you need to register them in advance.

This property does not have an elevator; access is only by stairs.

As this is a private vacation home, maid services are only available at checkout, allowing us to offer a more personalized and peaceful experience during your stay.

To ensure a fluid registration process, it is important that you fully complete our registration agreement, providing the identification of all accompanying guests. Minors must be accompanied by their parents and present their birth certificate.

Your cooperation and understanding is greatly appreciated.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Amazing modern new studio inside ParcerosHouse. Space designed in detail to live an experience of comfort and tranquility. Equipped with a double bed with luxury lingerie for a great break. Get to know our Coworking'Solar by Parceros House'to connect, work, or create. Relax outdoors on our nature set lot and a mural made by local artists, or you can choose to hang out in our outdoor lobby surrounded by gardens

The space
Parceros House is a place to connect, a space to create and rest

• Outdoor coworking "El Solar By Parceros House" the place for our guests at Parceros House.
• Park new studio, stylish and fully equipped at your disposal.
• 24/7 security camera monitoring for your peace of mind.
• Fully Pet Friendly Spaces for the Entire Family
• Trained and efficient cleaning equipment is available to you.
• Extra cleaning upon request (50,000 COP)
• Crawl for pets
• Portable crib service 0-7 months
• Laundry area is at your disposal
• Strategically located place minutes from metro stations, 70th street, cafes and shopping centers.
• Shuttle service from the airport with advance notice.
• Reservation service in restaurants, nightclubs and sightseeing plans in the city with advance notice.

Guest access
Apart from a new studio, fully equipped, modern and elegant to stay, you will have access to outdoor coworking (El Solar By Parceros House) to which you will have 24/7 access to at any time, you will also have 24/7 access to at any time, you will also have available our trusted coffee located in the same Solar where you can enjoy a good Colombian coffee and different healthy snacks, in this trusted cafe you will pay in the demarcated areas, because we trust you!

Other things to note
Parceros House could not be better located, just a few minutes away you will also find Calle 70, a place where you can live the nightlife of Medellin. So you will find yourself in the most balanced place in town, where you will be able to find tranquility from your accommodation, but within minutes you will be living from the best parties in Medellin.

locationDescriptions/0/content: Parceros House is located in one of the best neighborhoods in the city of Medellin, the Laureles neighborhood, is an area characterized by its dawn and quiet streets, where they are mostly residential areas. This project is located just 200 m from a pharmacy and a 4 minute walk to the Laureles police station, we are also located minutes from the Unicentro shopping center and the first park of Laureles, where you will find restaurants and signature cafes to hang out.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Laureles is an area where traffic is not heavy, you can find the laurel metro station just a 10 minute walk from Parceros House.
Thanks to the different access roads that our location has, you can move quickly and comfortably to all points of interest such as downtown, restaurants and tourist areas in the city.
If you want to have fun, you can find just 15 minutes by car, the street with the most music in Medellín (Provence). You also have options like Uber or taxi to get around from Parceros House to all corners of amazing Medellin.

description:
Welcome to Skyline Ecoliving, here you can escape the bustling city of Medellin and elevate to the heights of Santa Elena to gain a whole new perspective of the City of Eternal Spring. We have several identical cabins available. For dates that can’t be reserved, send us a message and we will send you one of our other available cabins through AirbnbYou'll enjoy some natural sceneries and panoramic skyline views of Medellin. Yet, it's a quick 30 min drive to the city center.The spaceWe eagerly await your arrival to Casa Carpintero! Named after the carpenter bird you'll hear pecking away at the native trees of the forest. Connect with the rhythm of the forest drum. Her medicine reminds of our strength, determination. A power
animal that, empowers us to seize new opportunities in life while marching to the rhythm of our own heart beat.This modern & cozy tiny home is designed for your ultimate comfort and relaxation.Sit back, relax and leave all stress behind while indulging in a luxurious wellness experience at Skyline Eco-Living. Our goal is to make you feel as if you are on top of
the world. . . all while restoring the senses to nature in the potent forest medicine of Santa Elena.
Soothe your tensions with a glass of wine in the jacuzzi while taking advantage of the breathtaking city views.
Bask in the sun on the lounge net while enjoying the peaceful sounds of nature. Or cozy up with your loved ones while warming up with a hot chocolate for an intimate fireside chat.
You'll rest easy in the bedroom upstairs which has a large, comfy king size bed with large windows that peep into the forest surrounding the cabin. The lounge net that
extends over the loft is a great place to read a book while staying warm from the chilly weather.
Enjoy steaming hot showers in the tastefully tiled, modern walk-in shower. You'll be provided with high quality towels & linens during your stay.
The kitchen is stocked with all the basic essentials you need to have a morning coffee or chef up your own masterpiece for lunch or dinner.
Breakfast is included during your stay! And it's also worthy to note that our neighbor has a delicious eco restaurant next door, which is open from 10 am- 8 pm for your convenience!
We always do our best to take great care of the natural environment surrounding us! Which is why you'll have fresh, potable spring water to drink straight from the tap.
On sunny days, your private balcony is a great place to relax, enjoy an afternoon coffee, and soak in the expansive views of the city.
This is an amazing spot for digital nomads as there is high-speed wifi available for streaming and video calls.
You're sure to stay warm in the cool climate of the forest nights with the fireplace and an electric heater for the bedroom. There is private parking for your car or motorcycle on site. You DO NOT need a 4×4 to reach the cabin. Pack your bags and get ready to treat yourself to the ultimate wellness experience immersed in nature high above the city!Guest accessYou'll be in the privacy of your own cabin, private jacuzzi, private balcony and each cabin boasts its own unique views of the city. The best part is enjoying the peace, quiet and stillness of nature all around!
There is also a yoga deck and gardens for you to enjoy. As well as incredible nature trails right in the backyard of our community.
Our friendly staff is available on site for anything you need during your stay. Please don't hesitate to let us know how we can make your stay one to remember forever!Other things to noteThere's no doubt you'll enjoy your stay in the privacy of your very own eco-cabin romantically perched above the city. However, if you're looking for the ultimate wellness package, we've got you covered!Private Massage Therapy | Melt into deep relaxation while treating yourself to a rejuvenating massage surrounded by nature.Casa Eco Restaurant | Indulge in a delicious home-cooked meal at our neighbor, Maye, eco restaurant. Choose from a range of healthy dishes to nurture your body with love. Delivery to your cabin is available.Cultural Experiences | Immerse yourself and learn about the roots of Colombia's Antioquian culture with a guided, hands-on experience. Discover the beautiful history of silleteros, the indigenous people who established the cultural traditions ofSanta Elena and it's profound connection with the valley of Medellin. Or feed your coffee curiosity, and learn about the rich culture of coffee production in theAntioquia valley.Registration number113158

host/about: Rein is an experienced entrepreneur & vacation rental owner who knows exactly what it takes to provide extraordinary experiences. . .which makes him a top-notch host in various different countries around the world. Born in Holland, he's planted his roots in the beautiful country of Colombia after falling in love with the culture, people, and food. Upon meeting Rein, you'll encounter his friendly smile, humility, and desire to provide incredible experiences for his guests. In his free time, he loves to get lost in a great novel, travel the world, boogie to Salsa & Bachata, or enjoy a delicious meal at the foodie hotspots around town! You can rest assured you're in good company when staying in Rein's vacation homes.
host/highlights/1: Speaks Dutch, English, French, and Spanish
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Welcome to Skyline Ecoliving, here you can escape the bustling city of Medellin and elevate to the heights of Santa Elena to gain a whole new perspective of the City of Eternal Spring.
We have several identical cabins available. For dates that can’t be reserved, send us a message and we will send you one of our other available cabins through Airbnb
You'll enjoy some natural sceneries and panoramic skyline views of Medellin. Yet, it's a quick 30 min drive to the city center.

The space
We eagerly await your arrival to Casa Carpintero! Named after the carpenter bird you'll hear pecking away at the native trees of the forest. Connect with the rhythm of the forest drum. Her medicine reminds of our strength, determination. A power
animal that, empowers us to seize new opportunities in life while marching to the rhythm of our own heart beat.

This modern & cozy tiny home is designed for your ultimate comfort and relaxation.Sit back, relax and leave all stress behind while indulging in a luxurious wellness experience at Skyline Eco-Living. Our goal is to make you feel as if you are on top of
the world. . . all while restoring the senses to nature in the potent forest medicine of Santa Elena.
Soothe your tensions with a glass of wine in the jacuzzi while taking advantage of the breathtaking city views.
Bask in the sun on the lounge net while enjoying the peaceful sounds of nature. Or cozy up with your loved ones while warming up with a hot chocolate for an intimate fireside chat.
You'll rest easy in the bedroom upstairs which has a large, comfy king size bed with large windows that peep into the forest surrounding the cabin. The lounge net that
extends over the loft is a great place to read a book while staying warm from the chilly weather.
Enjoy steaming hot showers in the tastefully tiled, modern walk-in shower. You'll be provided with high quality towels & linens during your stay.
The kitchen is stocked with all the basic essentials you need to have a morning coffee or chef up your own masterpiece for lunch or dinner.
Breakfast is included during your stay! And it's also worthy to note that our neighbor has a delicious eco restaurant next door, which is open from 10 am- 8 pm for your convenience!
We always do our best to take great care of the natural environment surrounding us! Which is why you'll have fresh, potable spring water to drink straight from the tap.
On sunny days, your private balcony is a great place to relax, enjoy an afternoon coffee, and soak in the expansive views of the city.
This is an amazing spot for digital nomads as there is high-speed wifi available for streaming and video calls.
You're sure to stay warm in the cool climate of the forest nights with the fireplace and an electric heater for the bedroom. There is private parking for your car or motorcycle on site. You DO NOT need a 4×4 to reach the cabin. Pack your bags and get ready to treat yourself to the ultimate wellness experience immersed in nature high above the city!

Guest access
You'll be in the privacy of your own cabin, private jacuzzi, private balcony and each cabin boasts its own unique views of the city. The best part is enjoying the peace, quiet and stillness of nature all around!

There is also a yoga deck and gardens for you to enjoy. As well as incredible nature trails right in the backyard of our community.

Our friendly staff is available on site for anything you need during your stay. Please don't hesitate to let us know how we can make your stay one to remember forever!

Other things to note
There's no doubt you'll enjoy your stay in the privacy of your very own eco-cabin romantically perched above the city. However, if you're looking for the ultimate wellness package, we've got you covered!

Private Massage Therapy | Melt into deep relaxation while treating yourself to a rejuvenating massage surrounded by nature.

Casa Eco Restaurant | Indulge in a delicious home-cooked meal at our neighbor, Maye, eco restaurant. Choose from a range of healthy dishes to nurture your body with love.
Delivery to your cabin is available.
Cultural Experiences | Immerse yourself and learn about the roots of Colombia's Antioquian culture with a guided, hands-on experience. Discover the beautiful history of silleteros, the indigenous people who established the cultural traditions of
Santa Elena and it's profound connection with the valley of Medellin. Or feed your coffee curiosity, and learn about the rich culture of coffee production in the
Antioquia valley.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Exclusive apartment located in Poblado Medellín, in the ENERGY LIVING building, which has 5 stars, has the category of best vertical housing project in Latin America, you will have an excellent stay enjoying an oasis in the city, designed for your comfort, with terrace and private jacuzzi, equipped to make your experience unique.

Every guest must present their ID (NO PASSWORD), any minor must be entered accompanied by their parents.

The space
This apartment is designed for your rest and comfort. It includes a full kitchen, refrigerator, washing machine, dryer, air conditioning, comfortable king bed and double sofa bed, bathroom in the main bedroom, TV 65"in the master bedroom and 75" in the living room , Wifi 6, fireplace, bar, studio area also has a terrace, sunbathing machines, BBQ and a private jacuzzi. It has a Bose, XBOX Series S, Youtube and Netflix premium, SiriusXM (satellite radio), sauna, gym and pool with panoramic view on the 22nd floor. In the first floor of the building you will find the restaurant "Alquimista" which serves the room and has an excellent gastronomic variety. Building has 24/7 security and front desk

Guest access
The access to the property is available 24/7, in this property you must touch the digital screen of the lock and pass the electronic chip over it and then open the door. if you have any questions the security staff of the apartment will be attentive to help you.

Other things to note
To stay in this space ALWAYS all guests, without exception, must present their identity card, passport, citizenship card, or original birth registration, passwords issued by the Government of Colombia are not valid. All minors must be in the company of one of their parents.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
This beautiful accommodation boasts its greatest plus in its private Rooftop. From here, the panoramic views of the city and mountains invite you to relax and disconnect. Imagine arriving in the evenings with your group of friends to enjoy the jacuzzi, music , cinema, fireplace and a dinner at the barcacoa and all this private with a spectacular view of the whole city.
If you are looking for privacy and comfortable beds, a place to integrate with friends and guests , this is the place.

The space
This house has 4 rooms , all with bathroom, air conditioning, TV and balcony. It is only 15 minutes from the village , in a quiet and safe area.
Visitors are allowed, respecting the house rules!
Don't miss out on your best vacation times with friends , family!

Guest access
Electronic lock

Other things to note
No parties or listening to loud music! Sexual exploitation is not allowed!

host/about:
Hi!

We're Mario and Cata. We're from Medellín and your Colombian hosts. We're both software engineers, but more importantly, we're a couple passionate about living life to the fullest! We loved Airbnb when we first used it on a trip through South America, and now we love to host, just as we would want to be hosted ;) 

Through AirBnB, we've found a whole new way to experience the joys and learnings of travelling from our own city of Medellín- we love meeting and learning from new friends, cultures, languages and stories!
 
More than your hosts, we offer you our friendship. We love to help out with a smile. Hey, we are from Medellín after all, that's what we are known for :)

We love Medellín and we love our beautiful properties, which we take so much pride in keeping in tip top shape! We really enjoy sharing them with you, so you can have the best experience in this wonderful city.
host/highlights/0: Where I went to school: National University of Colombia

description: Stop looking, here you have all you need:-Unbeatable location, walkable and close to everything-Laureles is “the coolest neighborhood in the world” according to Timeout-Close to "La 70" boulevard-High speed internet access ideal for remote work-Gym-Cool and fresh apartment-Modern loft-Industrial and elegant design-Rooftop terrace on the top floor of the building with view to all Medellin.-24/7 security-Fully equipped kitchen-Smart lock-Washing machine-ParkingThe spaceLocated in one of Medellin's most popular and touristic neighborhoods, this apartment has a strategic location close to the most popular attractions as well as to Medellin's famous nightlife. The airport is only 24 km away (if you need to hire a shuttle service from the airport we can help you with this for an additional charge).- The building offers a double height lobby, free private parking, top floor terrace overlooking the entire city, sauna, Turkish bath and gym.- Staying in our apartment, we will offer you our special attention as your personal manager for all the doubts, recommendations during your stay (tourist reservations, suggestion of the best restaurants, procedures in our city, best ways to get to a place and so on).- We provide 2 firm and 2 soft pillows for your comfort.- For stays longer than 7 days we offer a complementary cleaning service upon request (additional charges apply and subject to availability).- The apartment has very good natural light, which is ideal for reading or working.- The building has 24 hour security.- Secure digital lock with personalized access code. No keys, no hassle!- There is a delicious restaurant and cafe right on the 1st floor.- Feel free to ask if you need more information. We enjoy making our guests' stay enjoyable.Guest accessGuests have access to the entire apartment for their use, as well as shared access to the common areas of the building.Passport (for foreigners) or identity card (for Colombian citizens) in physical version and originals are required for check in.Other things to noteMost popular routes by car in time and distance:To Centro Comercial Unicentro 2 min / 0.3 km - 0.2 mi (Literally 5 minutes walk!).To UPB University 4 min / 0,7 km - 0,4 miTo Parque de Laureles 6 min / 1.9 km - 1.2 miTo Parques del Rio 4 min / 1.2 km - 0.8 mi (Literally 11 minutes walk!)To Provenza/Lleras 14 min / 6.1 km - 3.8 miTo the city center 12 min / 3.5 km - 2.2 miTo the airport 35 min / 24 km - 15.4 miThe TV has access to major streaming platforms, however, the guest must use their own account.Please always be respectful of your neighbors and your surroundings.Registration number46581

host/about:
Hi, my name is Juan Manuel and people used to call me “Juanma”. I love reading, playing the Ukelele and watching indie movies. Also, I enjoy running, walking the city and certainly meeting new people.

I have traveled around the world as many times as I could, and I have lived abroad, but my heart belongs to Medellín. I’m sure you will love it too.

¡Our guest’s happiness is our priority!

The space
Located in one of Medellin's most popular and touristic neighborhoods, this apartment has a strategic location close to the most popular attractions as well as to Medellin's famous nightlife. The airport is only 24 km away (if you need to hire a shuttle service from the airport we can help you with this for an additional charge).

- The building offers a double height lobby, free private parking, top floor terrace overlooking the entire city, sauna, Turkish bath and gym.

- Staying in our apartment, we will offer you our special attention as your personal manager for all the doubts, recommendations during your stay (tourist reservations, suggestion of the best restaurants, procedures in our city, best ways to get to a place and so on).

- We provide 2 firm and 2 soft pillows for your comfort.

- For stays longer than 7 days we offer a complementary cleaning service upon request (additional charges apply and subject to availability).

- The apartment has very good natural light, which is ideal for reading or working.

- The building has 24 hour security.

- Secure digital lock with personalized access code. No keys, no hassle!

- There is a delicious restaurant and cafe right on the 1st floor.

- Feel free to ask if you need more information. We enjoy making our guests' stay enjoyable.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment for their use, as well as shared access to the common areas of the building.

Passport (for foreigners) or identity card (for Colombian citizens) in physical version and originals are required for check in.

Other things to note
Most popular routes by car in time and distance:

To Centro Comercial Unicentro 2 min / 0.3 km - 0.2 mi (Literally 5 minutes walk!).
To UPB University 4 min / 0,7 km - 0,4 mi
To Parque de Laureles 6 min / 1.9 km - 1.2 mi
To Parques del Rio 4 min / 1.2 km - 0.8 mi (Literally 11 minutes walk!)
To Provenza/Lleras 14 min / 6.1 km - 3.8 mi
To the city center 12 min / 3.5 km - 2.2 mi
To the airport 35 min / 24 km - 15.4 mi

The TV has access to major streaming platforms, however, the guest must use their own account.

Please always be respectful of your neighbors and your surroundings.

host/about:
I'm Sara from Medellin, Colombia. I love to know the world and have already lived for a while in Holland, United States, and now I am living in Spain. I'm passionate about the design and the artisanal.

Together with my family we want many people to get to know Medellín and its surroundings and can feel our project as a home away from home and enjoy some getaway of rest and tranquility.
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Feel at home in our loft, located in a renovated mid 60's familiy house. This modern-industrial loft has a living room, sofa-bed, kitchenette, WiFi and a mezzanine with double size bed. The unit opens to inner green patio making this the coziest space. Conquistadores, the neighborhood where is located, is 5 min by bus/taxi, 20 min walking or 10 min by bike to downtown Medellin and Laureles neighborhood. Grocery stores, restaurants, cafés, bars, shops and lots of parks are within walking distance

The space
This loft is located on the second floor of a recently renovated building with beautiful local design and architecture. We took care of every detail so you feel in a unique place and will try to give you the best experience and service. We want you to feel this place is your home away from home.

It is perfect for a couple looking for a centrally located place in Medellin, in what could be the best area in terms of urban planning in the whole city. It is easily accessible by biking and public transport. High-speed internet (WiFi) is available onsite with 2 internet providers, in case one of them fails.

There is a secure front door to the house which is shared with guests of other lofts, and another door for entrance to the loft, to which you are the only one with access. This loft has an area of 27 mt^2 (290 ft^2), but its architecture will make you feel in a larger space. You will have access to a fully equipped kitchenette (stove, oven, coffee maker, refrigerator, pots, most common utensils); sofabed, coffee table, and dining table & chairs.

The mezzanine (half-height) bedroom, which can be accessed through wooden loft stairs, has a small window for air circulation, with a double-size bed with 100% cotton linens and a portable fan in case it gets warm. There is also a small closet to store your belongings.

Guests will have access to a sunny rooftop to enjoy the Medellin sun and breeze. You will find this place as an oasis in the middle of the city.

Please note that this loft is on a second floor with access only through stairs and that the bedroom in the mezzanine is accessed through wooden loft stairs. Also, Medellín is a large, lively city. It can be noisy. It is also in the tropics and we get lots of sunshine. If you are sensitive to noise or light, we suggest that you bring earplugs and a sleep mask.

Guest access
Guests have access to the building's rooftop, featuring a large open area with plants and outdoor furniture. The house is next to lots of parks and about 8 minutes walking from "Parques del Río" park.

Other things to note
The loft is located on the second floor of a renovated old family house. As it is a house from the 60s, separated into mini apartments, it is not completely soundproof from the other lofts. Doña Amparo lives downstairs and has been in this building for more than 40 years. She is a quiet, polite, and lovely old woman, who most likely would like to welcome you and tell you stories. For a pleasant stay and to respect her lifestyle, we ask for "silent hours" and that our guests keep the noise down after 10 p.m. and before 8 a.m.

*Important*: We have a *zero-tolerance policy* for prostitution, drug use (including tobacco), child abuse, and parties in the building. If you are into any of the above, look for another place to stay. We report these behaviors to the authorities and AirBnB, and they are causal to the termination of the agreement without reimbursement.


*LONG-TERM RENTAL NOTICE:* For staying 10 days or more, please be aware of the following conditions:

Starter Supplies:
Upon your arrival, we will provide starter supplies such as shampoo, toilet paper, soap, and other essentials to make your transition smoother. However, please be aware that these are initial provisions, and it will be your responsibility to replenish them as needed.

Weekly Cleaning Schedule:
We conduct a general cleaning once a week. This includes the bathroom, kitchen, and floors. Please note that this cleaning is not intended for personal items such as organizing, folding clothes, or washing dishes.

Maintenance Activities:
Throughout the duration of your stay, there might be scheduled maintenance activities that coincide with your occupancy. This can include routine tasks such as gardening, servicing the water heater, pest control, or other necessary maintenance work. We will do our best to notify you in advance of any planned maintenance to minimize disruption to your daily routine.

**All the prices and discounts for longer stays are already applied on the platform, please do not ask for extra discounts or reservations outside Airbnb.

116699

locationDescriptions/0/content: This mid century house, "Casa TAMAYO", is located in a traditional neighborhood with a good urban planning, which makes this area perfect for walking and cycling. There are several parks nearby, including Parques del Rio (a linear park next to the Medellin river where part of the main highway of the city was moved underground and a large, green open space was recovered for the residents) where you can go for a walk or a jog. It is also close to Laureles, a hip neighborhood with a great deal of restaurants, bars and cafes. Unicentro mall is at a 8 minute walk through pedestrian only parks. Just in front of the house is a "tiendita" (sort of a convenience store). The sports stadium (fútbol, volleyball, basketball, futsal, open-air gyms, jogging areas, swimming pools) is at a 20 min walk.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Casa TAMAYO is at walking distance from four metro stations: Suramericana (15 min) and Estadio (18 min) from B line; Exposiciones (22 min) and Alpujarra (25 min) from A line. It is also 50m (160 ft) from Av Bolivariana, a major road in Medellin, where you can get many buses to El Centro or taxis to get anywhere in the city. There are several grocery stores ar walking distance and a shopping mall (Unicentro) at 8 minutes walk.

There is a parking lot 4 blocks away (5 min walking, 2 min by car)

description: 3450 Living is easy to spot among the trees in Laureles. Designed like the bow of a ship, the angular combination of glass, brick, black metal, and concrete is conveniently located. The relaxed atmosphere is perfect for young professionals, students, couples, digital nomads, or friends looking for a cost-effective space in a prime location. Four floors of modern-chic apartments feature expansive valley views from the balconies, residents also have access to the rooftop social area with jacuzzi.The spaceIf you’re looking to share a space with a friend, fellow digital nomad, or even another couple, the one-bedroom apartments at 3450 Living offer ample space for four, including a complete kitchen. Two queen beds share the separate bedroom with en-suite bath, while a second full bath is conveniently located off the living space. Enjoy two cozy balconies and window seats with floor to ceiling glass. Close the sound-dampening windows to block out the city below while two a/c units keep you cool in your living and sleeping areas. Or keep the windows open to welcome a fresh breeze. You’ll find all the amenities you need including a fully stocked kitchen, bathroom products, hairdryer, and iron. With digital entry locks and secured main entrance, you’ll feel safe and secure at 3450 Living.Guest accessYou will have access to the rooftop social area with jacuzzi, outdoor kitchen space, and a 270° view of the heart of Medellín. To use it you must do a previous reservation at the front desk.Other things to note-For this apt only 3 visitors are allowed inside the apt at the same time, i.e. not exceeding the maximum capacity of 4 guests + 3 visitors inside the unit.Two passes for dancing lessons are included in the price of your stay (please schedule with the host) Transport service upon request Extra cleaning service included upon request Concierge service for reservations included according to employees schedule.Registration number92742

Hello!

I'm Carolina, born and raised in Medellin, current traveler so I know how to make feel a foreigner welcome into my wonderful, rebirthing city. 

I work at Gutierrez Group, a company specialised in providing legal and investment advisory to foreigners living and/or doing business in Colombia. 


I enjoy being there for our guests so feel free to contact me at anytime and I will very gladly take care of you.
htmlDescription/htmlText:
3450 Living is easy to spot among the trees in Laureles. Designed like the bow of a ship, the angular combination of glass, brick, black metal, and concrete is conveniently located. The relaxed atmosphere is perfect for young professionals, students, couples, digital nomads, or friends looking for a cost-effective space in a prime location.
Four floors of modern-chic apartments feature expansive valley views from the balconies, residents also have access to the rooftop social area with jacuzzi.

The space
If you’re looking to share a space with a friend, fellow digital nomad, or even another couple, the one-bedroom apartments at 3450 Living offer ample space for four, including a complete kitchen. Two queen beds share the separate bedroom with en-suite bath, while a second full bath is conveniently located off the living space.

Enjoy two cozy balconies and window seats with floor to ceiling glass. Close the sound-dampening windows to block out the city below while two a/c units keep you cool in your living and sleeping areas. Or keep the windows open to welcome a fresh breeze.

You’ll find all the amenities you need including a fully stocked kitchen, bathroom products, hairdryer, and iron. With digital entry locks and secured main entrance, you’ll feel safe and secure at 3450 Living.

Guest access
You will have access to the rooftop social area with jacuzzi, outdoor kitchen space, and a 270° view of the heart of Medellín. To use it you must do a previous reservation at the front desk.

Other things to note
-For this apt only 3 visitors are allowed inside the apt at the same time, i.e. not exceeding the maximum capacity of 4 guests + 3 visitors inside the unit.

Two passes for dancing lessons are included in the price of your stay (please schedule with the host)
Transport service upon request
Extra cleaning service included upon request
Concierge service for reservations included according to employees schedule.

Registration number
92742
locationDescriptions/0/content:
3450 Living is situated in the heart of Laureles, directly across from Unicentro shopping mall and the UPB University. Walking is easy on the valley floor and everything you need is nearby. Grocery stores, shopping, movie theaters, and some of the finest restaurants in Medellín, are within walking distance. Or you can order in and have everything delivered.

Conveniently located near the major traffic routes of Avenida Bolivariana and Avenida 33 it’s easy to catch a taxi or bus to visit the rest of the city. Take a quick trip to Pueblito Paisa and Cerro Nutibara to enjoy an open-air theater, outdoor sculpture park, gardens, and a quaint replica of a historic Colombian village. Or spend a quiet afternoon in one of the many parks in Laureles.
locationDescriptions/1/content: Because Laureles is located on the valley floor, it is mostly flat and very walkable. Head to the local Estadio station to ride the clean, inexpensive Metro which connects you to the entire city through trains, buses, tranvia, and even cable cars. The Metro is the most convenient way to see and do all that Medellín offers during your stay. Also, taxis are metered, safe, inexpensive, and convenient.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant life of 70 in this cozy loft. Our property, located in one of the most popular areas of the city, offers you the opportunity to explore the best restaurants and bars on foot, or if you are interested in cooking, you also have supermarkets nearby, to buy everything you need.
Don't worry about being in a night area, our windows are soundproofed and you won't hear the outside noises.
Book with us and let go!

Guest access
Before your arrival, we will send you a brochure with all the instructions and details to make your check-in as easy as possible. Feel free to write if you have any questions! We will be happy to help you.

Other things to note
- A photo or photocopy of your passport will be required prior to your arrival.
You must show your original and physical passport document or physical Colombian ID (Cedula) at check-in time. Same goes for visitors. Photocopy of the card/passport.
- If traveling with a minor, remember to bring a civil registration and a document specifying that he or she is your child. Otherwise, the minor will not be allowed to stay.
- Only one visitor at the same time
- Late check out will be charged if you do not meet set times.
- Third-party bookings are prohibited.
- The use of Netflix is on your own.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Laureles, a neighborhood in Medellín, Colombia, is often considered one of the best neighborhoods in the world for several reasons:

1. Vibrant Community: Laureles has a strong sense of community, where locals and expats mingle in a welcoming environment. The area exudes a laid-back vibe that attracts people seeking a balanced, slower pace of life.


2. Green Spaces: With its wide, tree-lined streets and parks, like Parque Primeros Laureles and Parque de los Olivos, Laureles offers an abundance of green spaces perfect for walking, relaxing, or exercising. This contributes to the area’s pleasant, refreshing atmosphere.


3. Cultural Scene: Laureles is home to a growing number of art galleries, live music venues, and cultural events. Its proximity to universities, such as Universidad Pontificia Bolivariana, adds an academic and creative energy to the area.


4. Walkability: Unlike many neighborhoods in big cities, Laureles is highly walkable. You can stroll around safely, with easy access to restaurants, cafés, bars, and shops without relying heavily on cars.


5. Great Food Scene: The neighborhood boasts a fantastic food scene, from traditional Colombian eateries to international cuisine. La 70 (a lively street known for its nightlife) and La 33 offer countless options, ranging from street food to gourmet dining.


6. Safety: Compared to other parts of Medellín, Laureles is considered safer, with a calm, residential feel. This makes it popular among families, professionals, and digital nomads.


7. Quality of Life: With a perfect blend of urban amenities, green spaces, cultural activities, and a laid-back vibe, Laureles offers a high quality of life. It's less chaotic than more touristy areas like El Poblado, yet still vibrant and full of character.


8. Affordable Living: While offering all these amenities, Laureles remains relatively affordable compared to similar neighborhoods in other global cities, making it a desirable spot for both locals and expats.



These factors make Laureles a standout neighborhood for those seeking a balanced lifestyle that blends modern urban living with natural beauty and cultural richness.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Getting around in Laureles is easy for several key reasons:

1. Walkability: Laureles is designed with pedestrians in mind, featuring wide, tree-lined streets that are flat and easy to navigate on foot. The blocks are well-connected, so you can easily walk to shops, restaurants, parks, and other amenities without needing a car.


2. Public Transport: The area is well-served by public transportation. There are bus routes running through major streets like La 33 and La 70, as well as nearby metro stations like Estadio and Suramericana, which connect to the rest of Medellín.


3. Cycling-Friendly: Medellín, including Laureles, has made a strong push toward being bike-friendly, with designated cycling lanes. The terrain is relatively flat in this area, making it a great option for getting around by bike.


4. Taxi and Rideshare Availability: Taxis and rideshare services like Uber are abundant in Laureles. You can easily call a car and get to nearby neighborhoods or other parts of Medellín quickly and affordably.


5. Strategic Location: Laureles is centrally located within Medellín, making it easy to access key parts of the city. It's close to both downtown Medellín and popular areas like El Poblado, without the heavy traffic and congestion of busier districts.


6. Clear Street Layout: The streets in Laureles follow a grid pattern, which makes navigating the neighborhood intuitive. This clear layout reduces confusion for drivers, pedestrians, and cyclists alike.



These factors combine to create a neighborhood that is both accessible and convenient, making it easy to get around whether by foot, public transport, or private vehicle.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Fully renovated luxury apartment with privat jacuzzi, terrace & AC located in the best residential area of Laureles. Within 5 mins walking distance of “Unicentro mall”, restaurants, groceries stores, parks, bicycle rentals, bicycle routes and multiple entertainment options/ Luxurious apartment with jacuzzi, terrace and air conditioning located in the best residential neighborhood of Laureles, 5 mins from the Unicentro mall, restaurants, supermarkets, parks, bike rentals and bike routes

The space
This 1 bedroom / 1.5 bathrooms apartment was fully renovated and decorated by a designer specifically with the intention of creating a harmonious environment for our guests. It’s located in one of the best residential area of Laureles. The building counts with a 24h front desk.

Our favorite part of this apartment is the spacious terrace with jacuzzi where you can hang out, get some drinks and watch tv while enjoying the amazing weather of Medellin.

The jacuzzi is outdoors but it’s covered by a roof so you can still enjoy it even when it’s raining. The terrace was decorated with beautiful plants that gives you privacy, 2 sun chairs and a dinning table making it an amazing area to get sunlight, workout or even use it as an outdoor coworking area.

The apartment is located within walking distance of “Unicentro mall” (5 mins walk), “Calle 70” (15 mins walk), great restaurants, bars, beautiful people, many entertainment options where you can appreciate the local life. You can also find a park within 2 mins walk where you can breathe clean air, exercise or go for a walk and multiple spots to rent bicycles and go for a ride on the bicycle routes.

The building also counts with a rooftop with an amazing city view, an area to work out, sauna and steam room and a coffee shop downstairs.

This apartment is perfect for one person or a couple. It has one bedroom with a very comfortable queen size bed (5 stars hotel type). 1.5 bathrooms. The kitchen is fully equipped for you to cook any meal you would like. A spacious living room with a tv, a comfy desk and a 300 MB WIFI for you to be able to work without interruptions.

Free parking available for one car in our reserved parking space

Give us the pleasure of having you as one of our guests and give yourself the opportunity to spend time in this luxury apartment.


——————- ——ESPAÑOL ———————
This 1 bedroom 1.5 bathroom apartment has just been completely remodeled and decorated with the intention of offering a harmonious space to its guests, is located in a building with 24 hour security, in the best residential neighborhood in Laureles where calm predominates.

Our favorite area is the terrace as it has a very generous space, a beautiful jacuzzi, 2 sunny chairs and a set of chairs and a table that will allow you to spend a pleasant time, watch TV from the jacuzzi, exercise in this space and even use it as an area to sit at work.

Its privileged location allows you to walk to the Unicentro shopping center (approximately 5 mins) and a 15-minute walk from 70th Street, you can also walk to multiple restaurants where you can appreciate a wide culinary offer and interact with locals, 1 min away you can find a park where you can do physical activity or enjoy pure air and a nice walk and a nice walk, a 15-minute walk away you can reach the renowned 70 street which is full of restaurants and bars. You can also rent a bicycle 3 minutes away and you will find many roads intended for them.

The apartment is fully equipped for a single person or a couple, it has 1 room with a very comfortable queen size bed, 5-star hotel type, bathroom and a half. The kitchen is fully stocked so you can prepare your favorite dishes, a spacious TV room, it also has a comfortable desk and 300 MB WIFI and ample coverage which will allow you to work comfortably and without interruption.

You will have access to 1 private parking lot at no extra charge.

Give us the opportunity to have you as one of our guests and give you the opportunity to spend time in this luxurious apartment!

Guest access
The whole apartment

Registration number
46581

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Unique Designer Loft in the heart of El Poblado. This spacious, and luxurious apartment is located near to Provenza, one of the most famous and vibrant streets in the city. Next to ClickClack hotel, this tranquil spot offers a comfortable stay. The living-room features a 120" cinema screen, surround sound system throughout the house, and smart lights. Everyday cleaning option and parking lot included. This spectacular loft provides a unique & unparalleled experience in the best area of the city!

The space
Enjoy Our designer Loft! This beautiful, spacious, and luxurious apartment is located near Provenza, one of the most famous and vibrant streets in the city known for its wide range of restaurants and nightlife. Situated right next to the Click Clack hotel, close to Carulla supermarket and El Poblado avenue, this tranquil place offers a comfortable stay in Medellín.
The Loft feauters a 500 BM fibre optic WIFI! with a 120" cinema screen in the living room, surround sound system throughout the house, and smart lights controlled by Alexa, enhancing the lofts luxurious design. You can enjoy our fully equipped kitchen with an oven, microwave, coffee machine, wine fridge, cooking utensils, and refrigerator.
The master bedroom includes a comfortable double bed, 85" TV, Bose sound system, air conditioning, a spacious walk-in closet, and an elegant bathtub in the bathroom.
The apartment's open concept ensures freshness and ventilation, complemented by a laundry area and daily cleaning service, as well as parking space in the building.
You're welcome to use the spacious dining room with your friends.

For an unforgettable long stay in the best area of the city, Our Designer Loft provides a unique and unparalleled experience that sets it apart from any other apartment in Medellín!

Welcome to this spectacular accommodation in Medellin, located in a charming complex with only 9 exclusive studies. Here, you can enjoy the tranquility and privacy that gives you an intimate and select environment.

Our property is strategically located in the heart of Poblado, one of the most vibrant areas of Medellin. In addition, you will find yourself in a residential area that is an authentic oasis surrounded by nature. Just a 4 minute walk away, you will find Provence, a place full of trendy restaurants, bars and boutiques. You'll be at the epicenter of the action, and at the same time, you can enjoy the peace and serenity that our exclusive complex offers you.

We invite you to enjoy a unique stay in our home and explore all that this exciting town has to offer. We hope your experience in Medellin is unforgettable!

htmlDescription/htmlText:
New, fully equipped Apt in Medellín (Poblado). Ideal for business travelers and tourists. 5 min from the action, yet relaxing.
-23rd Floor
-Private Jacuzzi
-3 Samsung TVs (85″, 65″, 65″)
-Samsung AC in Bedrooms
-1 King & 1 Queen Bed
-Turbo Wi-Fi 300MBs
-Japanese Water Heater
-Extra-flow Waterfall Showers
-Pull up Bar
-No Airbnb Fees
-Luxury Design/Furnishings
-FREE Washer/Dryer
-FREE Co-Working Area
-Heated Pool/Jacuzzi/Steam Room
-Complete GYM
-24/7 Lobby/Security
-Restaurant & SPA on 4th Floor

The space
Welcome to Your Urban Sanctuary!

Step into a world of effortless elegance and serene charm in our beautifully renovated urban sanctuary. Our open-concept design blends the kitchen, living room, and balcony into one harmonious space, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Perched on the 23rd floor, you’ll be greeted by breathtaking panoramic views of lush green mountains and twinkling city lights—a perfect backdrop for relaxation and inspiration.

We believe in going above and beyond to make your stay magical. Our home is adorned with modern appliances and chic furnishings, offering a luxurious yet cozy environment. Delight in unique touches that are rarely found elsewhere: a private jacuzzi for ultimate relaxation, three Samsung Smart TVs (85″, 65″, 65″) for endless entertainment, and ambient lighting with dimmers and LED strips to set the perfect mood. Stay connected with Turbo Wi-Fi (300MBs) and enjoy the convenience of a Japanese instant water heater and waterfall showers. You can even get some exercise while taking in the views using the pull-up bar on the balcony. Plus, a free Samsung washer and dryer add to the thoughtful amenities we’ve lovingly provided.

We welcome your furry friends, ensuring everyone in your family feels at home. Also, free on-site parking is available for your convenience.

Delight in the building’s on-site amenities, including a heated pool, jacuzzi, steam room, and a full gym. The 24/7 lobby and security, along with a restaurant and spa on the 4th floor, provide added comfort. A free co-working area ensures productivity during your stay.

Our space is a non-smoking haven, meticulously maintained to offer a fresh and clean environment. We aim to make every moment memorable and comfortable, ensuring you feel at home from the moment you arrive.

Come, unwind, and create beautiful memories in our inviting urban retreat. Your perfect escape awaits.

Guest access
Guests will have free access to all areas of the accommodation during their stay. This includes the entire apartment, including the kitchen, living room, bedrooms, and balcony, as well as any shared amenities such as the gym, swimming pool, steam room and parking facilities.

However, it’s important to note that our condominium has specific rules and restrictions that guests need to adhere to:

Common Areas: Guests are welcome to use shared facilities such as the gym and swimming pool during designated hours. Please respect posted rules regarding usage and cleanliness. By providing clear information about both the access guests will have and the condominium's specific rules and restrictions, we aim to ensure a comfortable and compliant stay for all our guests at our Airbnb accommodation.

Other things to note
Location: Our apartment is conveniently located in POBLADO, providing easy access to local attractions, dining options, and public transportation.

Safety and Security: The building features 24/7 security and surveillance, ensuring a safe environment for our guests throughout their visit.

Local Recommendations: We provide a curated list of local restaurants, cafes, and activities that guests can explore to enhance their stay and experience the culture of the area.

Check-in and Check-out: Flexible check-in and check-out times are available upon request, accommodating guests' travel schedules whenever possible.

Communication: We prioritize clear communication and responsiveness. Guests can reach us easily through Airbnb messaging or phone for any inquiries or assistance during their stay.

Accessibility: The apartment is wheelchair accessible and suitable for guests with mobility needs. Please inform us in advance of any specific requirements so we can ensure a comfortable stay.

House Rules: We kindly ask guests to respect our no-smoking policy and to adhere to quiet hours to ensure a pleasant environment for everyone in the building.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Nestled in the affluent and secure neighborhood of El Tesoro in Medellin, this area offers unparalleled convenience:

Leaving the building, to the left side you can walk straight and you will first find the Amsterdam Plaza mall, then you will find the Mall Del Este and right next to it's the El Tesoro shopping center.

- Just a 2-minute drive or a 7-minute walk away, you'll find Carulla, your go-to supermarket!
- Looking for shopping and entertainment? El Tesoro Mall is only a 5-minute drive or a short 10-minute walk away.
- To experience the vibrant nightlife and culinary scene of the city, Parque Lleras awaits just a 7-minute drive or a 15-minute walk away.
- Additionally, being slightly uphill provides cleaner and cooler air, away from the tourist buzz of Parque Lleras but still close to all the action.

Top 10 Restaurants:
1. Relato (Fusion of Mediterranean, Asian and Latin food)
2. Dos Santos
3. Ritwal
4. Colosal
5. Bamba Negra
6. Toro
7. La Matriarca (Colombian food)
8. Bárbaro Cocina Primitiva.
9. Colosal.
10. Mamasita Medallo.

Top 10 Clubs:
1. Sci
2. La Oculta
3. La Chula Palmas
4. Gusto Club
5. Perro Negro
6. Neutro
7. Cromantic
8. La House
9. Teatro Victoria
10. Salon Amador

Welcome to your new home in El Tesoro, where comfort and lifestyle are perfectly balanced!
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Uber and other transportation platforms work great here.

You can also request reception to order you an official taxi as well.

Simply turn left out of the building and walk along Carrera 25 to arrive at El Tesoro Mall

Turn right out of the building, then your first left to head down Calle 10 to arrive at Provenza and Parque Lleras.

description: Luxurious Renovated Duplex. Picture yourself on a stunning terrace with a private jacuzzi and a projector, turning your nights into unforgettable cinematic experiences. Perfectly located in the heart of Laureles' Primer Parque, this penthouse is just minutes from top restaurants, bars, and cafés. If vibrant nightlife is what you seek, the renowned "Calle 70" — the city's party hub — is less than five minutes away. Designed as your tranquil retreat in the city of eternal springThe spaceOn the first level, you are welcomed by the living room, dining area, kitchen, laundry room, a balcony with a minibar, a guest bathroom, and two bedrooms. All three bedrooms in this apartment are designed with luxury and comfort in mind. Two of the bedrooms feature private bathrooms, adding a touch of exclusivity. The centerpiece awaits on the second level: the master bedroom, a serene retreat, seamlessly connected to the stunning terrace, where a hydro-massage jacuzzi invites you to unwind.Registration number108116

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Luxurious Renovated Duplex. Picture yourself on a stunning terrace with a private jacuzzi and a projector, turning your nights into unforgettable cinematic experiences. Perfectly located in the heart of Laureles' Primer Parque, this penthouse is just minutes from top restaurants, bars, and cafés. If vibrant nightlife is what you seek, the renowned "Calle 70" — the city's party hub — is less than five minutes away. Designed as your tranquil retreat in the city of eternal spring

The space
On the first level, you are welcomed by the living room, dining area, kitchen, laundry room, a balcony with a minibar, a guest bathroom, and two bedrooms. All three bedrooms in this apartment are designed with luxury and comfort in mind. Two of the bedrooms feature private bathrooms, adding a touch of exclusivity. The centerpiece awaits on the second level: the master bedroom, a serene retreat, seamlessly connected to the stunning terrace, where a hydro-massage jacuzzi invites you to unwind.

Registration number
108116

locationDescriptions/0/content: The neighborhood is a charming and traditional place that combines residential tranquility with a wide variety of amenities and amenities. Located in the western part of the city, Laureles First Park is a popular destination for both local residents and visitors. The Park is at the heart of the neighborhood, green and wooded space, which is the meeting point for the community. Here, residents enjoy outdoor activities such as walks, games, exercise, and moments of rest. The park is also the setting for local cultural events and festivals, making it a lively and lively place. In addition, the neighborhood has a variety of dining options, from local restaurants offering local dishes to trendy international establishments. You will also find cafes and bakeries where you can enjoy delicious flavors and specialties. The neighborhood also offers a wide range of services and amenities, including supermarkets, pharmacies, health centers, and local shops. In addition, the area has schools, universities and recreational parks, which makes it ideal for families and students.
locationDescriptions/1/content: We highly recommend exploring the neighborhood on foot during your stay. The area is adorned with lush vegetation and beautiful trees, creating a nice and welcoming atmosphere. Being in a flat area of the city, it is very easy to walk around, which is especially convenient if you have a pet or a stroller. However, if you do need to travel to a place that requires transportation, we suggest downloading Uber or InDriver on your phone. These rideshare apps offer a safer option, providing detailed information about the driver and platform ensures a high level of customer service.

Guest access
Welcome to our spacious villa, where guests share the main entrance foyer but enjoy complete privacy on the second floor.

This exclusive floor boasts three private bedrooms, each offering a serene retreat. You can unwind in the secluded jacuzzi or detox in the personal sauna, both designed for your relaxation and rejuvenation.

Step outside to discover two rooftop terraces offering breathtaking views, perfect for enjoying the beauty of the surroundings. Whether you're lounging indoors or exploring the nearby attractions, our villa provides a luxurious and tranquil escape for your stay.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
La Golondrina is a RUSTIC and COZY cabin, perfect for resting, sharing and enjoying life♡.

It is an opportunity to experience COUNTRY life.

The space
50 minutes from the center of Medellín, our 60-meter cabin has a room with bathroom, a living room, equipped kitchen, a mezzanini with TV and "comfortable area", a spacious balcony with katamaran mesh to rest, a space for campfires and/or roasts, as well as a large garden and green area♡.

☀ The stay is specifically for 2 people, in the room that has a double bed. However, for FAMILY stays, the living room sofa bed and mezzanini can accommodate up to 2 children or young people.

☀ We are PET-FRIENDLY, with an additional cleaning fee (please enter information when booking).

☀ The reservation includes use of ALL areas PRIVATELY, kitchen equipped with the basics for cooking, ingredients of the country breakfast and charcoal for the grill.

☀ SPECIAL FEATURE: The MEZZANINE of this cottage is especially COMFORTABLE. You can read a book, watch a movie, use board games, rest, take a nap.

OUR SCHEDULES (Season September-November 2024)

❀ Reservations in week (Revenue MONDAY TO THURSDAY)
Check IN: 12PM - CHECK-OUT: 6:00PM

❀ Reservations in week (FRIDAY Revenue, SATURDAY Departure)
Check IN: 12PM - Check OUT: 12PM.

Weekend ❀ reservations (Saturdays and Sundays with festive Mondays)
Check IN: 3:00PM - CHECK-OUT: 6:00PM.

*In the case of Sundays with a public Monday, it is necessary to book until Monday to check out at 6:00pm; in case it is only booked from Saturday to Sunday, check-out is at 12:00pm.

Guest access
The cabin is located in the San Miguel part Alta, Barro Blanco, Santa Elena, Medellín. We have a private parking lot for motorcycle and car.

You will receive the location in Google maps, a map and we will also give you directions to get from different places (from the Aeropuerto-Oriente Antioqueño, on the Via las Palmas, by the Via de Santa Elena). In general the roads are in good condition, but there are fragments in which the roadway is in regular condition. In the access to the cabin, 650 meters must be covered by unpaved track, that is to say UNPAVED. In this section it is necessary to pass slowly and with caution, however, the state of the road is suitable for any type of vehicle including motorcycles.

The parking lot is approximately 200 yards from the cabin. The terrain is sloped, accessed by a trail with concrete steps.

Other things to note
WiFi: Exclusive Internet connection of 60 megabytes of speed, with fiber optic.
TV: Smart TV with Digital Television: 245 channels, 66 of them in HD.
Streaming Services: NETFLIX

Registration number
153140

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Santa Elena is the preferred tourist site of those who want to connect with nature, have fun and rest.

500 meters from the cabin there is a walking path near the forest.

700 meters away there is a silletera estate where tours and experiences take place (subject to availability)

1.5 km (22 minute walk) away, you'll find a convenience store and a homemade restaurant, as well as the Church on the sidewalk.

At 3.7 km (10 minutes by car) you will find a gastronomic corridor with a varied offer of restaurants (7-10 places with delicious food).

7.4 km (19 minutes by car) you arrive at Santa Elena Park., where you can find hairdresser, restaurants, cafes, soccer field, bars, etc.

11 km away (20-25 minutes by car) away you can enjoy Arví Park, including Piedras Blanco Park and Comfama Arví Park, as well as Metrocable.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Entrance by Vía Santa Elena, Vía Las Palmas, and Oriente Antioque.
PRIVATE park.
This cabin is part of the QUIMULÁ Countryside Connection; a fully fenced-in FAMILY property with outdoor security cameras.
650 meters from the cabin, BUSES from SANTA ELENA - MEDELLÍN and GUARNE arrive. Particular transportation services TO and FROM Medellín must be scheduled in advance, we have a trusted driver.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
We are delighted to welcome you to your newly built apartment in CASA FIORA, our boutique house filled with LOCAL BRANDS for our guests to admire. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen and stay connected with high-speed WIFI. We are located within walking distance of the area's nightlife and delectable dining options. There is a new air conditioning system in your apartment perfect for Medellin's hot weather, as well as a spacious bathroom.

Ideal for business trips, families, and groups of friends.

The space
CASA FIORA is located on LAURELES' best street. In the building, you'll find 7 separate apartments, all designed by a renowned architect from Medellín. You'll enjoy apartment #7, the only one with a view of the terrace and sunshine pouring into the apartment.

Everything in our lovely apartment was specifically curated and newly built, in it, you'll enjoy:

- Big Queen bed (160cms)
- NEW Air Conditioning / AC
- FAST WI-Fi
- Portable fan
- Bathroom
- Rain shower
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Air Fryer
- Microwave
- Living room
- Electric Stove
- Smart TV
- Big terrace (shared with other guests)
- Paid Minibar
- Paid Gym

Guest access
-Guests are required to complete online check-in before arrival.
-We have an auto check-in process available 24/7.

Other things to note
-We offer a VIP airport shuttle service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. (Reservations are required in advance.)
-Extra Cleaning Service: Available upon request for $12 USD.
-Laundry Service: Available for a fee and upon request.
-Concierge Service: For reservations, included according to the employees' schedule.
- Gym day ($15 USD per guest)

UNREGISTERED GUESTS ARE NOT ALLOWED ($150 fine)
NO SMOKING INSIDE ($100 fine)
NO PARTIES ($300 fine)
NO LOUD MUSIC DURING QUIET HOURS ($150 fine)
IF YOU ARE A COLOMBIAN RESIDENT, A 19% VAT WILL BE CHARGED UPON ARRIVAL.

*WE ARE AGAINST SEX TOURISM*

Registration number
168580

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Luxury Penthouse! 📍Located in the most incredible place in envigado just 8 minutes from the 🌇Poblado, plus the azotea and the jacuzzi are private of the apartment! Very soon the residential complex will open its doors to the areas of the unit like; the incredible pool. At this moment you can already visit the gym and the hobbies room. You also have 24 hour private security. Our penthouse is characterized by its tranquility and beautiful luxury finishes. Book now!!🤗We're waiting for you.

The space
Luxury Penthouse with rooftop and private Jacuzzi. Our apartment offers you luxury finishes, on the first floor you will find open American type kitchen with island and pantry in the middle of an incredible height. You will also find the living room with a comfortable sofa and TV overlooking the pool of the residential ensemble, 2 bedrooms among them you will find the main room with a king bed, TV, a very comfortable sofa for rest, private bathroom with walk-in closet and fan. The other room has a bed of 1.40 with a bed base for one more person. On the second level you will find our incredible jacuzzi with a comfortable room to enjoy between friends, additional on the second level you will find bathroom and a laundry room. The view is beautiful, the apartment is known for being very quiet. The residential complex will soon inaugurate the pool, at this moment you can already make use of the gym and the hobbies room. Book now!

Guest access
The entire house is exclusively yours, without interruption for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself at home.

Other than the already mentioned amenities, our house also features:

✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Washer/Dryer
✔ 24-Hour Camera Security
✔ Free Private Parking

Other things to note
Our beautiful Penthouse has 24 hour 👮security! We are also in the area where you will find restaurants, banks, mall's, shopping malls and others, very close.

description: You're going to love it.Enjoy the mountain..!!, trails in forests,easy access,close to restaurants,coffee, home supermarket. It is located in a natural and quiet environment,with different forms of transportation to connect the city (bus,cable, taxi, app, app..) Escape or work will become a pleasure if you are here, with stable fiber optic internet, 80m and 93M for 5g, and at the same time enjoy a quiet place but with options for adventure activities. HEATING AT EXTRA COSTThe spaceOur place will delight you, you can spend the evenings resting in the hammock located on the deck of the house , watch the birds feed , and at the end of the day you can create magical environments in the heat  of a beautiful fireplace. And  if you're a little more adventurous, just a few meters from our house  you have forests with paths that intertwine to be traveled on foot or by bike. In addition, if you are interested in silletera culture, famous in our flower fair, we tell you that we are in the heart of this, because it is in our surroundings where many of the sillets that go to the silleteros parade are manufactured and we have them at our disposal to live them firsthand from their creators, who are our neighbors.Guest accessThe house is surrounded by approx. 600m ² of green area and trees that you can enjoy, it also has a large parking lot inside the property, and if you require transportation to Guatapé , pick-up from and to the airport, or other places of interest we can also offer it at an additional cost, subject to availability.Other things to noteWe are 2,400 meters above sea level, in an area called the fog forest, and the temperature ranges between 13 and 25 degrees Celsius in the day, and can drop a little more at night at certain times of the year, so you must prepare your suitcases including clothing and adequate protection for your level of tolerance to these temperatures. But from experience we can tell you that it is paradise!, you will never have a hellish heat or a cold that hurts in your bones. And if you are willing to do outdoor activities, you must include sunscreen and comfortable footwear, because on the trails the terrain can vary.The house is a new construction and has been developed with a model of thermoacoustic walls and ceiling, which isolate noise and regulate the temperature, so the environment becomes very cozy and comfortable. and an ecological system has been installed for the collection of water from the ceilings to be used. htmlDescription/htmlText:
You're going to love it.Enjoy the mountain..!!, trails in forests,easy access,close to restaurants,coffee, home supermarket. It is located in a natural and quiet environment,with different forms of transportation to connect the city (bus,cable, taxi, app, app..) Escape or work will become a pleasure if you are here, with stable fiber optic internet, 80m and 93M for 5g, and at the same time enjoy a quiet place but with options for adventure activities. HEATING AT EXTRA COST

The space
Our place will delight you, you can spend the evenings resting in the hammock located on the deck of the house , watch the birds feed , and at the end of the day you can create magical environments in the heat of a beautiful fireplace. And if you're a little more adventurous, just a few meters from our house you have forests with paths that intertwine to be traveled on foot or by bike. In addition, if you are interested in silletera culture, famous in our flower fair, we tell you that we are in the heart of this, because it is in our surroundings where many of the sillets that go to the silleteros parade are manufactured and we have them at our disposal to live them firsthand from their creators, who are our neighbors.

Guest access
The house is surrounded by approx. 600m ² of green area and trees that you can enjoy, it also has a large parking lot inside the property, and if you require transportation to Guatapé , pick-up from and to the airport, or other places of interest we can also offer it at an additional cost, subject to availability.

Other things to note
We are 2,400 meters above sea level, in an area called the fog forest, and the temperature ranges between 13 and 25 degrees Celsius in the day, and can drop a little more at night at certain times of the year, so you must prepare your suitcases including clothing and adequate protection for your level of tolerance to these temperatures. But from experience we can tell you that it is paradise!, you will never have a hellish heat or a cold that hurts in your bones. And if you are willing to do outdoor activities, you must include sunscreen and comfortable footwear, because on the trails the terrain can vary.
The house is a new construction and has been developed with a model of thermoacoustic walls and ceiling, which isolate noise and regulate the temperature, so the environment becomes very cozy and comfortable. and an ecological system has been installed for the collection of water from the ceilings to be used. It has also been strategically located on the ground so that the rest areas are protected from the wind or extreme sun depending on the case. In conclusion, it has been specially designed and made for your comfort and enjoyment.
If you are a foreigner, you should know that most local sites have cash payment, Colombian pesos, so that you keep it in mind in your budget.

locationDescriptions/0/content: We are located in the district of Santa Elena 30 minutes from Medellín, in a rural area with forests and nearby trails, but with all the resources nearby, Supermarket , pharmacy, hardware store, fast food, pac electronic bancolombia, 500 meters. Other restaurants with local food, pizza, pasta and Bistro coffees within 1 kilometer. Home services of different grocery stores and prepared meals.  Our neighborhood is composed of a mixed population of multicultural people intermingled with the natives of the area who are the traditional saddlers, so if you come in August, you can have the opportunity to enter the saddler farms and observe closely the elaboration of the saddles that will be part of the beautiful parade of saddlers. All this makes it a privileged location that you will be short of exploring in one visit.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
The Airport is 17 km away, approx. 30 minutes, from there you can take Uber or a taxi. We can also do the airport pick-up service at extra cost, we do it ourselves in our private vehicle.
In public service: walk 500m to a gazebo and take a public service bus from Rionegro that goes to Medellin and passes through Santa Elena, get off at the El Silletero stadium and take a buseta or other local transport to the fat stone sidewalk, and you get to the house.
500m from the house is the main road through which the buses that go to Medellin or to the cable metro station that connects to the entire integrated transport system in the city pass.
Likewise, the House has access roads in case you want to hire an Uber service to it or there is also a local private car transportation system that you can call at home and pick you up at the time you quote them for a very moderate cost, and they take you to different sectors of Santa Elena or Medellin.
So you have many alternatives to move , it all depends on what experience you want to live.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Welcome to our charming duplex apartment located in Laureles, one of the most appreciated areas of Medellín. This spacious accommodation is perfect for travelers who want to explore the city while enjoying comfort and tranquility.

It has a privileged location: Located close to the Bulerías roundabout, the apartment offers you easy access to places such as Unicentro, the Universidad Pontificia Bolivariana (UPB), Pueblito Paisa and the vibrant avenue 70.

The space
Enjoy a completely new space and full of natural light, designed to provide you with a welcoming and modern experience during your stay in Medellín.

The apartment has two comfortably furnished rooms, perfect for up to four people. The first has a double or double bed and the second with two single beds, in addition to having 1.5 bathrooms (a full bathroom on the second floor next to the rooms and a social bathroom on the first floor)

Fully equipped kitchen: Prepare your favorite meals in the fully equipped kitchen, including fridge, stove, oven, microwave, coffee maker and all utensils needed for an experience

Additionally, it also has a laundry area with a washer and extender to make your stay more complete.

Despite its central location, the apartment is in a quiet area, ideal for resting after a day of exploring the city. In addition, it has all the necessary amenities within walking distance, including supermarkets, restaurants, sports complex and public transport.

Book now and discover why our duplex apartment is the ideal choice for your next trip to Medellin!

Guest access
This is a completely private apartment for guests use.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Vista Palmera is a modern Airbnb in Medellín, located in the sector of 33, 3 minutes from Plaza Mayor and 5 minutes from the San Diego Mall. Offers an oasis of tranquility with stunning views of the city and mountains. With easy access to downtown, the property boasts an ideal pool for relaxing on sunny days. It is perfect for 3 people, being ideal for families, couples, and business travelers looking for comfort, convenience, and a quiet environment.

The space
At the house view palm tree find you:

Spacious space: The apartment comes with 1 comfortable and modern room. The room has a Queen bed, perfect for a restful rest, while in the living room there is a comfortable sofa bed.

Stunning Views: From the windows you can enjoy panoramic views of the city and mountains, a visual breath that complements the stay at the property.

Equipped kitchen: The kitchen includes all the appliances you need to feel at home: fridge, coffee maker, a 4 st stalls stove, microwave and blender.

Bathrooms and clothing area: The property has a fully equipped bathroom and 1/2 with a hairdryer, hot water, and the clothing area has a washing machine and clothes hooks.

Connectivity and entertainment: Stay connected with high-speed Wi-Fi and enjoy your favorite series on Netflix, ideal for relaxing after a day exploring the city.

Parking & Safety: The property has security cameras outside the property, and private parking, ensuring your vehicle is always safe.

Climate comfort: All bedrooms are equipped with fans, ensuring a cool and comfortable stay.

Strategic location: palm view is walking distance to the best restaurants and bars in the area, close to one of the main shopping centers in the city and the Plaza Mayor event center.

Family friendly: Close to commercial areas, the apartment is perfect for those traveling with children.

Guest access
Guests will be able to make use of all the comforts that the home has.

Bedrooms: 1
Number of guests: 3 Max
Beds: 1 Queen Beds, 1 Sofa Bed
Bathrooms: 1.5
Kitchen: Equipped Full
Parking: 1
Pool: 1 (Published)

Swimming pool subject to hours

Other things to note
We are located in a very busy area of the city, so our guests will be able to hear the noise from the street.

WE ARE AGAINST SEX TOURISM AND CHILD EXPLOITATION. Failure to comply with this policy will be grounds for immediate termination of the stay.

Minors are welcome, but prior registration is required and must be accompanied by their parents or responsible guardians who have the necessary documentation to verify it.

Under city regulations all guests must share their ID., either citizenship card, passport or ID card.

Guest is liable for any damage caused to the property or items provided during the stay. Any repair or replacement of damaged items will be done through Airbnb. To avoid additional charges, it is requested to leave the accommodation in the same conditions it was found upon arrival.
