description: One of the nicest Airbnb Gems in Medellin, filled with charm, style, modern touches, wide open spaces, and an unbeatable location close to everything you could possibly need to get the full experience of this beautiful city. whether a solo adventurer, business traveler, or couple, this Studio Loft will give you the perfect base to enjoy your time in the city of eternal spring. ***The spaceAlright so this studio apartment is packed with Style, Class and attention to detail, for the price it's pretty tough to beat ;) it's located on the first floor of a larger property where other travelers/professionals are also renting suites. The Studio has a full kitchen, dining area, living room/office space, bathroom, and bedroom with Queen size bed, double tall ceilings, 2 big screen TVs with Roku and Netflix account. High Speed WIFI, and a whole lot of style ;) 10 years ago, when I first arrived in Medellin, I had actually stayed at a place just down the road from this House...I had been looking for a part of town with a bit more of that authentic Colombian charm than the typical tourist trail provides... but still wanted the comfort, safety, and touches of modernity that give the higher class areas their sense of enchantment...long story short, I found exactly what I was looking for in the Laureles/Estadio area, and grabbed a room through airbnb. I would spend my days in nearby cafes, mixing music, writing, and walking down the street to the UPB University (abuzz with youthful energy and free wifi ;) ) taking spanish classes, working out, working on my projects, and before I knew it, I didn't want to leave, I felt more at home in this city than in any other I had previously traveled, and so the backpack was taken off, and 10 years later I'm still here :) after many fortunate adventures, I stumbled upon this gem in what remains my favourite part of town, so I've since added a ton of modern details and design, and made it into the type of space where the energy flows well, and people can truly get comfortable - Professionals who work online will be more than happy with the solid High Speed Fiber-Optic internet connection with 100 down and 50 up. - full HD Roku with Netflix and Disney+ in living room and bedroom- Maid Service throughout the week- On Site Laundry Service included- Very Comfortable Pillow-top Orthopedic Queen Mattress- 52" and 42" Flat screen TVs in living room and bedroom with HDMI and USB connections - WIFI throughout - Beautiful Fully loaded Kitchen- 10 Minute walk to the stadium metro station- Hot-Water Shower- Air Conditioning- private Street-Level DeckGuest accessGuests will have full access and privacy of their own studio apartment.Other things to noteWe also have a Healing centre in Girardota, 40 minutes north of Medellin, where we work with traditional amazonian plant medicines and host Ayahuasca ceremonies and retreats, guided by Shaman from the Putumayo Amazon. it's a beautiful experience that we'd be happy to share more information on should you be interested :)Registration number168822

host/about:
On one side of this story we have Keenan, an impulsive nomadic Canadian who's only true compass is his heart, a seeker of beautiful moments and a lover of life.

On the other side we have Dani, a fiery young paisa with a desire to help build a better world. 10 years ago these two crazy kids stumbled into each other's lives, and neither of them could have imagined the adventure that awaited them. but now 10 years later here we are, and very happy to be here ;)

across years of trial and error with airbnb's, we've managed to create a very special kind of space for travellers, where the energy is always clean, inspiring, and conducive to meeting great people from across the globe, who share a passion for culture, and for enjoying this life.

We also run an Ayahuasca healing centre just outside of Medellin where we work alongside indigenous Shaman to facilitate processes of deep healing and self-discovery with the help of the Amazonian plant medicines. We've had people from all over the world join us on retreats, and this is just the beginning ;) Our mission is to help change lives for the better, and to shed light upon the incredible nature of the world we live in, and the people who compose it. So whether its to rent one of our spaces, or to join us on retreat, we'd like to thank you for choosing to connect with us, and wish you all the best on your adventure forward

Keenan and Dani
htmlDescription/htmlText:
One of the nicest Airbnb Gems in Medellin, filled with charm, style, modern touches, wide open spaces, and an unbeatable location close to everything you could possibly need to get the full experience of this beautiful city. whether a solo adventurer, business traveler, or couple, this Studio Loft will give you the perfect base to enjoy your time in the city of eternal spring. ***

The space
Alright so this studio apartment is packed with Style, Class and attention to detail, for the price it's pretty tough to beat ;) it's located on the first floor of a larger property where other travelers/professionals are also renting suites.

The Studio has a full kitchen, dining area, living room/office space, bathroom, and bedroom with Queen size bed, double tall ceilings, 2 big screen TVs with Roku and Netflix account. High Speed WIFI, and a whole lot of style ;)

10 years ago, when I first arrived in Medellin, I had actually stayed at a place just down the road from this House...I had been looking for a part of town with a bit more of that authentic Colombian charm than the typical tourist trail provides... but still wanted the comfort, safety, and touches of modernity that give the higher class areas their sense of enchantment...long story short, I found exactly what I was looking for in the Laureles/Estadio area, and grabbed a room through airbnb. I would spend my days in nearby cafes, mixing music, writing, and walking down the street to the UPB University (abuzz with youthful energy and free wifi ;) ) taking spanish classes, working out, working on my projects, and before I knew it, I didn't want to leave, I felt more at home in this city than in any other I had previously traveled, and so the backpack was taken off, and 10 years later I'm still here :) after many fortunate adventures, I stumbled upon this gem in what remains my favourite part of town, so I've since added a ton of modern details and design, and made it into the type of space where the energy flows well, and people can truly get comfortable

- Professionals who work online will be more than happy with the solid High Speed Fiber-Optic internet connection with 100 down and 50 up.
- full HD Roku with Netflix and Disney+ in living room and bedroom
- Maid Service throughout the week
- On Site Laundry Service included
- Very Comfortable Pillow-top Orthopedic Queen Mattress
- 52" and 42" Flat screen TVs in living room and bedroom with HDMI and USB connections
- WIFI throughout
- Beautiful Fully loaded Kitchen
- 10 Minute walk to the stadium metro station
- Hot-Water Shower
- Air Conditioning
- private Street-Level Deck

Guest access
Guests will have full access and privacy of their own studio apartment.

Other things to note
We also have a Healing centre in Girardota, 40 minutes north of Medellin, where we work with traditional amazonian plant medicines and host Ayahuasca ceremonies and retreats, guided by Shaman from the Putumayo Amazon. it's a beautiful experience that we'd be happy to share more information on should you be interested :)

locationDescriptions/0/content:
As mentioned earlier the area is pretty hard to beat, just 2 blocks from the charming and energetic "la 70" stretch of cafes, bars and restaurants, with the city's most prestigious university (la UPB) and Unicentro mall and movie theater just a short walk away as well. the city's main sports stadium is just down the road aswell, where you can get a taste of Colombian soccer or check out the olympic swimming pools or free outdoor gym.
- one of the nicest things about the area is the number or healthy/organic restaurants and cafes within walking distance, as the city has just recently started to pay attention to the demand for healthy alternatives and this part of town seems to be leading the way, there's some REALLY great restaurants just a block away :)...all of this while being just far enough away from the action so that the nights are quiet and the rooms remain peaceful, like I said...pretty hard to beat :)
locationDescriptions/1/content:
This area is VERY central, a short taxi or metro ride to downtown, or any other part of town for that matter so it's one of the best location in terms of getting around medellin
- The Estadio Metro station is just a 10 minute walk up "la 70", and gives you access to Medellin's award winning metro system, where you can access any part of the city, safely and comfortably for less than $1 USD, to be honest traveling via metro is great in Medellin, and really gives you a taste of the city, so don't miss out
- taxis in Medellin are very inexpensive with a 10 minute taxi ride sometimes costing no more than $3.00 USD, which is obviously very cool

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Spectacular Penthouse with breathtaking 360 degree views of Medellin.
Tastefully decorated and stocked with everything you need for an optimal stay.

Strategically located within walking distance to all the boutiques, bars, coffee shops, malls, supermarkets, restaurants and nightlife in the Lleras / Provenza / Manila / Astorga neighborhoods of El Poblado.

The space
The apartment is located at the top floor of a modern building with 24 hour doorman, perimeter security, elevators, plenty of guest parking and on the 5th floor you will have access to swimming pool, sun deck, steam room and fitness center
.
The apartment has 2 bedrooms; the master suite has a a king size bed and the junior suite has a queen size bed, both beds have super comfy orthopedic grade mattresses dressed with high thread count bed linen to ensure you get a proper rest. Both suites have en-suite bathrooms, hair dryers, walk-in closets, high definition smart TV's, air conditioner (as of Feb 25, 2020) and ventilators.

There's a studio area separated by curtains (not installed at the time of taking the pics) from the rest of the apartment for privacy; this area is ideal for work but can also double up as a room for an additional guest on a high grade self inflatable mattress. The studio has easy access to the social toilet but shower would need to be shared with one of the suites.
The living room is fitted out with a 65" high definition smart TV with sound bar.

Guests have a choice of eating at the dining table or at the balcony bar though both areas command spectacular views.

Unwind at our spectacular balcony with unobstructed breathtaking views of the mountain range and city, complete with bar, gas BBQ, and rocking chairs.

The kitchen is fully fitted out with refrigerator, stove, traditional oven, microwave oven, dishwasher, juicer, blender, coffee machine, cookware, cutlery, dishware, and all cooking utensils.

Laundry area boasts a modern washer / dryer, vacuum cleaner, iron, iron board.

Last but not least there's high speed broadband internet with WiFi coverage throughout the whole apartment.

Guest access
Guests will have key-less access to the entire penthouse to themselves and will also have access to the building common areas (parking, gym, pool, steam room, sunbathing area).

Other things to note
As of last year the Colombian government requires airbnb hosts to fill out certain information about the guests that they're hosting in their apartments, taking this into account we, as responsible hosts that follow the law, will require that our guests provide certain information to make sure we can comply with this requirement such as: full names, ID's, travel motive, etc.

1. The pool & Sauna are closed on Mondays due to maintenance.
2. Potential for noise due to a construction relatively close to the building

locationDescriptions/0/content:
El Poblado is an upscale neighborhood with a population of roughly 125,000; home to several boutique stores and Medellín’s highest-end shopping malls: El Tesoro, Oviedo and Santafé.

El Poblado is also home to the Zona Rosa, which surrounds Parque Lleras; this is a nightlife area full of clubs, restaurants and bars.

El Poblado is popular with foreigners visiting town due to its strategic location with easy access to tourist attractions in and beyond the city, business travelers have most corporate centers in the vicinity, medical tourists will find the best clinics, hospitals and doctors and all travelers can enjoy the shopping malls, nightlife and restaurants nearby.

El Poblado has a strong police presence and the area is considered one of the safest neighborhoods in Medellin.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Parque lleras is the epicenter of all entertainment options in the Poblado area; Our building is located close to the action (11 minutes walk) but far from the noise. Alternatively, you can order an Uber or hail a cab and the 6 minute ride will cost aprox. USD 2.
All other main attractions in the city can be easily reached by car and will take between 10 min - 20 min.
Though Medellin has a great public transport system composed of buses, trams, metro and cable cars; we recommend getting around by Uber or Taxi as it is straight forward and the fares are cheap.

locationDescriptions/0/content: Manila is a boho chic neighborhood of the city of Medellín, where we find restaurants, bars, rooftops and cafes full of style and varied gastronomic proposal. The neighborhood's vibe is bohemian and relaxed, with plenty of tourists and locals looking for a space to have fun and a good beer. There are art galleries, book stores, local clothing stores, craft repositories, and decor shops. It is a neighborhood with a privileged location in the city, close to the Medellin metro, the pink area of Poblado and many places of interest. We're surrounded by Boutique hotels and hostels that give that unique, bohemian touch we can walk around and enjoy.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
The space
Discover a fully furnished space designed for comfort, boasting a clean and minimalist style. Enjoy high-speed internet with a reliable backup account, just in case.
Our cozy studio comes with A/C, an Android TV loaded with Netflix, Youtube Premium and HBO MAX for your entertainment. Access is a breeze with our smart lock system for both suite's and the main front door. (Double security)

The kitchen is fully equipped, complete with a coffee maker (and a sample of local coffee for longer stays), a fridge, and utensils. For a refreshing shower, we've got a Bosch gas heater.

Perfect for digital nomads seeking a peaceful workspace and easy access to attractions like Comuna 13 (10 mins by metro), Calle 70 (15 mins walk), stadium concerts (10 mins walk), Via Jardin's finest restaurants (10 mins by car), Provenza (20 min by car).

You'll find everything you need nearby – grocery stores, Floresta park, subway station, bakeries, sports facilities, an Olympic pool, and more! Plus, enjoy discounts for longer stays (7+ days). Your comfortable adventure awaits!

Guest access
Perfect Location: Our place is just a stone's throw away from Floresta metro station, and it's conveniently located just one block from Avenida 80, a bustling avenue with various transportation choices. You'll find yourself a mere 5-10 minutes away from the second park of Laureles, Calle 70, and Atanasio Girardot Stadium, which is a pleasant 10-minute stroll.

Local Delights: Within a block and a half, you'll discover La Floresta Park, teeming with restaurants and spots to savor.

Getting Here: If you're arriving from Jose Maria Cordova Airport, there are several transportation options to consider:

Uber: Approximately $30 USD (120,000 COP), takes about 60 minutes for the 28 km journey.
Executive Taxi: Around $25 USD (100,000 COP), also about 60 minutes for the same distance.
Collective Taxi: Roughly $6 USD (27,000 COP), but it takes about 90 minutes as you'll need to switch to a local cab in San Diego.
Airport Buses: Costing about $4 USD (18,000 COP), it takes about 120 minutes. You'll need to transfer at Hotel Nutibara in downtown Medellin, where you can take a cab or hop on the metro. (The metro ticket costs $0.77 USD / 3,000 COP each way).
Heading to the Airport: When it's time to head back to the airport, you'll have the same transportation options available. We recommend planning ahead due to potential traffic and advise arriving at the airport at least 3 hours before your flight

Other things to note
Inflatable queen size mattress for third person **subject to previous request** and availability!

Laundry diagonal to the entrance of the building. Cost per load approx. 8 USD / 35.000 COP

All additional information about restaurants, places of interest and services you will receive before check-in! ;)

locationDescriptions/0/content: The La Floresta neighborhood is located in the La America district. It is situated in the Central Western Zone of the city, bordered to the north and west by Comuna. 13, San Javier, and to the east and south by Comuna. 11, Laureles - Estadio. The central part of the district is at an altitude of 1,534 meters above sea level. In terms of tree coverage and urban landscaping, it is one of the city's best areas, with well-maintained green spaces. The limited presence of industries results in relatively low levels of air pollution in the area.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Being just 2 blocks away from the Floresta Metro Station, transportation for residents is highly connected to the B Line, A Line, cable cars, and the entire integrated system. There is also easy access to Avenida 80, a major road with a significant flow of taxis and buses.

The loft is also conveniently located near a cycle route that runs along the Estadio canal and connects to points of interest such as the Atanasio Girardot sports complex, 70th Street, and the Laureles neighborhood (known for its dining options).

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Experience luxury in the heart of Laureles! This stunning Airbnb boasts two bedrooms, a private jacuzzi, and a breathtaking panoramic view of the city. Immerse yourself in comfort and convenience with fast wifi, making it the perfect retreat for both relaxation and productivity. Book now for an unforgettable stay in one of Medellin's most vibrant neighborhoods!

Please bear in mind some bedrooms photos are not updated. There is indeed AC wall units in all spaces.

The space
Welcome to a stylish and comfortable apartment in the heart of Laureles, a neighborhood known for its vibrant atmosphere and cultural richness. This two-bedroom, two-bathroom residence is a perfect blend of modern living and indulgent amenities.

1. Inviting Bedrooms:
The apartment features two well-appointed bedrooms, each designed with a focus on comfort and style. Large windows allow natural light to fill the rooms, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The bedrooms provide a peaceful retreat for rest and relaxation.

2. Modern Bathrooms:
Step into the contemporary bathrooms equipped with modern fixtures and elegant finishes. Whether you prefer a refreshing shower or a leisurely soak in the tub, these bathrooms offer a spa-like experience. The attention to detail ensures both functionality and aesthetics.

3. Panoramic Views:
One of the highlights of this residence is the panoramic view that greets you from every corner. Floor-to-ceiling windows open up the living spaces to breathtaking vistas of the Laureles neighborhood. Enjoy stunning sunrises and sunsets, creating a dynamic backdrop to your daily life.

4. Private Jacuzzi:
As you step onto your private terrace, you'll discover a secluded oasis featuring a private Jacuzzi. This exclusive amenity allows you to unwind and soak in the beauty of your surroundings. Whether you're entertaining guests or enjoying a quiet evening, the Jacuzzi adds a touch of luxury to your outdoor space.

5. Private Terrace:
The spacious private terrace is an extension of your living space, providing an outdoor haven for relaxation and entertainment. Furnish it with comfortable seating, and enjoy al fresco dining or simply bask in the fresh air while taking in the panoramic views that stretch beyond the cityscape.

6. Modern Kitchen and Living Spaces:
The apartment boasts an open-concept kitchen and living area, creating a seamless flow between spaces. The kitchen is equipped with contemporary appliances and stylish countertops, making it a joy to prepare meals. The living area is a chic space to unwind and entertain, with a design that complements the overall modern aesthetic.

7. Secure and Well-Appointed Building:
Security is a top priority, and the building ensures your safety with controlled access and surveillance.

This Laureles Penthouse offers a perfect balance of luxury, convenience, and stunning views. It's an ideal home for those seeking a sophisticated urban lifestyle in one of Medellín's most dynamic neighborhoods.

Guest access
Guest have access to to all amenities and spaces of the Penthouse

Other things to note
Please bear in mind some bedrooms photos are not updated. There is indeed AC wall units in all spaces

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Living in Laureles, a vibrant neighborhood in Medellín, Colombia, offers a unique and enriching experience. Here are some highlights that make Laureles a sought-after residential area:

Cultural Richness:
Laureles is known for its cultural diversity and vibrant atmosphere. The neighborhood is home to numerous theaters, art galleries, and cultural spaces, making it a hub for creativity and artistic expression.

Lush Greenery:
One of the distinctive features of Laureles is its abundance of green spaces. The neighborhood is adorned with parks, such as the iconic Laureles Park and the circular Simon Bolivar Park, offering residents plenty of opportunities for outdoor activities and relaxation.

Local Cuisine and Cafés:
Laureles boasts a diverse culinary scene, with a plethora of restaurants, cafés, and food markets. Residents can explore a wide range of local and international cuisines, from traditional Colombian dishes to trendy international fare.

Friendly Community Vibe:
The neighborhood has a welcoming and friendly community vibe. Whether you're strolling through the parks, visiting local markets, or enjoying a coffee in one of the many cafés, you'll likely encounter warm smiles and a sense of community.

Safety and Accessibility:
Laureles is considered one of the safer neighborhoods in Medellín, contributing to its popularity among residents. Additionally, the neighborhood is well-connected with public transportation, making it easy to navigate the city and explore other areas.

Café Culture:
Laureles is known for its thriving café culture. Residents can spend leisurely afternoons in cozy coffee shops, enjoying a cup of Colombian coffee while reading a book or working remotely. The neighborhood provides a conducive environment for a relaxed and fulfilling lifestyle.

Cycling-Friendly Infrastructure:
The neighborhood is recognized for its bike-friendly infrastructure. Laureles has designated bike lanes and bike-sharing programs, encouraging a healthy and environmentally friendly mode of transportation.

Educational Institutions:
Laureles is home to several prestigious educational institutions, making it an ideal location for families. Quality schools and universities contribute to the overall appeal of the neighborhood for those seeking an educational environment.

Dynamic Nightlife:
While not as bustling as some other areas in Medellín, Laureles has a dynamic nightlife scene. Residents can find a mix of bars, pubs, and nightclubs, providing entertainment options for those who enjoy socializing after dark.

Modern suite with fully furnished kitchen, 300 MB internet, A/C, air conditioning, blackout curtains with remote control, and spectacular city view.
The building is located in the best neighborhood of Medellín, El Poblado, near the EAFIT University, the Golden Mile, shopping centers, supermarkets, restaurants and the Aguacatala metro station. It has a coworking area, coffee, gym and 24 hour surveillance. Free Netflix.

The space
Suite with double bed and sofa bed, fully furnished with everything you need for your stay. Desk, remote control dark blind, AC and Smart TV.

Guest access
It is easy to call an Uber / taxi. The Aguacatela metro station is a 5-minute walk away.
Close to the Golden Mile where there are restaurants / bars, shopping malls and Provenza and Lleras Park which is a very popular night district.

Other things to note
Wake up to the view of the mountains and the Golden Mile.

Our cozy 39m² (420 ft²) apartment is a warm and welcoming home with new, modern furniture. The flat enjoys afternoon sun and a gorgeous view toward the mountains of Medellin.

Here are some details of this beautiful getaway:



- Jacuzzi (out of service )
- BBQ
- Steam room
Subject to availability check first
Facilities

- 24h security and reception service

The Balcony:
This is the perfect space to wind down, enjoy the cool breeze, and experience why Medellin is called the city of eternal spring.
Open Plan Living Room:
- Fast WiFi
- Flat screen Smart tv
- Sofa bed

The Kitchen:
- Fully equipped for the chefs in the family (all cutlery and crockery)
- Kettle, Ceramic cooker, Oven
- Wine glasses, wine opener


Master Bedroom:
- Doble size bed
- Overlooking a quiet street
- Clean and crisp linen
- Wardrobe

Bathrooms / Laundry
- Washing machine
- Equipped with toiletries
- Shower cabin, basin
- Towels, bathmat
- Hair dryer

Guest access
Here are some details of this beautiful getaway:
The Private Roof-top:
Upon 24h request this space becomes all yours! Perfect for getting together with family and friends. Lots of space for people to eat together, hang out, stargaze, and relax. The rooftop has everything you need to have a fun weekend, just bring your steaks and margaritas!
- Jacuzzi ( out of service)
- Reclining sun loungers
- BBQ
- Steam room

Other things to note
Wifi shared with another apartment.

We would love to host your friends and family. We love making our guests super happy. Feel free to contact us with any questions. We hope to welcome you soon and be a little part of the reason why you’ll fall in love with Medellin.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Come and get to know the most central and vibrant area of Medellin! Laureles - Stadium. Close to Carrera 70 boulevard, we are a five-minute walk from Metro Station and nine minutes from Atanasio Girardot Stadium, an area that offers many sports and tourist activities.

The space
Hi travelers! A couple of months ago we moved to Casa Selva, a new and beautiful space. It is quiet, artistic and natural, very close to supermarkets, shopping malls, public transport, bars and restaurants.
** 500MBPS WIFI, ETHERNET cable connection in every room.
**The kitchen is equipped with two refrigerators, coffee maker, blender, it has all the facilities and utensils needed to make well prepared meals. There is also an iron and a community hairdryer.
**Stays for more than 5 days have free laundry service and room cleaning once a week, change of sheets and towels.
**All rooms come with a double bed, desk and comfortable chair for working, shelves for clothes, fan and private bathroom with hot shower.
**Casa Selva is a 3-story building that has: 9 bedrooms and 2 apartments, with spacious and illuminated common areas, where you can relax and/or work comfortably. Ideal for long seasons or a couple of nights, getting to know Medellín and rest.

Other things to note
*We offer Acupuncture Therapy or Traditional Chinese Medicine since 70,000 COP*

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Centrally and strategically located, near Av. Las Palmas and 5min from Túnel de Oriente (airport route). In the El Salvador neighborhood, equidistant from key areas in Medellín (Downtown 5min, El Poblado 15min, Laureles 20min). Enjoy views of Cerro La Asomadera and the city center from the terrace. Cozy space, warm atmosphere, and natural surroundings. Convenience and local charm with nearby commercial services, including a variety of neighborhood gastronomy just a few steps away.

The space
The terrace is spacious and versatile, perfect for sunbathing during the day or marveling at the stars at night.
Beautiful plants adorn both the interior and exterior, creating a warm and pleasant atmosphere.
The kitchen offers comfort and ample space.
The bathroom is spacious, well-ventilated, and provides good storage space.
The comfortable bedroom features a Queen-sized bed, TV with Netflix and local channels, a spacious closet, and a reading nook.
A large work desk with an ergonomic chair and adjustable lighting is available for productivity.
Stable Wi-Fi with a speed of 510 MB.
The living room is inviting, with a home theater setup including a video projector (VideoBeam).
Additionally, a large laundry area provides all the conveniences needed.

Other things to note
You'll be staying in the first energy community in Colombia. The entire apartment is powered by solar energy, embracing an environmentally-friendly approach through the use of renewable energy sources.

Registration number
198226
locationDescriptions/0/content:
The El Salvador neighborhood, located in Buenos Aires, Medellín, is a charming choice for tourists seeking an authentic experience of the local life in this vibrant Colombian city. El Salvador is a lively neighborhood, with its narrow and colorful streets brimming with the energy of the locals. It invites you to explore local markets, interact with neighbors, and immerse yourself in the everyday culture of Medellín.
From El Salvador, you can enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of the city and mountains, creating the perfect setting to capture photographs and appreciate the natural beauty of Medellín.
Being a traditional neighborhood, El Salvador offers a wide variety of services, including shops, restaurants, bakeries, hair salons, and several fresh markets with a full array of Colombia's exotic fruits and vegetables.
Don't miss the opportunity to savor the delicious local cuisine. Explore small restaurants and street food stalls to enjoy authentic Colombian dishes.
Although it is a neighborhood immersed in the city, El Salvador offers a unique connection with nature, providing the possibility to enjoy hikes on Cerro La Asomadera.
Moreover, this neighborhood is renowned for being the first energy community in Colombia, standing out as an icon of innovation in clean energy.
Welcome to this beautiful neighborhood, a place full of history and transformation!

htmlDescription/htmlText:
This studio is great and very close to Park Lleras and the great Provenza which has a great nightlife, attractions and restaurants. Located in El Poblado the trendiest area in Medellin. You’ll love this newly remodeled place which has an excellent view, cozy and quiet. You can hear a stream close by. You are close to all the fun, but not so close that you cannot sleep. My place is good for couples, small families, solo adventurers and business travelers. Security guard 24/7, covered parking.

The space
This studio apartment is very unique because it has a great view. It is very peaceful with a creek that you can listen to all day. Even though you are in the middle of the Poblado as you see in the PICS there is nature right in front of the apartment. Making this apartment quiet and relaxing all day and night. A brand new 46 inch TV was installed, pictures have not been updated.

Guest access
You can access the entire apartment and common areas.

Other things to note
- The apartment has a local telephone line to order deliveries if needed.
- The guard will gladly request Taxis for you.
- Apartment can be cleaned one time for stays of 4 to 7 nights (Coordination required).
- Apartment can be cleaned once per week if you are staying 7 nights or more (Coordination required).

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Escape the city to MONTE SANTA ELENA, a charming place at the top of the mountain just 35 minutes from the city. Its incredible view that combines the city and forest will take your breath away, and you will prepare the atmosphere for a magical night around the fire.

Alone or accompanied, this is the perfect place to disconnect from everyday life and connect with the power of nature.

A private and romantic space with catamaran-type mesh and fireplace. You'll feel like you're dreaming of waking up.

The space
The ALAMO cabin has a spacious living room with fireplace, double bed, 1 bathroom with hot water, kitchen with everything you need, a balcony with an amazing view of the mountain and the city, hammock and catamaran mesh. Outdoor shared garden area. A shared deck with an amazing view of the city. Private uncovered parking.

Guest access
The cabin is totally private, guests can access all the spaces of the cabin.

Other things to note
Ingredients for breakfast are included.
You can also add romantic or birthday decor for an additional COP $120,000, upon reservation.
You can also add yoga classes under reservation.

Registration number
146178
locationDescriptions/0/content:
Santa Elena is the most beautiful district of Medellín, a living monument to the flowers and traditions of the region. It is surrounded by spectacular forests and offers a bohemian and magical atmosphere of connection and recollection.

You can visit silletera farms, cafes and restaurants that offer both typical and international food. You can do walks in the forest, various activities of well-being and connection.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
The car park is open-air, free on-site.
The trip, being a rural area, can be done by car, either own or recommended by the host.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy an excellent stay in one of the most traditional and quiet neighborhoods in Medellin.

With a central location in the La Floresta neighborhood close to the most important sites of the city such as the Atanasio Girardot stadium, La carrera 70, La Comuna 13, the Laureles neighborhood, the center, Lleras park, El Poblado and the pueblito paisa.

From here you can get around very easily using the metro system, public buses, public bikes and cycle-rutas.

The space
Jacaranda is a space looking for you to be close to the best attractions in town while in a quiet spot.

Our space gives you the essentials for a quiet stay. We have a kitchen with the necessary elements to cook, a bathroom and shower, as well as a clothing area.

The master bedroom features a Queen bed for two people to sleep comfortably.

The room has a sofa bed that can be conditioned for another person to sleep.

This space is in the La Floresta neighborhood, its central location is ideal for getting to know the city.

Registration number
208355

Suitable in a central and quiet area of Laureles. It has two rooms, a bedroom separate from the kitchen area, illuminated, cool with balcony with a view, equipped kitchen. The decor is modern and elegant to create a cozy and relaxing atmosphere. The location is ideal for exploring the city on foot, two blocks from the 70s and with a wide variety of restaurants and clubs nearby but without the noise preventing a good rest.

The space
Amenities:
• Room:
Queen size bed 1.60x1.90 furnished and TV with Netflix and large wardrobe.
•Workspace
Bathroom with hot water. Towels and toiletries
• A fully-equipped kitchen with a bar
• Ropas area with washing machine
• Free WiFi
• balcony with very good views and gate

Guest access
Guests will have full access to the apartment, parking is in the street

Other things to note
Second floor with balcony gate for your safety . Leave it locked when you are away, a balcony in the living room for better ventilation and panoramic. Diagonal to San Joaquín Park and two streets from the church and two streets from Boulevard de la 70.

This amazing apartment is located in el Poblado, it is close and accesible to everything, without being in the thick of things. 30 minutes away from the airport and just 7 minutes away by uber to provenza and parque Lleras where best restaurants and bars are located. The building where it’s located has among its amenities, swimming pool, gym, meeting rooms, restaurant, and room service for breakfast. (optional)
Without a doubt one of the best places to stay in Medellin ;)

The space
Located at Urban building, this apartment is a unique place! Enjoy the spectacular weather of Medellin!!. Enjoy a beautiful private terrace with Jacuzzi, with a nice view. The apartment is close to El Tesoro shopping center and Amsterdam plaza, where you can walk. The property has 581 ft plus 678 ft of outdoor terrace to enjoy.

Guest access
The apartment has a private terrace with Jacuzzi exclusive to the apartment. In addition, the building has meeting rooms, swimming pool, equipped gym, and restaurant for breakfast.

Other things to note
On mondays the pool and the Jacuzzi from the building ( not the private one at the unit) , are closed for maintenance purposes except for holidays. When Monday is a holiday, the maintenance shifts to Tuesday

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Perfect apt for Couples, Small Families or Single person amongst friendly neighbors in Laureles the "Coolest Place in the World" according to TimeOut survey 2023.

2 Bedroom 1 & 1/2 bath walking distance to:
Starbucks Laureles
Cafes
Super Markets (Exito & D1)
Los Molinos & Unicentro Malls
Many Restaurants
Search "Segundo Parque de Laureles" for reference

Includes:
Cooking equipment
Washer/Dryer combo
High speed 300Mb internet
AC in both bedrooms

Cleaning service included in long stays!

The space
The apartment is located in a quiet street 5 minutes walking distance to D1 supermarket, as well as Exito Laureles and a super convenient local market on the same block. The apartment as well are centrally located 5 minutes walking to Primer and Segundo Parque Laureles near all restaurants.

The Apartment has all new furnishings and thoroughly cleaned! The apartment is perfect for 2 people, 2 couples or small family. The Apartment has 1 full bathroom and a 1/2 bath located in the front of the unit.

The apartment comes with everything you would need to live like cooking appliances, rice cooker, blender, coffee machine. dishes plates. The unit is equipped with a water heater so you will have hot water and fast reliable internet of 300mb speeds but does test higher.

Security camera is installed before the entrance of the apartment and the neighbors are very friendly and kind which will help the experience of your stay.

Guest access
The street entrance to the apartment has a gated lock and a code lock before entering the building for maximum security. Only yourself and residents are allowed in the building for your safety and the safety of the neighbors. The access code is change for every guest.

Other things to note
Trash comes on Mondays and Thursday's MORNINGS just leave your trash bag outside the nights before Sunday and Wednesday night so they can take the trash out in the mornings.

Registration number
156622
locationDescriptions/0/content: Probably the best feature other than the cozy apartment is the location. You can walk to any desired location gym, mall, market and restaurants. Night life is only a 5 min Uber away to La 70 and a 13 min ride away to El Poblado. Enjoy this private beautiful apartment centrally located in Medellin.

host/about:
Hi!

We're Mario and Cata. We're from Medellín and your Colombian hosts. We're both software engineers, but more importantly, we're a couple passionate about living life to the fullest! We loved Airbnb when we first used it on a trip through South America, and now we love to host, just as we would want to be hosted ;) 

Through AirBnB, we've found a whole new way to experience the joys and learnings of travelling from our own city of Medellín- we love meeting and learning from new friends, cultures, languages and stories!
 
More than your hosts, we offer you our friendship. We love to help out with a smile. Hey, we are from Medellín after all, that's what we are known for :)

We love Medellín and we love our beautiful properties, which we take so much pride in keeping in tip top shape! We really enjoy sharing them with you, so you can have the best experience in this wonderful city.
host/highlights/0: Where I went to school: National University of Colombia

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy one of the best views in El Poblado while staying next to El tesoro shopping mall and walking distance to night life in Provenza

The space
This is a 2-bedroom apartment with 2 double beds, a very cozy living room integrated to a fully updated kitchen. There is a very comfy desk for those working from Medellin.

Guest access
24h doorman for your convenience so you can access Lobby and your private apartment.

Other things to note
A photo/copy of your passport will be required before arrival. You must present your original passport or Colombian ID during check-in. Copies, passwords, or other documents are not accepted.

Traveling with Children.
If traveling with a child, additional requirements may apply. Be sure to check the corresponding section for more details.

Other.
Guests are welcome to bring their visitors only to lobycommon area. Visitors Inside the apartments are not allowed for your own safety.

It is strictly prohibited to book accommodation for another person (third party). We hope these details provide all the necessary information for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

Welcome to your temporary home in Medellín!

locationDescriptions/0/content:
"El Poblado, best neighborhood to be pampered and Party" looney planet

The upper-class neighborhood is home to some of the city’s best malls (such as Santafé, El tesoro and Oviedo along the Golden Mile or Milla de Oro). For nightlife, this is among the city’s elite destinations, with an abundance of rooftop bars, clubs and best in town restaurants.

Our building is one block away from EL TESORO shopping mall. Across the street you can find a mini market and a convenient restaurant. You can walk 9 min to Provenza if you are looking for night life (1km).

htmlDescription/htmlText:
✔️Superhost Verified! Your stay will be in the best hands

Poblado 🏢 Loft, Medellin 🇨🇴

Excellent location near, restaurants, park the grape border, tourist spots, supermarkets and pharmacy✅

Perfect for tourists, executives, couples or friends 👨‍👧‍👧

Equipped with everything you need, linens, towels, cleaning products 🛏️

This loft offers :

🌐Fast Wi-Fi 500Mb
🍳 Fully-equiped kitchen.
He washing🧺 area
📍 Strategic location
📺 Netflix
🖥️ Desk

The space
This modern loft apartment is located in a central area of the city, close to supermarkets🛒, restaurants 🍽️ and just two blocks from the Mall La Frontera🛍️. Located on Avenida El Poblado, a main road with easy access to public transport🚌, you will be just 10 minutes from Parque Lleras and the Provence area, famous for its tourist environment and excellent gastronomy🍴. An ideal space to enjoy your stay! ✨

Guest access
We want to inform you that you will have full access to the property during your stay. Enjoy all areas and amenities including the spacious lobby, Laundry area at a good cost, private parking, and all kitchen and private bathroom amenities. Also, we have an ideal open bar to share while preparing your dinner. We hope you enjoy your time here! ✨

Other things to note
As you know, the area of El Poblado, is one of the most attractive sectors of Medellín, you will be in a place that will allow you to easily access all its entertainment of bars, discos and gastronomy, but with the tranquility and La Paz you are looking for to spend nights of calm and good sleep.

host/about: I'm an Administrator Engineer and mother of 3. We love to travel as a family and live abroad. During that experience, we explored several countries and discovered the charm of hosting us on Airbnb, which allowed us to immerse ourselves in the local culture.  Inspired by these experiences, we decided to undertake in the world of tourist apartments, designed with care to make you feel like in your home away from home. Make the most of your stay!
htmlDescription/htmlText:
We present you a spacious and cozy apartment located in one of the most touristic sectors of Medellín • 2 Queen beds • Air conditioning • Check-In Autónomo • Cozy living room • Lighted courtyard • Ideal for business trips, families and small groups of friends • Stable Internet 400Mbs • Washer and Dryer available • Fully equipped kitchen • 43'' Smart TV in each room • 200 mts of the 70, 750 mts from Estación Metro Estadio, 550 mts from Primer Parque de Laureles.

The space
YELLOW BIRD is located in the most downtown area of Medellin, in one of its best neighborhoods, Laureles. The building has 3 separate apartments with separate doors of the distinctive color of each place.

Discover the comfort and charm of our apartments in Laureles- Stadium! In our building you will find three modern apartments, each with its own front door and a distinctive color that makes them unique.

Recently renovated, our apartments are designed to offer you an authentic and welcoming experience. Every detail has been designed to provide you with the utmost comfort during your stay.

In the YELLOW BIRD, you can enjoy:

- Queen Matrimonialamas (160cm) with premium mattresses for a restful rest.
-Air Conditionados in each room, ensuring a cool atmosphere at all times.
- Ceiling fan in the living room, perfect for those warm days.
-High Speed Wi-Fi Internet (400 Mbps) to keep you connected at all times.
- Spacious and Illuminado Bathroom, designed for your convenience.
- Fully equipped kitchen with everything you need to prepare your meals.
- Microwave and Dos Puestos Electric Stove for added convenience
- Coffee makers in various options: French press, drip and Moka, to enjoy the best coffee experience.
- Oven for your favorite recipes.
- 43'' Smart TV in every room for you to enjoy your shows and movies
- Patio Ventilado where you can relax in the outdoors
- Desks in each room, equipped with multiple electrical connections for your devices.
- Hair dryer for your convenience
- Washer and Dryer shared with other guests to make your stay even more practical
You are welcome to make YELLOW BIRD your home during your visit to Medellin! Explore the vibrant culture of Laureles and enjoy the warmth of our apartments. Book now and have a home experience!

Guest access
Your arrival is self contained and no time restrictions or days of the week after the authorized check-in time (3:00 pm). Each guest is provided with a unique access code that will be active exclusively during their stay with us.

<<< ONLY REGISTERED GUESTS ALLOWED IN >>>

Minors are welcome, but prior registration is required and must be accompanied by their parents or responsible guardians who have the necessary documentation to verify it.

If you need an additional cleaning service, we can offer it to you upon request at a cost of $30 (rate in the year 2024)

Other things to note
We promote responsible and crime-free tourism.

WE ARE AGAINST SEX TOURISM AND CHILD EXPLOITATION. Failure to comply with this policy will be grounds for immediate termination of the stay.

We respect our smoking guests, but you are welcome to smoke outside our apartments. Doing it inside will generate a USD $500 fee

We also think about the rest of the other guests, so we don't allow parties. Doing so will generate a USD $500 fee

We know you love your pet, but the apartments are not conditioned to receive it. Bringing it will result in a fine of USD $800

Complimentary supplies have been provided to make the most of our place.

• Some cooking items: condiments, salt, coffee, decaffeinated coffee, tea, olive oil, cooking
• 1 dish sponge
• 1 paper towel
• 1 dish soap
• Trash bags: in kitchen trash and bathroom trash
• Shower soap and hand soap
• 2 roll of toilet paper in the bathroom

If you need more supplies during your stay, we recommend buying them.

DAMAGE:

Guest is liable for any damage caused to the property or items provided during the stay. Any repair or replacement of damaged items will be done through Airbnb. To avoid additional charges, it is requested to leave the accommodation in the same conditions it was found upon arrival.

Regarding the trash, you can leave it in the canecas that are enabled on the balcony of the property.

Enjoy your stay to the fullest.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
A sector with a variety of restaurants, markets, churches, shopping centers, universities and nightlife, but its main attraction is its flat topography ideal for walking, something difficult to find in a city as mountainous as Medellin.

While all the amenities around are its great strength, you can also find great transportation facilities to go anywhere else in Medellin. There is a short distance to the Stadium Metro station, a system that connects much of the city for a low cost. No matter the time and where you are in Medellin, you will have great availability of vehicles using apps such as Uber or taxis that will be willing to take you to our apartment as a safe place not only for visitors but also for those who work on these types of platforms and provide transportation services.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
This is the great highlight of our location. Being flat topography, lovers of walking cities can enjoy this area on foot. This does not imply that transportation in the area is poor, on the contrary, there is ease of rental of bicycles, with the largest route network in the city located in the sector. Public transportation is also very complete, from bus lines, taxis, and the Metro system at a short distance.

CAR PARK:

- The apartment does not have a parking space or this service included in the price of the stay.
- You could have additional costs to park depending on where you decide to park.
- Use of this service and the option selected by the guest is at your own risk. Since this service is not included in the apartment, we are not responsible for the care of vehicles.
- When looking for this service, we recommend comparing prices and location so that you decide on the option that best suits your preferences.
- We recommend never leaving valuables inside vehicles, regardless of where you decide to park. Never leave computers, money, documents, bags, etc. inside the vehicle when you leave it. It's best not to give criminal a chance.

Here are the parking alternatives you can find in the area:

* On 72nd Street, on the corner next to the apartment. (24 hours) During the day you are likely to meet a gentleman asking for any cooperation for the care of the vehicle. At night the vehicle would be unguarded.

* Public parking lots for payment. (Closing times). Several of these spaces can be found in the area. Here are some suggestions because of proximity:
- Parqueadero Mutiservicios San Juan: Carrera 70A #43 - 2. A 2-minute walk.
- Parqueadero Atanasio Girardot: (Hours 5am - 11pm) Carrera 73 #44A - 02. A 2-minute walk.
- Parqueadero Elberautos (70 Autos): Calle 43 #70A - 60- A 2-minute walk away.
- Parking La 73: Cra. 73 #45d - 17. A 4-minute walk.

It is important to clarify that we do not have any relationship with these parking lots, so we are not responsible for the service they provide. We indicate them as informative being the closest to the apartment.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Welcome to this spectacular accommodation in Medellín, nestled within a charming complex of only 9 exclusive studio apartments. Here, you'll find the perfect balance between tranquility and the vibrant heartbeat of the city.

Our property is strategically located in the heart of El Poblado, one of Medellín's most lively areas. Additionally, you'll be residing in a residential haven that offers a genuine oasis, surrounded by nature. Just a delightful 4-minute stroll away, you'll discover Provenza, a hub brimming with restaurants, bars, and trendy boutiques. You'll be at the epicenter of the action, all while enjoying the peace and serenity that our exclusive complex provides.

We invite you to savor a unique stay in our accommodation and explore all that this exciting city has to offer. We hope your experience in Medellín will be truly unforgettable!
locationDescriptions/1/content: We recommend exploring the area on foot; a car is not necessary, and Uber service is very affordable. If you arrive by car, there is complimentary parking available. The neighborhood is safe and conveniently located near restaurants, grocery stores, and bars.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
We are delighted to welcome you to your newly built apartment in CASA FIORA, our boutique house filled with LOCAL BRANDS for our guests to admire. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen and stay connected with high-speed WIFI. We are located within walking distance of the area's nightlife and delectable dining options. There is a new air conditioning system in your apartment perfect for Medellin's hot weather, as well as a spacious bathroom.

Ideal for business trips, families, and groups of friends.

The space
CASA FIORA is located on LAURELES' best street. In the building, you'll find 7 separate apartments, all designed by a renowned architect from Medellín. You'll enjoy apartment #3 with a private patio and a lovely hammock.

Everything in our lovely apartment was specifically curated and newly built, in it, you'll enjoy:

- Big Queen bed (160cms)
- NEW Air Conditioning / AC
- FAST WI-Fi
- Portable fan
- Bathroom
- Rain shower
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Air Fryer
- Microwave
- Living room
- Electric Stove
- Smart TV
- Private patio with sitting Hammock
- Big terrace (shared with other guests)
- Paid Minibar
- Paid Gym

Guest access
-Guests are required to complete online check-in before arrival.
-We have an auto check-in process available 24/7.

Other things to note
-We offer a VIP airport shuttle service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. (Reservations are required in advance.)
-Extra Cleaning Service: Available upon request for $12 USD.
-Laundry Service: Available for a fee and upon request.
-Concierge Service: For reservations, included according to the employees' schedule.
- Gym day ($15 USD per guest)

UNREGISTERED GUESTS ARE NOT ALLOWED ($150 fine)
NO SMOKING INSIDE ($100 fine)
NO PARTIES ($300 fine)
NO LOUD MUSIC DURING QUIET HOURS ($150 fine)
IF YOU ARE A COLOMBIAN RESIDENT, A 19% VAT WILL BE CHARGED UPON ARRIVAL.

*WE ARE AGAINST SEX TOURISM*

Registration number
168580

host/about:
Hi!

We're Mario and Cata. We're from Medellín and your Colombian hosts. We're both software engineers, but more importantly, we're a couple passionate about living life to the fullest! We loved Airbnb when we first used it on a trip through South America, and now we love to host, just as we would want to be hosted ;) 

Through AirBnB, we've found a whole new way to experience the joys and learnings of travelling from our own city of Medellín- we love meeting and learning from new friends, cultures, languages and stories!
 
More than your hosts, we offer you our friendship. We love to help out with a smile. Hey, we are from Medellín after all, that's what we are known for :)

We love Medellín and we love our beautiful properties, which we take so much pride in keeping in tip top shape! We really enjoy sharing them with you, so you can have the best experience in this wonderful city.
host/highlights/0: Where I went to school: National University of Colombia

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy the warmth of this quiet, central home. Located in one of Medellin's most traditional neighborhoods, the conquistadores neighborhood. Close to different tourist and commercial sites in the city such as Pueblito Paisa, Plaza Mayor, Parques del Río, Unicentro Shopping Center, Exhibition Palace, among others. It has excellent access roads and the best thing is that you can walk around.

The space
An apartment located in a 5 story building, with elevator and private entrance. The apartment is located on the 5th floor of the building and its height allows a beautiful green view of the city.

The apartment has a separate room with a bed and a desk, a bathroom, full kitchen, dining room with sofa bed, washing area and balcony.

Guest access
Private full apartment.

Other things to note
Conquistadores is a central, wooded area that houses the wide parks of the Medellín River and its riverside walks, green areas and restaurants. There are pedestrian bridges that cross the river into the center of Medellin, and close there are the Teatro Metropolitano José Gutiérrez Gómez and the sensory gardens of Pies Descalzos Park. The area also has tree-lined parks that connect elegant residential streets. Unicentro shopping center has modern shops, cinema and gym.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
The building is located in the central and traditional neighborhood of Medellín, called Conquistadores. It is close to Unicentro Mall, Parques del Rio, Plaza Mayor, Palacio de Exposiciones, Teatro Metropolitano, El Pueblito Paisa and Barrio Laureles.

This building is the perfect place to stay and visit the main tourist attractions of Medellin. It is a nice residential sector, walkable, close to shopping areas and parks. At the end of the year it is the ideal place to visit the famous Christmas lighting of Medellín located in Parques del Rio.

Conquistadores is a central, wooded area that houses the wide parks of the Medellín River and its riverside walks, green areas and restaurants. There are pedestrian bridges that cross the river into the center of Medellin, and close there are the Teatro Metropolitano José Gutiérrez Gómez and the sensory gardens of Pies Descalzos Park. The area also has tree-lined parks that connect elegant residential streets. Unicentro shopping center has modern shops, cinema and gym.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
It is an easily accessible place, central in Medellín, the metro exposition station is about a 20 minute walk, Encicla stations a 4 minute walk, it is very easy to request taxi and Uber service.

Distances:

River parks: 3 minutes walking

Unicentro Mall: 8 minutes walking

Plaza Mayor, metropolitan theater and smart building: a 10-minute walk.

Pueblito Paisa: 20 minutes walking.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Located in the middle of one of the most vibrant neighborhoods in Medellín, this comfortable apartment offers everything you need for a quiet stay in a place that will make you feel at home.

Industrial design, with a modern and welcoming image; warmth is found in the attention and affection put into every detail. Santamaria7474 welcomes modern travelers in search of well-being and convenience with a relaxed and easy going atmosphere.

The space
Modern Unit with brand new linens and appliances. The entire unit is open, with no door between the room and the living room as you can see in the pictures. Laundry room located in the sixth floor, washer and dryer available with no extra charge for the guests. The unit doesn´t have a balcony because is located in the back of the building.

Modern and totally new apartment. It is an open unit and there are no doors between the room and the social space as can be seen in the photographs. The laundry room is located on the sixth floor of the building. Washer and dryer are available to guests at no additional charge. The apartment has no balcony, since it is located in the back of the building.

Guest access
The guests will have access to the entire apartment and laundry room located in the sixth floor.

Other things to note
Dear Guest, We would like to remind you that it is forbidden to host parties, reunions or make loud noise which might disturb the neighbors. It is also prohibited to enter with unregistered guests. Any violation of these rules will cause immediate removal from the apartment and the loss of all monies paid. We seek to protect your security and that of the neighbors. Laundry room is located in the sixth floor, do not leave your clothes unattended, we are not responsible for missing items. For the safety of our guests, the building has securty cameras installed in comun areas. Thank you!

Dear Huespedes, Let us remind you that in our apartment you do not allow parties, meetings, noise that disturbs the neighbors or the entrance of companions not authorized by the company. Any violation of these rules will cause removal from the apartment and the loss of all money paid by the guest. These gifts exist to preserve more than all your safety and the safety of your neighbors. Laundry machines are located on the sixth floor of the building, this service has no cost for guests. Please don't leave your belongings unattended. We are not responsible for loss or robbery. We inform you that for the safety and tranquility of our guests, the building has surveillance cameras in the common areas. Thank you!

locationDescriptions/0/content:
An ideal neighborhood for families. Easy to walk around, and has everything you need within reach. Laureles is one of the most recognized neighborhoods in Medellín, with a great quality of life that has been maintained for decades thanks to its planned development and the balance between natural spaces (abundant parks and trees), and the opportunity of experiencing the best of Medellin’s authenticity.

The history of Laureles begins around 1940, thanks to Pedro Nel Ospina, who designed the layout of the neighborhood with circular streets around the nascent Pontifical Bolivarian University, which, for a long time, was the main axis of the sector. It was conceived under the “Garden City” model; a housing concept designed to favor the raising of children, in which trees, green areas and circular streets allow the integration of the community.

The Laureles neighborhood is located in the central western area of Medellín, within commune 11, Laureles-Stadium. The architectural landscape maintains a residential and exclusive air, typical of garden cities. Currently, a new commercial attraction has emerged that highlights the sector as a trendier and more modern area where restaurants, hotels, clothing boutiques and art galleries have great prominence. It has 3 spaces of green areas ideal for family recreation, among these the First Park of Laureles and the Second Park of Laureles stand out. The sector as a whole promotes environmentally friendly mobility, for this reason it is considered the best area of Medellín for bicycling and walking.

There are shopping centers (UniCentro and Viva Laureles), several supermarkets (Carulla, El Éxito, D1, Euro, Plaza Mercado de la America), fast food chains, luxury restaurants, gyms, cafes, banks, clubs and bars. All within less than a 10 minutes walk from the property.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
1. There is a taxi station on the park next to the building, right across the street.
2. Mobility Apps: UBER, Didi, EasyTaxi
3. Metro stations LAURELES (900 mts away), and ESTADIO (1 km away).
4. Parking spaces available inside the property (might be subjected to an extra fee). There are also paid parking spaces outside the building, and an enclosed parking lot one block away.
5. Easy and convenient access to bus stops on Avenida Nutibara that can connect you to every place in town.
6. The neighborhood (Laureles) is friendly and secure, easily discoverable on foot, everything is within walking distance.
7. The International Airport (MDE) is located 1 hour away by the Tunnel de Oriente.
8. Both North and South ground transportation terminals are located around 25 mins away from the property.
9. The city offers EnCicla, a public bicycle renting program.

description: • Amazing Location. El Poblado. The best area in Medellin. Steps to great restaurants, cafes, 24/7 supermarket• Private hot tub in your Loft + Hot Tubs in common areas• A/C• High speed 300 Mb WiFi  (router inside your Loft)• Modern, independent, fully furnished Loft in a building with other private Lofts• On site 24/7 staff• Extremely safe neighborhood • 43" Smart TV with Smart Apps• Equipped kitchen• Strictly cleaned• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxesThe space- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. htmlDescription/htmlText:
• Amazing Location. El Poblado. The best area in Medellin. Steps to great restaurants, cafes, 24/7 supermarket
• Private hot tub in your Loft + Hot Tubs in common areas
• A/C
• High speed 300 Mb WiFi (router inside your Loft)
• Modern, independent, fully furnished Loft in a building with other private Lofts
• On site 24/7 staff
• Extremely safe neighborhood
• 43" Smart TV with Smart Apps
• Equipped kitchen
• Strictly cleaned
• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxes

The space
- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. Forget about needing taxis/Uber for enjoying great food, cafes, or shopping.

- PERFECT HOME BASE FOR YOUR PLANS IN MEDELLIN: Enjoy the convenience of staying in a prime sector of El Poblado, where everything you need is within arm's reach. Besides, easily access popular attractions like "Lleras Park" and "Provenza" with just a 20-minute walk or a short 5-minute taxi/uber ride. Other tourist spots like "Comuna 13", "Laureles" and more are approximately a 20-minute cab ride away (Medellin is not that big, and easily accesible from a central place like ours).

- FULLY EQUIPPED LOFT IN BUILDING WITH OTHER LOFTS: You'll have great amenities for a great stay at a great price: The entire Loft (small apartment) is only for you: Private Hot Tub, Ultra fast internet & ethernet port, 43″ Smart TV, Queen bed (1.60 m wide), fully equipped kitchen, safe lock, etc. Our 24/7 staff is always ready to help and provide what you need

EASY CHECK-IN: Very convenient and seamless check-in process facilitated by our 24/7 staff. Simply bring your physical ID (passport or cedula). For the comfort and safety of all guests, kindly ensure your visitors also have their physical IDs readily available.

- VERY FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET: We are software engineers and we are obsessed with super fast and very reliable internet. Every Loft has its own router (AP) to guarantee the best WiFi signal possible, plus it has ethernet connection available. Geek note: we have 2 fast, independent internet service providers balanced and each one configured as a backup link of the other, that means it's very reliable and fast

- AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICES: There are not hidden fees or extra charges, the final price is the one you pay on Airbnb. We don't charge visitor fee, taxes, service or cleaning fee. You can have one visitor at a time, absolutely no under 18 years old

- FREE LAUNDRY SERVICE: On-site staff can wash and dry your clothes at no extra cost (tips are voluntary and go 100% to them). One load of laundry per night of your stay. Your clothes will be ready at the latest by the following day.

- SAFE LOCK, ROUTER WITH ETHERNET, CLOTHES IRON, HAIR DRYER, CLOTHING STORAGE: Those are among the most requested amenities from our guests, and you have them all. If you don't see them in your Loft, just reach out to our 24/7 staff. Thinks like clothing storage are provided upon request (not many use them and takes space from the loft). Also Iron and Hair dryer are provided upon request since Colombian Law doesn't allow tho leave them inside the rooms, because of the fire risk

Guest access
You are booking Loft (small apartment), exactly the one shown in the pictures. The Loft is in a building with 3 floors and with other Lofts. Your Loft is totally independent and equipped. Only you can access your Loft with your access card (given to you upon check-in)
You can also enjoy the common areas of the building: Hot tubs in the common area on the third floor and the living room on the common area on the first floor.

description:
Nestled in the hills overlooking Medellín this cabin offers luxury with panoramic city views. The cabin provides an amazing hot tub, relaxing hammocks in- and outside & a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast ingredients. Book your in-house massage which we offer at our premise! Culinary delights await at the on-site restaurant featuring a diverse menu with locally sourced ingredients from our own veggie garden! If your date is not available: please write us as we offer several similar cabins!The spaceWe eagerly await your arrival to Casa Colibri! Named house of the hummingbird to represent the sweetness you'll feel surrounded by the protected forest all around.
The medicine of the hummingbird reminds us of our innocence and joy!This modern & cozy tiny home is designed for your ultimate comfort and relaxation.Sit back, relax and leave all stress behind while indulging in a luxurious wellness experience at Skyline Eco-Living. Our goal is to make you feel as if you are on top of
the world. . . all while restoring the senses to nature in the potent forest medicine of Santa Elena.
Soothe your tensions with a glass of wine in the jacuzzi while taking advantage of the breathtaking city views.
Bask in the sun on the lounge net while enjoying the peaceful sounds of nature. Or cozy up with your loved ones while warming up with a hot chocolate for an intimate fireside chat.
You'll rest easy in the bedroom upstairs which has a large, comfy king size bed with large windows that peep into the forest surrounding the cabin. The lounge net that
extends over the loft is a great place to read a book while staying warm from the chilly weather.
Enjoy steaming hot showers in the tastefully tiled, modern walk-in shower. You'll be provided with high quality towels & linens during your stay.
The kitchen is stocked with all the basic essentials you need to have a morning coffee or chef up your own masterpiece for lunch or dinner.
Breakfast is included during your stay! And it's also worthy to note that our neighbor has a delicious eco restaurant next door, which is open from 10 am- 8 pm for your convenience!
We always do our best to take great care of the natural environment surrounding us! Which is why you'll have fresh, potable spring water to drink straight from the tap.
On sunny days, your private balcony is a great place to relax, enjoy an afternoon coffee, and soak in the expansive views of the city.
This is an amazing spot for digital nomads as there is high-speed wifi available for streaming and video calls.
You're sure to stay warm in the cool climate of the forest nights with the fireplace and an electric heater for the bedroom. There is private parking for your car or motorcycle on site. You DO NOT need a 4×4 to reach the cabin. Pack your bags and get ready to treat yourself to the ultimate wellness experience immersed in nature high above the city!Guest accessYou'll be in the privacy of your own cabin, private jacuzzi, private balcony and each cabin boasts its own unique views of the city. The best part is enjoying the peace, quiet and stillness of nature all around!
There is also a yoga deck and gardens for you to enjoy. As well as incredible nature trails right in the backyard of our community.
Our friendly staff is available on site for anything you need during your stay. Please don't hesitate to let us know how we can make your stay one to remember forever!Other things to noteThere's no doubt you'll enjoy your stay in the privacy of your very own eco-cabin romantically perched above the city. However, if you're looking for the ultimate wellness package, we've got you covered!Private Massage Therapy | Melt into deep relaxation while treating yourself to a rejuvenating massage surrounded by nature.Casa Eco Restaurant | Indulge in a delicious home-cooked meal at our neighbor, Maye, eco restaurant. Choose from a range of healthy dishes to nurture your body with love. Delivery to your cabin is available.Cultural Experiences | Immerse yourself and learn about the roots of Colombia's Antioquian culture with a guided, hands-on experience. Discover the beautiful history of silleteros, the indigenous people who established the cultural traditions ofSanta Elena and it's profound connection with the valley of Medellin. Or feed your coffee curiosity, and learn about the rich culture of coffee production in theAntioquia valley.Registration number113158

host/about: Rein is an experienced entrepreneur & vacation rental owner who knows exactly what it takes to provide extraordinary experiences. . .which makes him a top-notch host in various different countries around the world. Born in Holland, he's planted his roots in the beautiful country of Colombia after falling in love with the culture, people, and food. Upon meeting Rein, you'll encounter his friendly smile, humility, and desire to provide incredible experiences for his guests. In his free time, he loves to get lost in a great novel, travel the world, boogie to Salsa & Bachata, or enjoy a delicious meal at the foodie hotspots around town! You can rest assured you're in good company when staying in Rein's vacation homes.
host/highlights/1: Speaks Dutch, English, French, and Spanish
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Nestled in the hills overlooking Medellín this cabin offers luxury with panoramic city views. The cabin provides an amazing hot tub, relaxing hammocks in- and outside & a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast ingredients. Book your in-house massage which we offer at our premise! Culinary delights await at the on-site restaurant featuring a diverse menu with locally sourced ingredients from our own veggie garden! If your date is not available: please write us as we offer several similar cabins!

The space
We eagerly await your arrival to Casa Colibri! Named house of the hummingbird to represent the sweetness you'll feel surrounded by the protected forest all around.
The medicine of the hummingbird reminds us of our innocence and joy!

This modern & cozy tiny home is designed for your ultimate comfort and relaxation.Sit back, relax and leave all stress behind while indulging in a luxurious wellness experience at Skyline Eco-Living. Our goal is to make you feel as if you are on top of
the world. . . all while restoring the senses to nature in the potent forest medicine of Santa Elena.
Soothe your tensions with a glass of wine in the jacuzzi while taking advantage of the breathtaking city views.
Bask in the sun on the lounge net while enjoying the peaceful sounds of nature. Or cozy up with your loved ones while warming up with a hot chocolate for an intimate fireside chat.
You'll rest easy in the bedroom upstairs which has a large, comfy king size bed with large windows that peep into the forest surrounding the cabin. The lounge net that
extends over the loft is a great place to read a book while staying warm from the chilly weather.
Enjoy steaming hot showers in the tastefully tiled, modern walk-in shower. You'll be provided with high quality towels & linens during your stay.
The kitchen is stocked with all the basic essentials you need to have a morning coffee or chef up your own masterpiece for lunch or dinner.
Breakfast is included during your stay! And it's also worthy to note that our neighbor has a delicious eco restaurant next door, which is open from 10 am- 8 pm for your convenience!
We always do our best to take great care of the natural environment surrounding us! Which is why you'll have fresh, potable spring water to drink straight from the tap.
On sunny days, your private balcony is a great place to relax, enjoy an afternoon coffee, and soak in the expansive views of the city.
This is an amazing spot for digital nomads as there is high-speed wifi available for streaming and video calls.
You're sure to stay warm in the cool climate of the forest nights with the fireplace and an electric heater for the bedroom. There is private parking for your car or motorcycle on site. You DO NOT need a 4×4 to reach the cabin. Pack your bags and get ready to treat yourself to the ultimate wellness experience immersed in nature high above the city!

Guest access
You'll be in the privacy of your own cabin, private jacuzzi, private balcony and each cabin boasts its own unique views of the city. The best part is enjoying the peace, quiet and stillness of nature all around!

There is also a yoga deck and gardens for you to enjoy. As well as incredible nature trails right in the backyard of our community.

Our friendly staff is available on site for anything you need during your stay. Please don't hesitate to let us know how we can make your stay one to remember forever!

Other things to note
There's no doubt you'll enjoy your stay in the privacy of your very own eco-cabin romantically perched above the city. However, if you're looking for the ultimate wellness package, we've got you covered!

Private Massage Therapy | Melt into deep relaxation while treating yourself to a rejuvenating massage surrounded by nature.

Casa Eco Restaurant | Indulge in a delicious home-cooked meal at our neighbor, Maye, eco restaurant. Choose from a range of healthy dishes to nurture your body with love.
Delivery to your cabin is available.
Cultural Experiences | Immerse yourself and learn about the roots of Colombia's Antioquian culture with a guided, hands-on experience. Discover the beautiful history of silleteros, the indigenous people who established the cultural traditions of
Santa Elena and it's profound connection with the valley of Medellin. Or feed your coffee curiosity, and learn about the rich culture of coffee production in the
Antioquia valley.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Experience the exclusivity of our private eco-community conveniently tucked away on the mountaintop. 2 km up the mountain from the main road coming up from Medellin.
A quick 30 mins down to the city, 15 mins to downtown Santa Elena, and a quick jaunt over to Parque Arvi to enjoy the endless nature trails within the forest.

Medellin | 30 mins.
Parque Santa Elena | 15 mins.
Parque Arvi | 15 mins.
Restaurants | 15 mins.
Grocery Stores | 15 mins.

There are endless ways to explore the charming culture of Santa Elena. The main attraction of the town is Parque Arvi is a must visit! Especially if you love the outdoors. There are lots of trails to enjoy hikes or bicycle rides in the forest.

Santa Elena is full of delicious restaurants & family-owned cafes such as Sublime, Origen, Kakaw, Kumini Café Bistro, Bici Pizza, Guadalajara & more!

Visit the farmer's market on the weekends to discover unique crafts & foods made by local artisans of Santa Elena. On special occasions, you can enjoy weekend concerts
at the park.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
First off, we have a trusted taxi driver on staff for any transportation needs!

Car or motorcycle is the best way to get around. You DO NOT need 4-wheel drive. But it's worthy to note that the road leading up to the cabin is steep but it is newly paved.
