htmlDescription/htmlText:
902 Energy Living (70 m2), 9th floor, the most exclusive residential building in Colombia (Energy Living), with an amazing view to Medellin, positive aspects: apartment view, the best infinitive pool in the city, gym, jacuzzi, steam room, free parking, neighborhood (Parque Lleras 10 minutes walking). The front desk staff is available 24 hours for helping you with any request or problem, e.g.: Taxi, food, cleaning, WIFI problems, etc.. The apartment is fully equipped. Legal renting per day.

The space
+Apartment area, 70 m2.
+Less control and rules than a hotel for inviting friends or family to social areas or apartment.
+Amazing view to the valley / City from the apartment (9th floor, see pictures)
+The infinity pool and jacuzzi on the top (22nd floor) with a 360 view to the valley / City.
+Relaxing steam room and gym on the top (22nd Floor).
+The front desk staff is available 24 hours for helping you with any question, request or problem. (Spanish/English) e.g.: Taxi, food, cleaning, alcohol, etc.
+The most exclusive neighborhood (Parque Lleras 10 minutes walking) with easy access to the Jose Maria Cordoba airport (35 minutes by car).
+Legal renting per day. Only tree residential buildings in the city have a legal renting per day, one of them is the Energy Living Building.
+CCTV, Closed-circuit television in the building. It is a normative in Colombia in connection with the security of the guests and residentials.

Guest access
+Infinitive Pool and Jacuzzi on the top (22nd floor. available from 9 am to 9.30 pm.
+Gym on the top with an amazing view (22nd floor), available 24 hours.
+Steam room on the top, (22nd floor)
+The front desk staff is available 24 hours for helping you with any question, request or problem (Spanish/English).

Other things to note
You can ask for the keys in the lobby zone (reception team)

+Other shopping center: Viscaya (8 minutes walking), Oviedo (15 minutes by car)
+Parque Lleras and Parque el Poblado (10 minutes walking)
+Metro: 6am to 10 pm, to 15 minutes walking
+Mall for eating Argentina, Colombian, Cuba and Peru food (Interplaza), 2 minutes walking.
+Taxi, you can coordinate with the front desk staff.
+Reting car, you can coordinate with the front desk staff.
+Country Club (5 minutes walking) for playing tennis, basketball, soccer, running, etc.
+Medical services, avalible 24 hours. you can coordinate with the front desk staff.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Discover the ultimate modern studio experience!
Our stylish 50m² space boasts a balcony with nature views, perfect for savoring your morning coffee or unwinding with a glass of wine in the evening. Stay connected with our 300 MG stable wifi for working and enjoy your favorite shows on the smart TV. We have king size bed and washer.

24/7 Check in and security
Pool and Gym in the building

*Zero tolerance against sexual tourism.
*Please see our house rules.

The space
901 is a beautiful, modern 50m² studio is ready for you. 300 MG wifi speed, 1,5 bath, king size bed, washer, working space and full equipped kitchen will be the perfect getaway for a couple.

The building is located across from a tranquil park, away from traffic and the building itself is also quiet with many resident owners living in the building.

Located in close proximity to Park Lleras, Provenza, and an array of top-notch restaurants, our apartment puts you in the center of all the action. Blux is the best in El Poblado location, comfort and 24/7 check in.

Groceries are just 200 meters away at the Carulla grocery store when needed. Also there are more than 10 restaurants and all major ATMs located directly across the street at the Mall Interplaza.

Guest access
But that's not all—we offer exceptional amenities to enhance your stay. Take a dip in the POOL (Tuesdays to Sundays 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.) and soak up the sun on the poolside deck for a rejuvenating experience. Plus, you can maintain your fitness routine at our GYM, ensuring you stay active and energized.

Other things to note
-Your reservation includes a free ticket to the Modern Art Museum, request it to me in the chat.

Registration number
58940
locationDescriptions/0/content: Blux is located on Calle 12 and Transversal Inferior in El Poblado, which makes for easy airport access from Las Palmas and a central location walking distance or a minimum taxi ride ($2) to the best nightlife, restaurants and shopping that Medellin has to offer. Our clients come back again and again because they enjoy the convenience and comfort that the Blux location offers.

host/about:
Hello, we are happy to be able to welcome you to our apartment!
We are Gustavo and Laura, husbands 36 years ago and we have two beautiful daughters who live in Australia and Spain. We love dogs, which is why Milka and Milo are always with us.
We have met several wonderful places and people around the world, which motivates us to give our best so that your stay is full of nice moments and can remember them with immense affection.
Every corner of this place was designed and designed so that people who visit us feel a nice energy and the warmth of a Colombian family.
During your stay we are available all the time, even before your arrival to resolve concerns and have a pleasant experience and hopefully smoothly in Medellin, the city of eternal Spring.
htmlDescription/htmlText:
¡APARTMENT 311 AMAZING AND SUPER MODERN!

High speed WiFi - 50”TV - Modern computer - Hot water -Aire Conditioning.
The best location in El Poblado, near the turibus, Parque Lleras (ZONA ROSA), Provence, restaurants, bars and places to enjoy the best Colombian coffee, next to the best points of interest and tourism in the city, supermarkets, bus routes for all Medellin, and the Poblado del Metro station. Perfect for your tourism or business trip.

The space
Beautiful Loft fully furnished with 1 Queen bed for two people, 1 Sofa bed and 1 Nest bed for one person (with maximum capacity for 4 adults), has air conditioning, high speed WiFi (200Mbps).

The kitchen is fully equipped with coffee maker, fridge, microwave, crockery, cutlery, stove and more.
It has a 50-inch smart TV, a desk with a computer, a safe that can store a laptop, a dining table, and everything you need for a comfortable and perfect stay.
Private bath with hot water: we provide all basic items such as shampoo, soap, towels, etc.
We are always ready to serve you in any way we can.
You can access the general laundry service in the building (2 washing machines and 1 dryer)

Guest access
Make yourself at home by staying in this modern apartment. Private parking is available
The entrance to the building is 24 hours, there is a door with private security for your tranquility and elevator.
In the doorman, they give you the keys.
It is mandatory to present your passport or ID to be let in.

Other things to note
Brand new apartment, 100% private, very easy to access.
Smoking is not allowed indoors.
You can leave your bags in a doorman if you arrive before the check-in time.
No parties or events that bother neighbors.
In case of entering with a child under 18 years of age, you must be in the company of one of your parents, you must also have to prove it by ID. If the minor is entering the company of people other than his/her parents (regardless of other family members), they must be written, printed and authenticated by one of their parents, to leave it as a backup for our files.
Pet policy: Your pet (dog or cat) is welcome in the apartment, however you must keep in mind that at the time of CHECK-IN you must present the vaccine license per day, they must have a leash while you are with them in the common areas of the building, and for no reason can they leave them alone inside the apartment and you will be responsible for any damages they may cause.

Registration number
155567

locationDescriptions/0/content:
An ideal neighborhood for families. Easy to walk around, and has everything you need within reach. Laureles is one of the most recognized neighborhoods in Medellín, with a great quality of life that has been maintained for decades thanks to its planned development and the balance between natural spaces (abundant parks and trees), and the opportunity of experiencing the best of Medellin’s authenticity.

The history of Laureles begins around 1940, thanks to Pedro Nel Ospina, who designed the layout of the neighborhood with circular streets around the nascent Pontifical Bolivarian University, which, for a long time, was the main axis of the sector. It was conceived under the “Garden City” model; a housing concept designed to favor the raising of children, in which trees, green areas and circular streets allow the integration of the community.

The Laureles neighborhood is located in the central western area of Medellín, within commune 11, Laureles-Stadium. The architectural landscape maintains a residential and exclusive air, typical of garden cities. Currently, a new commercial attraction has emerged that highlights the sector as a trendier and more modern area where restaurants, hotels, clothing boutiques and art galleries have great prominence. It has 3 spaces of green areas ideal for family recreation, among these the First Park of Laureles and the Second Park of Laureles stand out. The sector as a whole promotes environmentally friendly mobility, for this reason it is considered the best area of Medellín for bicycling and walking.

There are shopping centers (UniCentro and Viva Laureles), several supermarkets (Carulla, El Éxito, D1, Euro, Plaza Mercado de la America), fast food chains, luxury restaurants, gyms, cafes, banks, clubs and bars. All within less than a 10 minutes walk from the property.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
1. There is a taxi station on the park next to the building, right across the street.
2. Mobility Apps: UBER, Didi, EasyTaxi
3. Metro stations LAURELES (900 mts away), and ESTADIO (1 km away).
4. Parking spaces available inside the property (might be subjected to an extra fee). There are also paid parking spaces outside the building, and an enclosed parking lot one block away.
5. Easy and convenient access to bus stops on Avenida Nutibara that can connect you to every place in town.
6. The neighborhood (Laureles) is friendly and secure, easily discoverable on foot, everything is within walking distance.
7. The International Airport (MDE) is located 1 hour away by the Tunnel de Oriente.
8. Both North and South ground transportation terminals are located around 25 mins away from the property.
9. The city offers EnCicla, a public bicycle renting program.

host/about:
Hi!

We're Mario and Cata. We're from Medellín and your Colombian hosts. We're both software engineers, but more importantly, we're a couple passionate about living life to the fullest! We loved Airbnb when we first used it on a trip through South America, and now we love to host, just as we would want to be hosted ;) 

Through AirBnB, we've found a whole new way to experience the joys and learnings of travelling from our own city of Medellín- we love meeting and learning from new friends, cultures, languages and stories!
 
More than your hosts, we offer you our friendship. We love to help out with a smile. Hey, we are from Medellín after all, that's what we are known for :)

We love Medellín and we love our beautiful properties, which we take so much pride in keeping in tip top shape! We really enjoy sharing them with you, so you can have the best experience in this wonderful city.

APARTALOFT from 60 m2 . air-conditioning!! with a modern decoration comfortable spaces, clean, quiet environment and fully equipped. Excellent location in the PROVENZA sector of El Poblado area.

APARTALOFT 60 mts2, WITH AIR CONDITIONING. Modern decor, comfortable spaces, clean, quiet and complete equipment. Excellent location in the exclusive sector of PROVENCE - El Poblado.

The space
The area is ideal for walking through its cool, country and tourist atmosphere. Just 300 meters away is Zona Rosa del Poblado with the best gourmet restaurants, bars and cafes in the city. 400 meters from Lleras Park. Easy access to the financial area and the main Shopping Centers Oviedo, SantaFé and Tesoro.
You have free CLEANING in the apartment 2 times during each month. Comfortable Queen Size bed bed. You can find towels, sheets and all the toilet and kitchen utensils in perfect condition and hygiene.

Guest access
The building has 24-hour surveillance, elevator and private parking.

Other things to note
Provence is an exclusive residential sector; nearby you will find all the access roads to the different places in the town.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Located in the heart of El Poblado, the neighborhood of Provence is a vibrant epicenter of nightlife in Medellin. With its cobblestone streets, colorful facades, and a cozy atmosphere, this neighborhood attracts both locals and tourists. Here, the night comes to life with a variety of bars, clubs and lounges that offer live music and a festive atmosphere.

During the day, Provence transforms into an ideal place to enjoy a diverse gastronomic offer, with restaurants ranging from traditional Colombian cuisine to international options. In addition, its proximity to shopping centers such as El Tesoro and Santa Fé gives visitors the possibility to enjoy a complete shopping experience, with local and international brands.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Big room with balcony in Poblado near Provenza. It is near to very nice restaurants and clubs but far enough to have a relaxing stay. It is a 20 min walk from the Poblado metro station and 10 min to Provenza

The space
The room is at the back of the house, the room has a big closet, desk and balcony and the bathroom is shared between two rooms but each room has direct access through their own personal door. The apartment is large and has 3 other rooms occupied by the owners, other guests and family members, there is also a medium and quiet dog.

Guest access
You will have access to the common areas such as the living room, balconies and kitchen.

During your stay
It’s a family apartment, people who lives here are from 17 years old-60 years old (all ages) always friendly open and happy to help

Other things to note
Poblado is a safe area with all you will need close by, you will have your own house key and there is not time restriction so you will have your own independent to go out and in at the time you want. We don't allow other visitors inside the house.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Located in the best area of ​​Medellin. This modern loft features, a queen size bed, a welcoming living room and a beautiful terrace. Ideal for business trips, families and small groups of friends who want to stay in a modern apartment with a great location. You will be walking distance to typical Colombian and international food restaurants, supermarkets, local art galleries, bars and cafes in the city.

The space
Modern building in the best neighborhood, Laureles-Medellín.

Guest access
Self check-in. Elevator available. 3rd floor.

Other things to note
Is a concept, decentralized hotel that brings together travelers from across the globe into a network of apartments – spread around the world – with staple quality, design, educational purpose and sustainability.

In order to access the building it is necessary to register with the following information:
- Names of each guest
- ID number of each guest (Passport#, Drivers License#, etc.)
- Estimated time of arrival

Check-in time: 3pm
Check-out time: 11am

No smoking.
No parties.
Visits are not allowed and the indicated capacity must not be exceeded.

Please note that pets are not allowed. If you are traveling with your pet, please expect additional charges.

For information and reservations for common areas, please contact us

host/about:
Welcome to EVERYPLACE: your premier provider of apartment rentals. We focus on providing our guests with the best experiences and services, ensuring that your stay is as enjoyable as possible.

Every one of our properties is located in the best neighborhoods, offering easy access to the city's best restaurants, shops, and attractions. Whether you're looking for a trendy apartment in the heart of the city or a peaceful retreat in a residential area, we have a property that is perfect for you.

As a property management company, we understand that your vacation time is precious, and we are dedicated to making your stay as enjoyable as possible. Our team is available to assist you with any needs or requests you may have.
All of our properties are equipped with all the amenities you need to feel right at home, including fully-equipped kitchens, comfortable bedding, and high-speed internet.

We're also constantly seeking the best Real Estate opportunities for your future investments. Explore our investment options with our Sales Team.

If you're looking for the best experience and service, EVERYPLACE has got you covered. Browse our properties and book your stay today. We look forward to welcoming you and ensuring that your travels are one you'll never forget.
host/highlights/1: Speaks English, Spanish, French, and Portuguese
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Welcome to our spacious apartment located near the Primer Parque of Laureles, one of the most exclusive areas of the city. With the Unicentro mall just a short walk away, and the Laureles Parks and La 70 street nearby, you'll have everything you need for a convenient and memorable stay.

The space
This beautiful apartment located in the most exclusive part of "Primer Parque" offers guests a cozy and comfortable stay. The apartment features :

- Three bedrooms
- Three bathrooms
- Individual Climate Control A/C in each bedroom.
- Smart TV in each bedroom
- Workspace with WIFI
- Washer
- Balcony with City View 11th Floor
- Barbeque Grill
- Hair Dryers
- Kitchen setup for cooking.
- Internationally Traveled Personality *Perro Rojo*

Conveniently situated within walking distance of Primer Parque, guests will find everything they may need such as pharmacies, restaurants, ATMs, and supermarkets. Also, the apartment is just a 5-minute walk from Segundo Laureles Parks and the bustling La 70 street which is renowned for its great restaurants, cafes, and shops.

Book your stay today and join us in creating unforgettable memories together. We can't wait to welcome you to a place where every little detail is handled with genuine care and attention.

the |EP| team

Guest access
The building offers 24/7 security, making it a safe and secure place for short or long stays.

What you'll find :
Enjoy the simplicity of this quiet and central accommodation, ideal for travelers who want to enjoy the city.
It has a roofed terrace which you can enjoy as a picnic area or rest area.

Location :
Excellent transportation service, you will be 2 blocks from the subway's forest station, taxi services, bus, bike path.
close to places like restaurants, bars, supermarkets, supermarkets, bakeries.

The space
A 9-story building, located 2 blocks from the forest station, the loft is located on a second floor with easy access by elevator or direct stairs.

Guest access
*Parking free of charge in front of the building under the responsibility of the client.
*If you do not have a means of transport, you will easily and quickly find transportation means such as taxis, buses, metro (Fiorita station), routing.
*If you decide to bring your bike or scooter you will have the bike path and a space in the apartment for you to have it safe.

Other things to note
You have many options to go out to eat and drink around you with easy access.
You'll find a variety of venues that ensure you find almost everything in the industry.

Other things to note

The only additional service offered is cleaning, but there are no amenities or food services of any kind.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Apartment in the middle of the El Poblado neighborhood; in an exclusive, quiet, clean, safe and noise-free area.

Close to Parque Lleras or Provenza, Mall "El Tesoro", Mall "Oviedo",
Mall "Santa Fé", Starbucks and Gym in Mall "Milla de Oro", cycle path (open on Sundays) in "Parque del Poblado", Pharmacy 1 minute walking, Supermarkets 3 minutes walking, money exchange office 3 minutes walking and much more very close.

We are from Parque Lleras, Provenza or Calle 10 where all the Poblado night clubs and restaurants are is about 12-14 minutes and 3 minutes by car with a transportation cost of approximately $1.50usd.
You can use in the city Apps. like Uber, Didi, In driver, or Beat.

The apartment is located in a house; has a private and independent entrance from the street, the door has buttons key - password, so you can enter by yourself anytime, and never cross paths with anybody.

Private parking lot in front of the apartment.

Locations its not in a commercial area which makes it quieter, safer, in an exclusive neighborhood of Poblado - Medellín and close to all the best.

description: Yes the viewpoint you see on the pictures is Private!Spoil yourself with a Unique getaway in our Mountain Glamping. Enjoy the breathtaking view from our Jacuzzi with hot water and see how Medellín lights up a night! The private viewpoint with the city and mountains in the back makes is an amazing spot for pictures. We thereby offer Massages On-Site to make your stay as Exclusive and Relaxing as possible. Why not treat yourself and book today?We can arrange transport for you!The space**********ABSOLUTE HIGHLIGHTS*********-- Quality Massage is available ON SITE. Come and enjoy this Unique and Exclusive experience in the Mountains of Medellín!-- Jacuzzi with Hot Water. Super Romantic and Relaxing!-- Private Viewpoint with breathtaking views on the city and mountains!-- Amazing city and mountain views from the Hammock!-- Private Transport Available with our trusted driverBreathtaking views on Medellín's mountains, the valley and the city. Especially the iconic night views will make your stay unique, you will see the city light up slowly while you're sipping on a nice glass of wine.The main features of this unique spot are the covered, outdoor hot tub, the comfortable hammock overlooking the city and the cozyness of the small cabin. Spoil yourself with a romantic and unforgettable stay!MASSAGE AVAILABLEWould you like to make your getaway complete with a relaxing massage at the cabin? We can arrange that for you! Just imagine yourself receiving a delicious massage right in the middle the Colombian Mountains!Our professional massage therapists will come to the cabin with their equipment to provide you with the best service possible. The Massage includes: Full Body massage, Music Therapy, Volcanic Stones  and Craniosacral Therapy.Our massage therapies are aimed to give you a relaxing and stress releiving experience.As massages on-site need more preparation and coordination with our therapists, we need at least a 24 hours notice in order to organize it for you. For example, you want to book for tomorrow, then we need to know today before 3PM if you'd like to receive the massage.The price for one person is 150.000 COP per massage. The price for two persons is 250.000 COP. For an additional 15.000 COP Per Person we can include Chocolate Therapy.The duration of the massage is 1 hour.Our hot tub has streaming hot water and as it's covered, you'll be able to enjoy it in any weather type. You can activate the bubbles, pour yourselves a glass of wine and enjoy a romantic evening while overlooking Medellín!The hammock gives you with an amazing view over the city of Medellín and its surrounding mountains. Don't hesitate to fill it up with blankets and pillows for extra comfort! The inside of the cabin is small and cozy. It is decorated with romantic lights and has everything you need for a relaxing stay. The kitchenette comes with a fridge, airfryer, coffee machine and electric grill. It provides you with the basics to prepare a nice meal and enjoy your stay in a very unique space in Medellín/Santa Elena. The bathroom is located inside the cabin, the shower has hot water.We also provide you with soap and towels so you can take a hot shower in our bathroom. Basics like toilet paper and hand soaps are also included!This cabin is located in a big gated community. You can of course explore the surrounding areas and explore the nature where this cabin is located, walk up to the common areas to take some more amazing pictures or to visit one of the nearby restaurants to drink some hot chocolate!Guest accessOur cabin is located in a big gated community. You will have your own remote control in case you'd like to leave the gated community and go for a walk to explore the surroundings.You can access the common areas shown in the pictures.Other things to noteYour safety and well-being is very important to us and we'd like to assure you have a comfortable and smooth stay with us! In this section we will specify the following:- General info- Included breakfast and other food options- Transport- Max. Check-in time------------------------------------GENERAL INFO--------------------------------------- As per the Colombian law, we will ask you some personal information for TRA and SIRE registration.- Check-in is from 3PM till 6PM. For security reasons, we cannot receive you after 6PM unfortunately.You can check-out till 12PM.-----------------------------BREAKFAST & FOOD OPTIONS ------------------------Your breakfast will be included while staying with us! We will leave you everything you need to prepare and serve your breakfast. We provide you with the following ingredients: Eggs, breakfast crackers, butter, coffee and sugar! If you'd like to add something to your breakfast or other meals, you're of course free to bring some extra ingredients yourself.As we're located in a rural area, delivery options are limited. However, there are two options many of our guests have used. These are: Restaurante Las Hortensias and Maye Restaurante.Many of our guests prefer to cook something for themselves, so they bring their own food and enjoy cooking on their own :-)--------------------------------------TRANSPORT-------------------------------------To better plan your trip, we'd hereby like to share with you the average travel time BY CAR from the most common locations.From the centre (El Centro) of Medellín to the cabin: Aprox 1 hour and 30 minutesFrom the airport in Rionegro to the cabin: Aprox. 1 hourPublic transport:The cabin cannot be reached by bus or any other method of public transportation. A bus would leave you at the main road and from there you would have to walk uphill to get to the cabin. A walk from aprox. 30 minutes.For that reason, we don't recommend you to go with public transport.Uber or similar:Unfortunately the experiences from our guests with Uber or similar platforms haven't been positive. As we're located in a rural area with partly unpaved roads, many guests have been left stranded in the middle of the road once the Uber driver saw the type of roads that were ahead of him/her. In case you don't have your own vehicle, we can help you organize transport. Please find more info below.Organize transport with us:We have a trusted driver that has taken many of our guests to the cabin without any problems. He can pick you up from the airport or in Medellín, whatever suits you best. You can also arrange stops at supermarkets in case you'd like to buy something before arriving at the cabin.Average cost for a one way trip from the airport or Medellín is 100.000 COP. The price depends on various factors, please don't hesitate to ask us for a fixed price. Just provide us your pick-up location and we can quote it for you.All prices are set by our driver, we don't take a commission or anything. We started working with a trusted driver as we saw the inconveniences guests had with Ubers. It's very important to us our guests arrive safe and effortless! We're doing this to help our guests and locals.-----------------------MAX. Check-in 6PM---------------------------------For your own well-being and safety, we cannot receive you after 6PM. As we're located in a rural area with very little street lighthing, it will become very difficult to recognize the reference points to get to our cabin. Some parts of the road are also unpaved and might make your trip more difficult at night. Reception is neither very good in the rural areas of Medellín/Santa Elena so it would be even harder for us to assist you in case you can't find the way.During the day we don't experience these inconveniences so we therefore kindly ask for your understanding regarding our check-in time!Registration number122682

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Yes the viewpoint you see on the pictures is Private!
Spoil yourself with a Unique getaway in our Mountain Glamping.
Enjoy the breathtaking view from our Jacuzzi with hot water and see how Medellín lights up a night!
The private viewpoint with the city and mountains in the back makes is an amazing spot for pictures. We thereby offer Massages On-Site to make your stay as Exclusive and Relaxing as possible. Why not treat yourself and book today?

We can arrange transport for you!

The space
**********ABSOLUTE HIGHLIGHTS*********
-- Quality Massage is available ON SITE. Come and enjoy this Unique and Exclusive experience in the Mountains of Medellín!
-- Jacuzzi with Hot Water. Super Romantic and Relaxing!
-- Private Viewpoint with breathtaking views on the city and mountains!
-- Amazing city and mountain views from the Hammock!
-- Private Transport Available with our trusted driver
Breathtaking views on Medellín's mountains, the valley and the city. Especially the iconic night views will make your stay unique, you will see the city light up slowly while you're sipping on a nice glass of wine.

The main features of this unique spot are the covered, outdoor hot tub, the comfortable hammock overlooking the city and the cozyness of the small cabin. Spoil yourself with a romantic and unforgettable stay!

MASSAGE AVAILABLE
Would you like to make your getaway complete with a relaxing massage at the cabin? We can arrange that for you! Just imagine yourself receiving a delicious massage right in the middle the Colombian Mountains!
Our professional massage therapists will come to the cabin with their equipment to provide you with the best service possible. The Massage includes: Full Body massage, Music Therapy, Volcanic Stones and Craniosacral Therapy.

Our massage therapies are aimed to give you a relaxing and stress releiving experience.
As massages on-site need more preparation and coordination with our therapists, we need at least a 24 hours notice in order to organize it for you. For example, you want to book for tomorrow, then we need to know today before 3PM if you'd like to receive the massage.
The price for one person is 150.000 COP per massage. The price for two persons is 250.000 COP. For an additional 15.000 COP Per Person we can include Chocolate Therapy.
The duration of the massage is 1 hour.

Our hot tub has streaming hot water and as it's covered, you'll be able to enjoy it in any weather type. You can activate the bubbles, pour yourselves a glass of wine and enjoy a romantic evening while overlooking Medellín!

The hammock gives you with an amazing view over the city of Medellín and its surrounding mountains. Don't hesitate to fill it up with blankets and pillows for extra comfort!

The inside of the cabin is small and cozy. It is decorated with romantic lights and has everything you need for a relaxing stay. The kitchenette comes with a fridge, airfryer, coffee machine and electric grill. It provides you with the basics to prepare a nice meal and enjoy your stay in a very unique space in Medellín/Santa Elena. The bathroom is located inside the cabin, the shower has hot water.

We also provide you with soap and towels so you can take a hot shower in our bathroom. Basics like toilet paper and hand soaps are also included!

This cabin is located in a big gated community. You can of course explore the surrounding areas and explore the nature where this cabin is located, walk up to the common areas to take some more amazing pictures or to visit one of the nearby restaurants to drink some hot chocolate!

Guest access
Our cabin is located in a big gated community. You will have your own remote control in case you'd like to leave the gated community and go for a walk to explore the surroundings.
You can access the common areas shown in the pictures.

Other things to note
Your safety and well-being is very important to us and we'd like to assure you have a comfortable and smooth stay with us! In this section we will specify the following:
- General info
- Included breakfast and other food options
- Transport
- Max. Check-in time


------------------------------------GENERAL INFO--------------------------------------
- As per the Colombian law, we will ask you some personal information for TRA and SIRE registration.
- Check-in is from 3PM till 6PM. For security reasons, we cannot receive you after 6PM unfortunately.
You can check-out till 12PM.

-----------------------------BREAKFAST & FOOD OPTIONS ------------------------
Your breakfast will be included while staying with us! We will leave you everything you need to prepare and serve your breakfast. We provide you with the following ingredients: Eggs, breakfast crackers, butter, coffee and sugar! If you'd like to add something to your breakfast or other meals, you're of course free to bring some extra ingredients yourself.

As we're located in a rural area, delivery options are limited. However, there are two options many of our guests have used. These are: Restaurante Las Hortensias and Maye Restaurante.

Many of our guests prefer to cook something for themselves, so they bring their own food and enjoy cooking on their own :-)

--------------------------------------TRANSPORT-------------------------------------
To better plan your trip, we'd hereby like to share with you the average travel time BY CAR from the most common locations.
From the centre (El Centro) of Medellín to the cabin: Aprox 1 hour and 30 minutes
From the airport in Rionegro to the cabin: Aprox. 1 hour

Public transport:
The cabin cannot be reached by bus or any other method of public transportation. A bus would leave you at the main road and from there you would have to walk uphill to get to the cabin. A walk from aprox. 30 minutes.
For that reason, we don't recommend you to go with public transport.

Uber or similar:
Unfortunately the experiences from our guests with Uber or similar platforms haven't been positive. As we're located in a rural area with partly unpaved roads, many guests have been left stranded in the middle of the road once the Uber driver saw the type of roads that were ahead of him/her. In case you don't have your own vehicle, we can help you organize transport. Please find more info below.

Organize transport with us:
We have a trusted driver that has taken many of our guests to the cabin without any problems. He can pick you up from the airport or in Medellín, whatever suits you best. You can also arrange stops at supermarkets in case you'd like to buy something before arriving at the cabin.
Average cost for a one way trip from the airport or Medellín is 100.000 COP. The price depends on various factors, please don't hesitate to ask us for a fixed price. Just provide us your pick-up location and we can quote it for you.
All prices are set by our driver, we don't take a commission or anything. We started working with a trusted driver as we saw the inconveniences guests had with Ubers. It's very important to us our guests arrive safe and effortless! We're doing this to help our guests and locals.


-----------------------MAX. Check-in 6PM---------------------------------
For your own well-being and safety, we cannot receive you after 6PM. As we're located in a rural area with very little street lighthing, it will become very difficult to recognize the reference points to get to our cabin. Some parts of the road are also unpaved and might make your trip more difficult at night. Reception is neither very good in the rural areas of Medellín/Santa Elena so it would be even harder for us to assist you in case you can't find the way.
During the day we don't experience these inconveniences so we therefore kindly ask for your understanding regarding our check-in time!

Registration number
122682

locationDescriptions/0/content:
The district of Santa Elena, is the place where the silleteros who year after year give life to the Fair of Flowers. Santa Elena, Medellín district, is the first example of the culture and climate of the East. Temperate weather in the day and cold at night. Temperature min-max 11- 23ºC Average temperature 17ºC. Height 2,550metrossnm.
Santa Elena is one of the gates to the beautiful high plateau east of the apartment that includes villages such as Guarne, Rionegro, Marinilla, El Retiro, el Carmen de Viboral, la Ceja, Sonsón, and Santuario.
La Vereda Media Luna, is a safe and quiet neighborhood, its people are friendly and hospitable, it is an excellent location to connect with nature a few steps away in native forest.
By vehicle you are: 35 minutes from the José María Córdoba Airport, 40 minutes from the city of Medellín.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
You can arrive easily at our glamping without paying tolls. Follow the road to Santa Elena that goes through the neigborhood Buenos Aires.
We are located in the vereda called Media Luna. The location we share with you will take you to a gate, from where you can continue the road to the glamping. Someone will be waiting for you to do the check-in with you or, if agreed upon differently, you will be handed over the control from the gate and you can check-in yourself. It's very important you use GoogIe Maps, other Map service providers will send you the wrong way.
1. After the restaurant called Las Hortensias, you will have to enter the rails on the left side of the road after the second curve.
2. There you will see a sign that says VILLA ALEGRIA. The rails are no the left side. Follow the road and you will arrive to a gate. We will be there to receive you (if not agreed upon otherwise). IMPORTANT: Please don't forget to contact us 1 hour before you arrive so we can be attentive and do the check-in with you.

host/about:
Hi!

We're Mario and Cata. We're from Medellín and your Colombian hosts. We're both software engineers, but more importantly, we're a couple passionate about living life to the fullest! We loved Airbnb when we first used it on a trip through South America, and now we love to host, just as we would want to be hosted ;) 

Through AirBnB, we've found a whole new way to experience the joys and learnings of travelling from our own city of Medellín- we love meeting and learning from new friends, cultures, languages and stories!
 
More than your hosts, we offer you our friendship. We love to help out with a smile. Hey, we are from Medellín after all, that's what we are known for :)

We love Medellín and we love our beautiful properties, which we take so much pride in keeping in tip top shape! We really enjoy sharing them with you, so you can have the best experience in this wonderful city.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Immerse yourself in a unique experience in this dream retreat located very close to Medellin. Our cottage combines the modernity of glass with the rustic charm of nature, offering all the comforts for an unforgettable getaway.

The space
Come and live a unique glamping experience in Santa Elena, where comfort, luxury, and nature combine to create unforgettable memories.

Cabana features:

Innovative Design: Enjoy a stay surrounded by glass, allowing for a unique connection with the surrounding natural environment.

Exclusive Amenities: Relax on a comfortable double bed and immerse yourself in the private jacuzzi for a luxurious experience.

Catamaran mesh: Live the sleep experience suspended in the air, floating gently between the trees on our catamaran mesh.

Parqueadero Privado: It has a private parking space for your comfort and safety.

Fully Equipped Kitchen: Prepare your favorite dishes in the fully equipped kitchen, with all the necessary utensils for a satisfying culinary experience.

BBQ area: Enjoy delicious outdoor barbecues in our BBQ area, perfect for sharing special moments with your loved ones.

Private Mini Forest: Connect with nature and explore our private mini forest, where you can relax and enjoy the serenity of the surroundings.

Guest access
Our guests will have full access to the entire property, allowing them to enjoy each of the amenities we offer. They can relax in the green areas, enjoy a barbecue in the BBQ area, immerse yourself in the jacuzzi, and spend cozy nights by the fireplace or the campfire. The whole house will be at your disposal, ensuring a complete and private experience.

Make yourself at home and make the most of all the facilities and charms of our place! 🌟🏡

Other things to note
Activities and Services in the Area

We are pleased to share with our guests that the area offers a variety of activities and amenities to enjoy. They will be able to find:

Cabalgatas: Explore the beautiful landscapes on horseback, a unique and memorable experience. 🐎

Cuatrimotos rides: If you are looking for a dose of adrenaline, quad rides are the perfect option. 🏍️

Restaurants: Enjoy the delicious local cuisine at the various restaurants nearby. 🍽️

Minimercado: For your convenience, there is a mini market very close for any basic need. 🛒

We are happy to provide you with all the necessary information about these places and activities, so you can make the most of your stay and enjoy everything the area has to offer. We look forward to seeing you! 🌟😊

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Neighborhood Description

Our accommodation is located in the charming vereda El Plan, in Santa Elena. This area is known for its tranquility and natural beauty, offering a perfect environment to disconnect and relax.

Easy Access: The lane is easily accessible, with all the roads paved, ensuring a comfortable and hassle-free trip.

Local amenities: Within walking distance you will find mini markets and restaurants, facilitating your shopping and allowing you to enjoy the local cuisine.

Proximity to Santa Elena Park: The beautiful Santa Elena Park is only 10 minutes away by car, ideal for walks, picnics and enjoying nature.

Come and discover the serenity of St. Helena in a neighborhood that offers you the best of both worlds: the peace of the countryside and the convenience of nearby services. We look forward to seeing you! 🌿🏞️
locationDescriptions/1/content:
How to get to Santa Elena from Medellín

By Vehicle Particular:

Depart from Medellin: From downtown Medellin, take Avenida Oriental to the north.

Tour to Santa Elena: Follow the signs to the exit of Medellín on the North Highway. Then take the via Las Palmas.

Carretera a Santa Elena: At kilometer 5, take the detour on the left towards the road to Santa Elena. This road is paved and well signposted.

Arrival in Santa Elena: Follow this road until you reach Santa Elena. The ride takes approximately 35-45 minutes depending on the traffic.

By Uber:

We recommend Uber: Due to great access and convenience, we also recommend using Uber to get to Santa Elena.

Easy & Comfortable: Simply enter "Santa Elena" as your destination and enjoy a comfortable and direct trip.

Trip duration: Uber ride takes approximately 35-45 minutes depending on the traffic.

In Public Transport:

Transport Terminal: Head to the Northern Transport Terminal in Medellin.

Bus to Santa Elena: Take a bus that goes straight to Santa Elena. Bus routes are clearly signposted and services are frequent.

Trip Duration: The bus ride takes approximately 45-60 minutes, depending on the traffic and the stops on the way.

Metro and Bus Alternative:

Subway: Take the subway to the Universidad metro station.

Transfer to Bus: Exit the station and take a bus from the Santa Elena route at the nearby stop.

Trip Duration: This tour also takes approximately 45-60 minutes in total.

Additional Notes:

The buses to Santa Elena are comfortable and the route offers panoramic views of the landscape.

In both modes of transportation, you will enjoy a picturesque tour through mountains and forests.

We hope you enjoy your trip to Santa Elena! 🌲🚗🚌

htmlDescription/htmlText:
This apartment has a strategic location; It is a 5-minute walk from the Atanasio Girardot sports complex (City Stadium) and the famous Carrera 70, less than 3 minutes away you will find supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacies, churches, galleries and areas suitable for work. It is a totally new accommodation, built in 2022 and designed with the comfort of the people who visit us in mind. It is easily accessible by subway, public transport and cycle routes.

The space
Nice, comfortable and integrated apartment, located on a 7th level which can be reached by elevator, it has two bedrooms with a double bed and SmartTV with direct access to the "DirecTV GO" Streaming service in one of them, a kitchen with a large window equipped with basic utensils, a bathroom with a shower and hot water, a living room with a sofa-bed, a breakfast bar, a main security door, a work area located in the main room and a balcony with a spectacular view that provides a lot of lighting and ventilation. In addition, the internet service can be obtained not only through Wi-Fi but also through an Ethernet network cable.

Guest access
Just 3 blocks away from the "Estadio" subway station.
Access to different bus routes from the main entrance of the place.
Just one step away from the bike path and one block from the city's public bicycles.

Other things to note
It is an industrial building, in metal structure, modern and avant-garde. With surveillance service and security cameras 24/7.

locationDescriptions/0/content: Florida Nueva is an exclusive and central neighborhood of the city of Medellin, with a great gastronomic, commercial, and entertainment offer. Its proximity to the Atanasio Girardot sports center makes it one of the most desired neighborhoods by the citizens. Within this is the Carrera 70, one of the most visited in the city for its variety of restaurants and bars, San Juan Avenue, which is one of the oldest avenues full of history in Medellín, the beautiful and quiet parish "Nuestra Señora de Lourdes" among many other places to share with the family and spend a pleasant afternoon eating delicious cakes, empanadas and buñuelos.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Moving around the neighborhood is very easy, you can do it as you like, walking through its pedestrian streets, by bicycle thanks to the bike paths designed for it, by public transport such as buses or subways, which always pass through the area, or by private transport.
The accommodation is located just 3 blocks from the "Estadio" subway station, it has access to different bus routes from the main entrance, it is just one step away from the bike path and one block from the city's public bicycles.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Cozy studio with great natural lighthing for a relaxing stay in Medellín!
Our centrally located studio in Laureles/Estadio is the ideal place to explore Medellín from, it's only a 5min walk to the metro (Cable cars) !

Arriving early? We can store your luggage for free!

Enjoy high speed Wi-Fi, big windows with a deep window sill designed for relaxing and all the essentials for a pleasant stay: fully equipped kitchen, unlimited hot water, free washer/dryer and proximity to Medellín's hot spots

The space
Your own cozy Studio with easy and secure self-checkin. You will have the Metro station Estadio, great restaurants and supermarkets within walking distance in this green neighborhood.
You will enjoy the benefits of high speed Wi-Fi (Up to 250Mbps), great natural lighting and a well accommodated windown sill where you can relax whenever you need a break! The studio is located on the second floor of a 3 storey building with 10 units. All units are focussed on providing the best for digital nomads, professionals and serious travellers. If you're looking for parties and late night music on the property, this place is not suited for you.

This rectangular shaped studio is recently renovated to have an open but minimalistic look with big windows that provide amazing natural lighting. Because of its shape, the kitchen blends in directly with the living/sleeping area, creating an open atmosphere.

Kitchen
* Provided with all the appliances to let your inner chef come out. 92L fridge with freezer, blender, coffee machine, electrical stove and all the necessary supplies to prepare and serve food.
* Open kitchen design so it's easy to chat and prepare some food at the same time. Food coming up? Just take a step to your right and serve it on the bar table.

The living and sleeping area is merged together, however both have their dedicated spots for you to enjoy.

Living area
* NEW FEATURE: We turned the deep window sill into a relax spot. Ideal to read a book, catch some sunlight or to look at the green trees in front.
* Turn the Smart TV towards the bar table and stream your favorite show while enjoying your recently prepared meal!

Sleeping area
* Comfortable double bed (140x190CM) with upholstered headboard and double-sided mattress. Mattress has a soft and firm side, so you can it adjust it to your sleeping needs. You will have sufficient pillows and warm blankets to sleep with.
* 32'' Smart TV. You can stream your own favorite shows/movies or listen to some music while laying in bed. The wall mount is adjustable and can be pulled towards the bed and brought closer for a better experience.
* 3-level open design closet for you to store your luggage and clothes. You will have cloth hangers.
* Well illuminated full body mirror

Bathroom
* The bathroom has unlimited hot water with good pressure and soap provided by us.
* Toilet paper, fresh towels, a shower mat and hand soap will be there upon your arrival.
* Well illuminated floating mirror for your morning routine.

Highlights
* High speed Wi-Fi, up to 250Mbps, in every corner of the studio.
* 2 big shared balconies, ideal for a morning coffee and chatting with fellow digital nomads/travellers. The top balcony has a 180-degree view on the trees and mountains.
* 2 washers and 2 dryers that you can use for free
* Safe check-in with a personal code for every guest

Guest access
- Guests have 24 hours access to the building
- Unregistered visitors are not allowed on the property (please red house rules for more info)
- Full access to laundry rooms
- Access to the 2 big balconies located on the 2nd and 3rd floor to enjoy Medellín's scenic views

------------------Luggage Storage-------------------
We use lockers for our Luggage Storage. These lockers are located in the hallway of our building. You can use these storage lockers for free. They can only be used on your check-in or check-out day.

In order to make it accessible and secure for all our guests, we do have some policies in place that must be followed. You can find the summarized version below, the full version can be found in the house rules section of our listing
Please read them carefully, to avoid any confusion:
- Our luggage storage is subject to availability
- As we use storage lockers, you have to bring your OWN padlock or similar. We do not provide them. This is for your own safety
- Our storage lockers have the following dimensions: Height 65CM x Width 30CM x Depth 35CM. Unfortunately, we cannot store luggage that exceed these dimensions.
- We give you access to the building ONLY to store your luggage. You CANNOT hang around in the common areas, waiting for your check-in. We are happy to provide you with nearby lunch/breakfast or coffee spots. Thank you for understanding
- The access code we give you to store your luggage is valid for only one hour. You will receive a different access code for your check-in and rest of your stay
- We are not responsible for anything that may happen to your luggage and its contents.

Thank you so much for understanding and we're very happy to help you out with all your travels needs before, after or during your stay!
Reminder: Please make sure to read our full Luggage Storage Policy in the section House Rules of this listing to avoid misunderstandings

Other things to note
As we're three hosts and our goal is to provide you the best service and experience possible, we manage ALL our communication through Airbnb. Thank you for understanding!

- GUEST REGISTRATION - According to Colombian law, we need to ask all of our guests for some personal information. Please see our house rules for detailed info about what we need from you. To see our house rules: scroll down in our listing until you see the header ''Things to know'' and select ''House rules''

- VISITORS are allowed according to our house rules. Please see our house rules for our visitors policy

- No parties or events in accordance with Airbnb guidelines.
- No smoking or any type or drug use in any part of the building
- Sex tourism, drugs and parties are not allowed.
- You will have a keyless stay
- You can park your vehicle at a 24Hrs parking garage only 2 blocks away from the apartment.
- TV has national channels only. We do not include streaming services, you can however login to your own account without a problem. All TV's are connected to the internet.

Registration number

locationDescriptions/1/content:
All major transportation options such as train ("metro"), bus routes, taxi and uber routes are very easy to use in the area.
The apartment is two blocks away from the subway station ''Estadio''. You can also find a collection of Taxis two blocks away.
The apartment is in the Laureles area - Stadium, an area that is characterized by being a flat neighborhood, so you can walk very easily to nearby shops and places.

Step into our chic studio located in the heart of Medellín's lively Provenza neighborhood.

Whether you're looking to dance the night away or indulge in delicious cuisine, Provenza offers a variety of options to suit every taste.

Book with us to enjoy:
●Guest concierge
●Family & friends allowed
●Fiber Optic Ultra-Fast WiFi
●Loaded Kitchen
●Smart TV
●24/7 Security Guard

We are located on the Culinary Strip of Provenza!

Surrounded by Restaurants like Dos Santos, Panka and Sambombi

The space
Provenza is a Walker's Paradise!

With a flawless walk score of 100, you can effortlessy explore cafés, parks and restaurants by foot.

Experience the convenience and vibrant atmosphere of Provenza without ever needing a car.

However if you do rent a car there is a 24/7 structure only 2 blocks away.

Our apt is only for your group, it will not be shared with anyone else.

description: • Strictly cleaned and sanitized• Wide open spaces, loads of green around• Amazing location in the heart of Poblado: "Oasis in the middle of the best part of Poblado, just far away enough from the noise, but walking distance to the heart"• Air Conditioning• Pool + Hot tub in common areas• High speed 100 Mb WiFi• Private outdoor patio• Extremely safe neighborhood• Modern, comfortable fully furnished Loft• Fully equipped kitchen• 43" Smart TV with Netflix + Cable TV• Free ParkingThe space• Escape from the concrete jungle. The property has wide open spaces, lots of nature and natural lights, pool, hot tub, sitting areas for relax. There's plenty of space for everyone. Best of all, you're still walking distance to the best part of the city in El Poblado• High speed reliable 100 Mbps WiFi with great coverage in all spaces• Great location. Extremely safe neighborhood in Milla de Oro (Golden Mile) in El Poblado (300 meters, 5 mins walking). Medellín's top places are all within walking distance or a very short cab ride. All delivery apps work in the property• Air Conditioning. Please note this is not very common in the options you have in the city•Fully furnished loft. Your own place filled with charm, style and modern touches, private outdoor patio, double bed, 43" Smart TV w/ Netflix + Cable TV and everything you need for a great stay• Great pool and hot tub in the common areas for relaxing in after enjoying the city (yes, they're available for your use)• Free parking on the property• 24/7 On site staff to check you in at anytime and assist you in anything you may need. I'm also always available by message or phone to help you• Fully stocked and equipped kitchen: Coffee machine, refrigerator, microwave, pans, cutlery and much more. Feel free to cook up!• Bathroom with constant hot water. We provide all the essentials, like soap, shampoo, towels, etc. Let us know if you need restocking• 5 minutes walking to Milla de Oro (Golden Mile): There you have the best restaurants, bars, big shopping malls, 24/7 supermarket, cafes, groceries and more. 20 minutes to Lleras Park and El Poblado ParkGuest accessYour entire loft, all the mentioned amenities and the use of the open spaces are included in this rental. Don't expect any extra cost. Please, make yourself at home. There is 24/7 staff and I'm always available for anything we can help with.Other things to noteSome questions you may have:• (COVID-19 question): Are you open? Is the pool and hot tub available? Do you clean and sanitize properly?Yes, We are open,  the pool and hot tube are available for your use and we clean and sanitize properly.We are proud to offer this property as an ideal place for your stay in this situation. The entire loft is only for you, you have wide open spaces and lots of nature. We take cleanliness very seriously. The propertyis located within walking distance to many groceries, pharmacies, supermarkets, etc. All delivery apps in the city works for the property 24/7. It's extremely safe. You also have a very high speed (100 Mbps) WiFi internet connection. Isn't that an ideal place to stay?• Is the loft 100% private?The entire loft is for you. Only you will have access with your access card which we will give you upon arrival. Open spaces like pool are shared with the other lofts of the property• What is required for check in?As a 100% legal accomodation business, and according to the Colombian law, your passport will be required upon check in. Colombian citizen have to show the physical and original ID. Every underage person willing to enter must be accompanied by at least one of his/her parents (certified)• Do I have to bring sheets, towels, shampoo, soap ...?No! We provide everything you need for your stay• Is WiFi reliable and fast?We know how important a good internet connection is. We have a reliable, 100 Mbps WiFi network. Great coverage in all the property.• I still don't know what to visit in Medellín. Do you have any recommendations?Yes! As soon as you book our place we will send you a digital guidebook with all our recommendations (tours, restaurants, cafes, bars, parks, museums and more). That way you can plan your trip in this amazing city! It is a guidebook made by us, based on our personal recommendations and the ideas of other guests who have stayed with us.• Can I do early check-in or late check-out?We can sort it out! just let us know if you need early check in or late check out, and if there are no other bookings in the apartments the same day, we'll let you know. If there are bookings for the same day, don't worry, we could store your luggage.• Is the apartment cleaned regularly?We take cleanliness very seriously and you'll find the apartment sparkling clean when you arrive. If you are staying for 7 days or more, we can have our housekeeper clean the apartment once a week at no extra charge. Please let us know if you want to use this service with enough time, so we can arrange our housekeeper's schedule• I will arrive very late. Can I access anytime?Yes! you have 24/7 staff that will check you in so you can arrive any time that is most convenient for you.• Is there any law in Colombia for Airbnb? Do you meet those rules?Yes, there are laws in Colombia for short-term stays (less than 30 days). The government requires the National Tourism Registry (RNT) for this activity. We do have the RNT and we pay the corresponding taxes. We recommend that you always look for 100% legal accommodation like ours, avoid hassles during your trip ;)• Is the water from the tap drinkable?It is rarely reported in travel guides, but Medellín possesses outstanding pure, safe, clean drinking water from the tap. Enjoy!Registration number96580

host/about:
Hi!

We're Mario and Cata. We're from Medellín and your Colombian hosts. We're both software engineers, but more importantly, we're a couple passionate about living life to the fullest! We loved Airbnb when we first used it on a trip through South America, and now we love to host, just as we would want to be hosted ;) 

Through AirBnB, we've found a whole new way to experience the joys and learnings of travelling from our own city of Medellín- we love meeting and learning from new friends, cultures, languages and stories!
 
More than your hosts, we offer you our friendship. We love to help out with a smile. Hey, we are from Medellín after all, that's what we are known for :)

We love Medellín and we love our beautiful properties, which we take so much pride in keeping in tip top shape! We really enjoy sharing them with you, so you can have the best experience in this wonderful city.
host/highlights/1: Most useless skill: I can move my ears, not many can do that
htmlDescription/htmlText:
• Strictly cleaned and sanitized
• Wide open spaces, loads of green around
• Amazing location in the heart of Poblado: "Oasis in the middle of the best part of Poblado, just far away enough from the noise, but walking distance to the heart"
• Air Conditioning
• Pool + Hot tub in common areas
• High speed 100 Mb WiFi
• Private outdoor patio
• Extremely safe neighborhood
• Modern, comfortable fully furnished Loft
• Fully equipped kitchen
• 43" Smart TV with Netflix + Cable TV
• Free Parking

The space
• Escape from the concrete jungle. The property has wide open spaces, lots of nature and natural lights, pool, hot tub, sitting areas for relax. There's plenty of space for everyone. Best of all, you're still walking distance to the best part of the city in El Poblado

• High speed reliable 100 Mbps WiFi with great coverage in all spaces

• Great location. Extremely safe neighborhood in Milla de Oro (Golden Mile) in El Poblado (300 meters, 5 mins walking). Medellín's top places are all within walking distance or a very short cab ride. All delivery apps work in the property

• Air Conditioning. Please note this is not very common in the options you have in the city

•Fully furnished loft. Your own place filled with charm, style and modern touches, private outdoor patio, double bed, 43" Smart TV w/ Netflix + Cable TV and everything you need for a great stay

• Great pool and hot tub in the common areas for relaxing in after enjoying the city (yes, they're available for your use)

• Free parking on the property

• 24/7 On site staff to check you in at anytime and assist you in anything you may need. I'm also always available by message or phone to help you

• Fully stocked and equipped kitchen: Coffee machine, refrigerator, microwave, pans, cutlery and much more. Feel free to cook up!

• Bathroom with constant hot water. We provide all the essentials, like soap, shampoo, towels, etc. Let us know if you need restocking

• 5 minutes walking to Milla de Oro (Golden Mile): There you have the best restaurants, bars, big shopping malls, 24/7 supermarket, cafes, groceries and more. 20 minutes to Lleras Park and El Poblado Park

Guest access
Your entire loft, all the mentioned amenities and the use of the open spaces are included in this rental. Don't expect any extra cost. Please, make yourself at home. There is 24/7 staff and I'm always available for anything we can help with.

Other things to note
Some questions you may have:

• (COVID-19 question): Are you open? Is the pool and hot tub available? Do you clean and sanitize properly?
Yes, We are open, the pool and hot tube are available for your use and we clean and sanitize properly.
We are proud to offer this property as an ideal place for your stay in this situation. The entire loft is only for you, you have wide open spaces and lots of nature. We take cleanliness very seriously. The propertyis located within walking distance to many groceries, pharmacies, supermarkets, etc. All delivery apps in the city works for the property 24/7. It's extremely safe. You also have a very high speed (100 Mbps) WiFi internet connection. Isn't that an ideal place to stay?

• Is the loft 100% private?
The entire loft is for you. Only you will have access with your access card which we will give you upon arrival. Open spaces like pool are shared with the other lofts of the property

• What is required for check in?
As a 100% legal accomodation business, and according to the Colombian law, your passport will be required upon check in. Colombian citizen have to show the physical and original ID. Every underage person willing to enter must be accompanied by at least one of his/her parents (certified)

• Do I have to bring sheets, towels, shampoo, soap ...?
No! We provide everything you need for your stay

• Is WiFi reliable and fast?
We know how important a good internet connection is. We have a reliable, 100 Mbps WiFi network. Great coverage in all the property.

• I still don't know what to visit in Medellín. Do you have any recommendations?
Yes! As soon as you book our place we will send you a digital guidebook with all our recommendations (tours, restaurants, cafes, bars, parks, museums and more). That way you can plan your trip in this amazing city! It is a guidebook made by us, based on our personal recommendations and the ideas of other guests who have stayed with us.

• Can I do early check-in or late check-out?
We can sort it out! just let us know if you need early check in or late check out, and if there are no other bookings in the apartments the same day, we'll let you know. If there are bookings for the same day, don't worry, we could store your luggage.

• Is the apartment cleaned regularly?
We take cleanliness very seriously and you'll find the apartment sparkling clean when you arrive. If you are staying for 7 days or more, we can have our housekeeper clean the apartment once a week at no extra charge. Please let us know if you want to use this service with enough time, so we can arrange our housekeeper's schedule

• I will arrive very late. Can I access anytime?
Yes! you have 24/7 staff that will check you in so you can arrive any time that is most convenient for you.

• Is there any law in Colombia for Airbnb? Do you meet those rules?
Yes, there are laws in Colombia for short-term stays (less than 30 days). The government requires the National Tourism Registry (RNT) for this activity. We do have the RNT and we pay the corresponding taxes. We recommend that you always look for 100% legal accommodation like ours, avoid hassles during your trip ;)

• Is the water from the tap drinkable?
It is rarely reported in travel guides, but Medellín possesses outstanding pure, safe, clean drinking water from the tap. Enjoy!

locationDescriptions/0/content:
El Poblado is the best Medellín neighborhood. Perfect location with everything you need close to you:
• 5 minutes walking to Milla de Oro (Golden Mile): There you have lots of restaurants, bars, big shopping malls, 24/7 supermarket, cafes, groceries and more
• 20 minutes to Lleras Park and El Poblado Park
• Very short cab rides to the rest of El Poblado and souty of the city
• Easy bus route or short cab ride to the Metro
locationDescriptions/1/content:
• You'll find that the metro throughout the entire greater Medellin area is fast, efficient and super clean. The Medellin metro has been considered a model transit system of the 21st century.
• Medellin offers Uber, and it is just as safe as taking an Uber in the States. The best part about Uber here is the insanely low price per ride.
• You can call any yellow taxi in Medellin. They are all safe and their rates are very reasonable.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Welcome to Casa Tekoha - Wayuú Apartment - Cultural Airbnb ♥

CASA TEKOHA has apartments with unique designs, inspired by Almodóvar films and INDIGENOUS communities in America. ♥

WAYUÚ APT has comfortable chairs and tables for remote work with large windows + A/C for hot days in MEDALLO!

☆ Specially designed for Digital Nomads

☆ Lots of Natural Light, Large Windows, ++Green

☆ Terrace with Coworking, 500mb fiber optic

Real local experience in a traditional and iconic neighborhood, Laureles!

The space
● A/C with 12000BTUS
● Big Queen Bed ♥
● 43" Smart TV + Netflix + Star+
●Terrace with Coworking - Shared space with other guests
● High speed Wi-Fi 500 Mbps
● Fully equipped kitchen☆
● Amazing location, coolest neighborhood in the world! Laureles☆
● Safe area - Private vigilance during the night!
● Digital nomads spot! Suitable place to work ♥
● Cultural Airbnb - We connect you with real local experience!

☆ We recently designed this space, with a renowned architect in Medellín - Carlos Montoya, Tangible Design - so you have a spacious, decorated and bright apartment with lots of colors around!

Guest access
● Self Check in
● Laundry services - you can wash your clothes.
● Cultural tours in the city or surroundings - Connect with real experience! - ask
us to book your tour or experience!
● We have bikes for rent! Check availability with us
● Spanish classes, salsa classes, Yoga and other activities we can connect you with the providers and sometimes we do it in CASA TEKOHA

Other things to note
Everything that you see on the photos, kitchen, bathroom, main room are private! Its inside the apartment.

The shared area is the coworking at the terrace.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Modern loft apartment that has queen bed, bathroom, dresser and sofa bed. deal to enjoy alone, as a couple or for small families. Located in the Laureles neighborhood of Medellín, 2 minutes from the Unicentro Shopping Center, Universidad Pontificia Bolivariana (UPB) and Avenida Nutibara. 3 minutes from Avenida Jardín and Pueblito Paisa. 5 minutes from 70th Avenue. 10 minutes from Atanasio Girardot Stadium and 15 minutes from Lleras Park, Manila and Provence.

The space
The apartment has a queen bed, bathroom, dressing room and sofa bed, as well as all the comforts: blackout curtains, smart TV, amenities and kitchen utensils.

Guest access
You can enjoy the whole apartment and its amenities.

Other things to note
In case of entering with a minor under 18 years of age, he must be in the company of at least one of his parents who must prove such quality by means of his identification document and the identity card or civil registration of birth of the minor. If the minor is going to enter in the company of persons other than the parents (regardless of whether they are other relatives), they must have written authorization, printed and authenticated by one of their parents, which must be sent prior to entry.

All guests must provide their email address and send their identification (passport for foreigners and citizenship card for Colombians) before arriving at the accommodation. They must also notify their arrival 30 minutes before it.

Smoking is not allowed.

Parties are not allowed. Doing so can result in fines.

The space
Our spaces are inspiration and comfort to make you feel at home.
In our apartments you can find the comfort you are looking for, in an environment designed to make your stay pleasant, whether for a short or long time.
We want to highlight our roots in a modern and avant-garde environment, we offer you the connectivity you need and everything at a fair price.

Other things to note
ADDITIONAL BUILDING

rules - Sexual exploitation of the property is prohibited, especially that of children and adolescents

- No smoking inside the apartments or in the common areas of the building.
- Visitors must register at reception with a valid identity document
- Guests must behave respectfully with all building staff.
- Parties or social gatherings, loud music, noise are prohibited
- It is forbidden to spread clothes or any visible object on the balconies.
- An inventory of the property will be made at the entrance and exit of the guest the damages and missing must be assumed in full.
-Other rules of the building, will be informed at the time of arrival.

host/about:
Hi!

We're Mario and Cata. We're from Medellín and your Colombian hosts. We're both software engineers, but more importantly, we're a couple passionate about living life to the fullest! We loved Airbnb when we first used it on a trip through South America, and now we love to host, just as we would want to be hosted ;) 

Through AirBnB, we've found a whole new way to experience the joys and learnings of travelling from our own city of Medellín- we love meeting and learning from new friends, cultures, languages and stories!
 
More than your hosts, we offer you our friendship. We love to help out with a smile. Hey, we are from Medellín after all, that's what we are known for :)

We love Medellín and we love our beautiful properties, which we take so much pride in keeping in tip top shape! We really enjoy sharing them with you, so you can have the best experience in this wonderful city.

*Zero tolerance against sex tourism*

The space
Energy living 2004
- Views of the mountains
- 1 bedroom /2 Bathroom
- Modern decor.
- sonos sound system

Guest access
- Pool is open 9 AM to 9 PM
- Your passport is required physical upon check-in
- NO UNDERAGED PEOPLE WILL BE ALLOWED TO ENTER THE BUILDING EITHER AS A GUEST OR VISITOR, EVERYONE MUST BE 18+.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy this cozy aparttaestudio, ideal for 2 people, with a privileged location in one of the most vibrant and accessible areas of Medellín.

The space
Welcome to your refuge in the heart of Laureles! This newly remodeled modern apartaestudio offers the perfect combination of comfort and privileged location. Located in a quiet residential neighborhood, you will be just steps away from the vibrant city life, with close access to 33rd Avenue, restaurants, bars, and the Unicentro Shopping Center. Enjoy the proximity to the famous 70 and the Stadium, as well as supermarkets and other key points.

The apartaestudio is inside a house with lovely common areas, where you can relax on the patio, share with other travelers or prepare a delicious barbecue on the grill/barbecue/grill. Ideal for those looking for a comfortable and authentic stay in Medellín!

host/about:
Hello!

I'm Roberto, Host - Property & Operations Manager of the 16 apartments of Hotel Boutique Alori 15.3.  I really enjoy meeting other people and cultures, I am a charismatic person and I take my work very seriously.

I am on the property Monday through Friday from 8am to 5pm if you need me, I will gladly help you with anything you need.
htmlDescription/htmlText:
In Laureles, between private houses and quaint shops, Alori's five-story facade attracts you with its warm brick and wood exterior accentuated with greenery and private balconies.
Reserve includes
1. Light continental breakfast from 8 to 9 am.
2. Bilingual concierge 24/7
3. Virtual Bilingual Tourist Guide 24/7
4. Transp. from the Airport to the Building
5. Spa (Jacuzzi & Sunbath)
6. Gym
7. Limited insurance
8. Private Garage
9. 1 museum pass
10. 1 dance class

The space
It is on the first floor with an internal view of the building.
Alori Unit 103 is a very cozy and modern loft designed by a major local interior designer. Our 2x2 king-size bed and a 65 "TV (sound bar and bass included) allow you to enjoy a comfortable, first class sound that you will certainly find relaxing.

Guest access
The jacuzzi and gym are common areas, meaning they are for the entire building and shared with other guests. Use is private but with prior reservation with frontdesk.


Parking subject to availability and prior requirement, please ask in advance if there is parking available.

Other things to note
For your convenience, we can receive and store your luggage before check-in and after check-out as well. The luggage will be stored and registered with a number in our Luggage Room.

Registration number
97300

The space
You will enjoy a beautiful view of the city from the 21st floor in an apartment close to the exclusive belvedere sector in the wooden apartment complex (living wood, fresh wood, essential wood and wooden door) ideal for work trip or enjoy with family , this modern and cozy
67-meter apartment has 3 bedrooms , private bathroom and social bathroom, living room and separate dining room in a 24-hour gated and guarded set,with covered parking lot and
equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay ,you will have a main bedroom with double bed, closet, private bathroom and bathtub with hot water, work area, 100 MB wifi, 32 "TV and safe.
you will have all the basics for your stay: pillows,blankets ,soap, towels , toilet paper, dishwasher soap,detergent etc.
You will also have a beautiful spacious and modern kitchen equipped with: gas stove,refrigerator, oven, kitchen utensils and washing machine, 2 extra rooms with double beds with large closets and a beautiful view , social bathroom, dining room and a balcony for a beautiful view of the city. You will have all the common areas that you like you can do your shopping in the convenience store while you enjoy a coffee, an ice cream or a rich pizza without leaving the unit you will also have food court,hairdresser, bakery restaurant, bancolombia correspondent, beautiful walking trails, green areas, children's games, dollhouse, outdoor gymnasium, skateboard,skateboarding, basketball, volleyball, pet park. the wet areas (adult and children's pools,Turkish , and jacuzzi) (have established schedules and restrictions by biosafety standards and limit and rate of 3000$col 0.25 USD ) and capacity of 3 people per day.

Guest access
Located in the gated set Wood Gate near the subway wood station,and close to the exclusive belvedere sector with 24-hour guarded porter and covered parking lot,the access is opposite to interact and diagonally to the subway wood station.
when entering the set inform the surveillance staff that you have an authorization by email and when leaving do not forget to put your right hand on the reader.

Other things to note
Outdoor trails and gym, theater and pet park

You can also customize your stay with our theme kits designed for you, your family, or your partner.
ask us for the romantic evening kit or dinner, themed decoration with pasabocas,picnic , Italian, relaxing spa.

description: This bright 50m² apartment offers a peaceful retreat for couples or business travelers. It features a plush king bed, a spacious bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, a smart TV, fast WiFi, and a dedicated workspace. Blux is the best in El Poblado location, comfort, and 24/7 check-in. Groceries are just 200 meters away at the Carulla grocery store when needed.
