host/about:
Hi! I’m Luisa, Property Manager for Blux at Casacol and Airbnb Superhost in Medellín, Colombia. I manage beautifully Classic apartments in a green, relaxed neighborhood, blending modern comfort with local charm. My goal is to create memorable stays.

As a yoga enthusiast and nature lover, I seek balance between city life and nature. I love to try healthy recipes, with guacamole being a personal favorite!
host/highlights/1: Fun fact: Ensuring my guests feel at home.
htmlDescription/htmlText:
This bright 50m² apartment offers a peaceful retreat for couples or business travelers. It features a plush king bed, a spacious bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, a smart TV, fast WiFi, and a dedicated workspace. Located on the 3rd floor, its large window fills the space with natural light.

*Please see our house rules *24/7 Security *Pool, Co working and Gym

The space
304 is a beautiful, modern 50m² studio that is ready for you. 300 MG wifi speed, 1,5 bath, working space, king size bed, washer, and fully equipped kitchen will be the perfect getaway for a couple.

The building is located across from a tranquil park, away from traffic and the building itself is also quiet with many resident owners living in the building.

Located near Park Lleras, Provenza, and an array of top-notch restaurants, our apartment puts you in the center of all the action. Blux is the best in El Poblado location, comfort, and 24/7 check-in.

Groceries are just 200 meters away at the Carulla grocery store when needed. Also, there are more than 10 restaurants and all major ATMs located directly across the street at the Mall Interplaza.

Guest access
Enjoy outstanding amenities during your stay! Relax in the rooftop pool on the 10th floor with exceptional views (open Tuesday to Sunday, 9 a.m. to 9 p.m.; closed on Mondays, or Tuesdays if Monday is a holiday). Stay productive in the Co working space with high-speed internet and all the comforts you need.
Grab your favorite drink from the vending machine or soak up the sun on the terrace.

Other things to note
-Your reservation includes a free ticket to the Modern Art Museum, request it to me in the chat.

Our clients come back again and again because they enjoy the convenience and comfort that the Blux location offers.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy the comfort of this second-floor room, with quiet common spaces, at the heart of Manila's neighborhood, Poblado. Ideal for work trips and tourism. Close to supermarkets, banking areas, restaurants, parks, medical care, shopping centers and metro station. Close to city center ideal to visit. Wifi connection. Spacious room with private bathroom, desk, social area for coworking with TV and air conditioning.

The space
House on the second floor, access by private stairs, rested. The house has 5 rooms designed exclusively for accommodation. All rooms feature private bathrooms, quiet and modern spaces. We have a digital lock for ease of access. Laundry service at extra cost and at the request of the guest. A room with a desk, a safe and an air conditioner.

Guest access
Guests can access the common kitchen area to heat food in the microwave or refrigerate in the fridge in case you need it. You can also enjoy the nice covered internal patio, suitable with 4 tables and chairs ideal for interacting with other guests, eat, work, read or watch TV.

During your stay
We are attentive to the needs of the guests via chat and the co-host available in the first floor house.

Other things to note
We are always attentive to the needs of our guests with constant toilet in the common areas and improving each day to provide them with a better service. On the first floor of the property is the co-host available for any need. According to the national decree we must keep a registration of all guests. For this reason, at the time of check-in we request presentation of the passport for photo registration and to complete basic information such as Identification, reason and travel time. For the safety of all, additional people are not allowed in the rooms after check-in.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Modern new apartment in residential building at the heart of Poblado. Between Manila and Provenza. Private surveillance 24/7, with 2 lifts. On the 12th floor, overlooking the outside. Close to supermarkets, restaurants, bars, discotheques, and public transportation
Fully remodeled apartment 16 months ago. Spacious room with King bed. Excellent ventilation and natural lighting.
Access to clothing area with washing machine and dryer.
Only visitors of legal age are allowed.

The space
Our apartment is located in Av. El Poblado, approximately 150 meters from El Poblado Park, from where the city's main tourist tours depart.

It has access through Av. El Poblado and the famous Manila neighborhood. Diagonal to the building you will find the Carulla supermarket.

Walking you can go to the street of the good table of the Manila neighborhood (5 minutes) and to Provence street (10 minutes). The room and living room are huge, making it great for remote work. The block is very safe, as well as the building, as the access is controlled, and has 24 7 surveillance and security cameras at the two entrances of the unit.

If you need parking, please check the availability of parking before making the reservation.
There's hot water on all the faucets.
The guest has access to the laundry area that is shared with two other apartments of my property (rentados through this platform), there you can wash and dry your clothes

If you want to stay in Medellín with friends or family, and that the accommodations are nearby, but independent, this can be an excellent option, they are the other two apartments that are attached to this listing: https://airbnb.com/h/jennyferreirab
https://airbnb.com/h/jennyferreiraapc
The apartment is part of a large completely remodeled apartment in 3 COMPLETELY INDEPENDENT apartments. The other two apartments are rented by airbnb, allowing you to meet people from other cultures WITHOUT AFFECTING your PRIVACY

Every child and adolescent must be accompanied by parents and/or legal representative duly verified through the respective documentation.

Only visitors of legal age are allowed

Guest access
Check-in is done by the main entrance located on Av. El Poblado.
The building has two entrances, the main one by Av el Poblado and another by the Manila neighborhood, where you'll immediately find restaurants, bars, and cafes.
Check-in can be done during 24 hours, as check-in is self check-in.

Other things to note
At the time of your arrival, the building guard will ask you for your ID and that of your companions to check in. Photography will not be taken or any other record taken. This registration will be made in your presence, so you will never lose sight of your document. Your ID will be returned immediately.

IMPORTANT: Only children and adolescents accompanied by their parents or legal representatives will be allowed in, duly verified.


Many urban bus routes pass in front of the building, and the metro station el Poblado is a 15-minute walk. Being above Av El Poblado, the building is easily connected to the rest of the city.
José María Córdova International Airport is only 30 minutes away by car.
On the first floor there are excellent beauty salons, hairdresser, manicure and pedicure.
The kitchen is sufficiently stocked if you like to cook.

125376

host/about:
Hello! I'm Camila, I grew up in the world of hospitality, but the warmth of Airbnb conquered me. 
My apartments, located in the heart of 70, are the ideal home for travelers from all over the world looking for an authentic Medellin experience. Whether you're a digital nomad or just passing through, my spaces adapt to your needs, offering you comfortable and functional environments to work, relax, or explore the city.
host/highlights/1: Where I went to school: Me gradué del colegio Manzanares
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant life of 70 in this cozy loft. Our property, located in one of the most popular areas of the city, offers you the opportunity to explore the best restaurants and bars on foot, or if you are interested in cooking, you also have supermarkets nearby, to buy everything you need.
Don't worry about being in a night area, our windows are soundproofed and you won't hear the outside noises.
Book with us and let go!

Guest access
Before your arrival, we will send you a brochure with all the instructions and details to make your check-in as easy as possible. Feel free to write if you have any questions! We will be happy to help you.

Other things to note
- A photo or photocopy of your passport will be required prior to your arrival.
You must show your original and physical passport document or physical Colombian ID (Cedula) at check-in time. Same goes for visitors. Photocopy of the card/passport.
- If traveling with a minor, remember to bring a civil registration and a document specifying that he or she is your child. Otherwise, the minor will not be allowed to stay.
- Only one visitor at the same time
- Late check out will be charged if you do not meet set times.
- Third-party bookings are prohibited.
- The use of Netflix is on your own.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy this stylish space that is conveniently located on calle 10 near Provenza and Parque Lleras. 2 min walk to supermarket with ATM.
The room has a brand new full bed, AC, a working desk, a full bathroom, fridge and a safety box.
Common areas include an outdoor patio, a kitchenette, a coin washer & dryer with iron and board and luggage storage.
Please be aware that there are stairs to get to your room.
No parties allowed
Security at night
No minors

The space
This is a fully remodeled house with 14 rooms! We designed it to meet our guests needs such as location, air conditioner, beds, working desk, washer and drier, kitchen to enjoy coffee in the mornings, luggage storage and other small details that will make your stay more enjoyable!

During your stay
We are always available trough the app! Do mind that after 8pm it might take us a bit longer but the security guard is there to help with any issues!

Other things to note

Guest are welcome, but no minors are allowed. Security will check guest IDs

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy a stylish experience, in this fully equipped accommodation; with air conditioning, wifi, TV(HBO, Netflix, Disney, Star Plus), kitchen and everything you need to work at home, located in an excellent area of the city, close to the plus metro, restaurants, shopping centers, shops, supermarkets, universities, parks and sports centers where you can do physical activity.

The space
It is a comfortable and comfortable place with all the benefits of a 5-star hotel room. But totally independent. The room also has basic toiletries, kitchen instruments, air fryer and essentials that facilitate your stay

Guest access
It is a small apartment with kitchen and private bathroom, with totally independent entrance to ensure total privacy of the tenant. The lock is electric and opens with a custom access key making the guest enjoy complete independence. The entrance is on the first floor and the neighborhood is connected to many integrated routes nearby

Other things to note
It is a strategic place located near restaurants, shopping centers, and sports units. Very close to Metroplus and urban transport. This place is very close to the Atanacio Girardot Stadium, Parque Lleras and Provence

description: • Amazing Location. El Poblado. The best area in Medellin. Steps to great restaurants, cafes, 24/7 supermarket, etc.• 15 mins walk to Provenza and Poblado Parks• A/C• High speed 300 Mb WiFi  (router inside your Loft)• Modern, independent, fully furnished Loft in a building with other private Lofts• On site 24/7 staff• Extremely safe neighborhood• 43" Smart TV with Smart Apps• Hot Tubs in common areas• Equipped kitchen• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxesThe space- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. Forget about needing taxis/Uber for enjoying great food, cafes, or shopping.- PERFECT HOME BASE FOR YOUR PLANS IN MEDELLIN: Enjoy the convenience of staying in a prime sector of El Poblado, where everything you need is within arm's reach. Besides, easily access popular attractions like "Lleras Park" and "Provenza" with just a 15-minute walk or a short 5-minute taxi/Uber ride. Other tourist spots like "Comuna 13", "Laureles" and more are approximately a 20-minute cab ride away (Medellin is not that big, and easily accesible from a central place like ours).- FULLY EQUIPPED LOFT IN BUILDING WITH OTHER LOFTS: You'll have great amenities for a great stay at a great price: The entire Loft (small apartment) is only for you: Ultra fast internet & ethernet port, 43″ Smart TV, Queen bed (1.60 m wide), fully equipped kitchen, safe lock, etc. Our 24/7 staff is always ready to help and provide what you need. Also, you have access to hot tubs in a shared space on the third floorEASY CHECK-IN: Very convenient and seamless check-in process facilitated by our 24/7 staff. Simply bring your physical ID (passport or cedula). For the comfort and safety of all guests, kindly ensure your visitors also have their physical IDs readily available.- VERY FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET: We are obsessed with super fast and very reliable internet. Every Loft has its own router (AP) to guarantee the best WiFi signal possible, plus it has ethernet connection available. Geek note: we have 2 fast, independent internet service providers balanced and each one configured as a backup link of the other, that means it's very reliable and fast- AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICES: There are not hidden fees or extra charges, the final price is the one you pay on Airbnb. We don't charge visitor fee, taxes, service or cleaning fee. You can have one visitor at a time, absolutely no under 18 years old- FREE LAUNDRY SERVICE: On-site staff can wash and dry your clothes at no extra cost (tips are voluntary and go 100% to them). One load of laundry per night of your stay. Your clothes will be ready at the latest by the following day.- SAFE LOCK, ROUTER WITH ETHERNET, CLOTHES IRON, HAIR DRYER, CLOTHING STORAGE: Those are among the most requested amenities from our guests, and you have them all. If you don't see them in your Loft, just reach out to our 24/7 staff. Thinks like clothing storage are provided upon request (not many use them and takes space from the loft). Also Iron and Hair dryer are provided upon request since Colombian Law doesn't allow tho leave them inside the rooms, because of the fire riskGuest accessYou are booking Loft (small apartment), exactly the one shown in the pictures. The Loft is in a building with 3 floors and with other Lofts. Your Loft is totally independent and equipped. Only you can access your Loft with your access card (given to you upon check-in)You can also enjoy the common areas of the building: Hot tubs in the common area on the third floor and the living room on the common area on the first floor.Other things to note- Your private Loft has a small patio/balcony (as shown in the pictures). It is protected with a fence for your privacy and safety, and it has no views- If you have any issue, please let us know. We will do everything we can for you to have a great stayRegistration number201283

htmlDescription/htmlText:
• Amazing Location. El Poblado. The best area in Medellin. Steps to great restaurants, cafes, 24/7 supermarket, etc.
• 15 mins walk to Provenza and Poblado Parks
• A/C
• High speed 300 Mb WiFi (router inside your Loft)
• Modern, independent, fully furnished Loft in a building with other private Lofts
• On site 24/7 staff
• Extremely safe neighborhood
• 43" Smart TV with Smart Apps
• Hot Tubs in common areas
• Equipped kitchen
• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxes

The space
- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. Forget about needing taxis/Uber for enjoying great food, cafes, or shopping.

- PERFECT HOME BASE FOR YOUR PLANS IN MEDELLIN: Enjoy the convenience of staying in a prime sector of El Poblado, where everything you need is within arm's reach. Besides, easily access popular attractions like "Lleras Park" and "Provenza" with just a 15-minute walk or a short 5-minute taxi/Uber ride. Other tourist spots like "Comuna 13", "Laureles" and more are approximately a 20-minute cab ride away (Medellin is not that big, and easily accesible from a central place like ours).

- FULLY EQUIPPED LOFT IN BUILDING WITH OTHER LOFTS: You'll have great amenities for a great stay at a great price: The entire Loft (small apartment) is only for you: Ultra fast internet & ethernet port, 43″ Smart TV, Queen bed (1.60 m wide), fully equipped kitchen, safe lock, etc. Our 24/7 staff is always ready to help and provide what you need. Also, you have access to hot tubs in a shared space on the third floor

EASY CHECK-IN: Very convenient and seamless check-in process facilitated by our 24/7 staff. Simply bring your physical ID (passport or cedula). For the comfort and safety of all guests, kindly ensure your visitors also have their physical IDs readily available.

- VERY FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET: We are obsessed with super fast and very reliable internet. Every Loft has its own router (AP) to guarantee the best WiFi signal possible, plus it has ethernet connection available. Geek note: we have 2 fast, independent internet service providers balanced and each one configured as a backup link of the other, that means it's very reliable and fast

- AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICES: There are not hidden fees or extra charges, the final price is the one you pay on Airbnb. We don't charge visitor fee, taxes, service or cleaning fee. You can have one visitor at a time, absolutely no under 18 years old

- FREE LAUNDRY SERVICE: On-site staff can wash and dry your clothes at no extra cost (tips are voluntary and go 100% to them). One load of laundry per night of your stay. Your clothes will be ready at the latest by the following day.

- SAFE LOCK, ROUTER WITH ETHERNET, CLOTHES IRON, HAIR DRYER, CLOTHING STORAGE: Those are among the most requested amenities from our guests, and you have them all. If you don't see them in your Loft, just reach out to our 24/7 staff. Thinks like clothing storage are provided upon request (not many use them and takes space from the loft). Also Iron and Hair dryer are provided upon request since Colombian Law doesn't allow tho leave them inside the rooms, because of the fire risk

Guest access
You are booking Loft (small apartment), exactly the one shown in the pictures. The Loft is in a building with 3 floors and with other Lofts. Your Loft is totally independent and equipped. Only you can access your Loft with your access card (given to you upon check-in)
You can also enjoy the common areas of the building: Hot tubs in the common area on the third floor and the living room on the common area on the first floor.

Other things to note
- Your private Loft has a small patio/balcony (as shown in the pictures). It is protected with a fence for your privacy and safety, and it has no views
- If you have any issue, please let us know. We will do everything we can for you to have a great stay

Registration number
201283

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Hey there! Welcome to Torre Chela apt 201, our place was designed thinking entirely about you, our guests, to ensure you have an amazing experience in the city and enjoy it to the fullest from our apartments located in Conquistadores a very central, green and plain area of the city!

This amazing Studio has room for up to 2 people with a fully equipped kitchen, a dedicated working areas and high speed internet.

The space
Our stunning loft has everything you need, with the surrounding greenery we wanted to bring some of those natural colors in, creating a calm y cozy space for all of our guests!

The apartment has a SUPER comfy queen size beed, fully equipped kitchen, designated working space, shower area separated from the toilet space, a stunning dining area and a small balcony that let's into the apartment a green & relaxing scene.

We thought of everything to make sure your stay is as cozy and enjoyable as possible!

Guest access
Guests will check in with security and climb a flight of stairs (16 total see pictures) to get to the apt

Other things to note
As of last year the Colombian government requires airbnb hosts to fill out certain information about the guests that they're hosting in their apartments, taking this into account we, as responsible hosts that follow the law, will require that our guests provide certain information to make sure we can comply with this requirement such as: full names, ID's, travel motive, etc.

You might encounter some street noise given that the apt is located on the second floor, although there isn’t much cars passing by, there are street vendors passing by

Registration number
176631
locationDescriptions/0/content: Our apartment is located in Conquistadores neighborhood; it is surrounded by green parks such as the new riverside park called Parques del Río, it also has very beautiful places to walk around or just sit and enjoy the views. You’ll also be able to find close by anything you may need like pharmacies, supermarkets, shopping malls, restaurants, coffee shops, etc. It is very simple to find your way around in this neighborhood and to get everywhere!
locationDescriptions/1/content:

1. Plaza Mayor Convention Center: 10 min
2. Parks del Río: 3 minutes

7. Atanasio Girardot Stadium: 20 min

Driving time to other neighborhoods:
1. Belen: 5 -10min
2. Laureles: 5 -10min
3. Centro: 8 min
4. Poblado: 10-15 min
5. Envigado: 15-20 min
6. Sabaneta: 20-25 min
7. Miradores (Las Palmas): 10-15 min

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Loft apartment with elements that make it stand out and give it a sophisticated and distinctive air ideal for rest, it is located in one of the most touristy and central areas of Medellín near the Laureles neighborhood, the Boulevard la 70 and the main events sites of the city . High speed internet up to 400mb Ideal for working as if it were your home office. Easy access to public transportation, restaurants, nightlife, supermarkets, among others.

The space
Discover the charm of our cozy 18-20m2 apartment, where every detail has been carefully selected to offer you an unforgettable stay.

The bedroom features a 1.60m wide double bed dressed in soft, fresh sheets, perfect for a restful rest. At your disposal you will find towels, pillows, and a large closet to store your belongings. Relax by watching your favorite shows on the flat screen TV, or if you need to work, the desk with its comfortable chair will give you the ideal space.

The private bathroom, thought of with taste and style, offers privacy and comfort with all the necessary amenities. The fully-equipped kitchen is ready to inspire your culinary skills, with all the basic utensils you might need. Enjoy the fresh air and a perfect space to rest or share unforgettable moments.

Come and feel at home in our corner of tranquility and comfort.

WELCOME TO MEDELLIN!!.

Guest access
- Guests have access to the entire private apartment.

- Capacity: 2 people

- Beds: 1

- Bathrooms: 1

- Ownership: Apartamento

- No Air Conditioning

- Portable Fan

- No elevator

- There is no parking in the property

Other things to note
* CHECK-IN is at 3 pm, online and totally autonomous. Prior to this and to reduce the waiting time you must at least 1 hour in advance:
* Diligentiate guest registration via the link on our HOSPY platform, which you will receive after your reservation has been confirmed.
* Once you have verified that your registration is correct on the same day of your arrival you will receive the access codes to the building and your apartment, and all the additional information to be aware of during your stay.
* Documents Valid for guests and visits:
Foreigners: Pasaporte Físico with the entrance seal to Colombia.
Colombianos: Original Cédula or Digital Legally issued.
Visitors: You'll need to provide a valid physical document in order to enter the building.
* If you are traveling with a minor, remember to bring a civil registration and a document specifying that he or she is your child. Otherwise, you must show an authenticated power of attorney specifying their parents' permission to travel with you.
* Identity documents will not be valid those that are presented in a photocopy.
* By policies of the property only one card will be delivered per apartment (which enables you all the energy and lighting of the same and additional will work as your key, so * always take it with you)
* Late check out will be charged if you don't check out time.
* Only 1 visitor is allowed at the same time (maximum 3 hours)
* Guest under the age of 18 must be in the company of their parents.
* No drug consumption permitted.
* Sexual Tourism is prohibited entirely and strangers entry into the building.
* Quiet hours after 10 pm.
* Use of coworking is only for guests and the hours are from 8:00 am - 9:00 pm.
* We do not have cable TV.
* Use of NetFlix and/or any other digital platform is with your own account.
* Inside the building you have a self-driving Laundry service at an additional cost (Monday to Sunday from 7am-9am; 12pm-3pm and 5pm-7pm)
* CHECK-OUT is no later than 12 midday.

host/about:
Hello!

I'm Andrés, born and raised in Medellin, current traveler so I know how to make feel a foreigner welcome into my wonderful, rebirthing city. 

I work at Gutierrez Group, a company specialised in providing legal and investment advisory to foreigners living and/or doing business in Colombia. 

I enjoy being there for our guests so feel free to contact me at anytime and I will very gladly take care of you.
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Relax in this unique and quiet getaway. Located on the 12th floor of the Bio 26 building in a commercial district and on Las Palmas Avenue, conveniently located near Provenza; you will enjoy a complete apartment with everything you need for an unforgettable stay in Medellín.

It is a newly furnished apartment with all the amenities for a cozy and relaxed stay. Decorated with modern and functional details; you can not miss using the jacuzzi in the spacious bedroom.

The space
This newly remodeled 1011sqft. apartment has everything you need for a pleasant and quiet stay, you can enjoy the large jacuzzi located in the master bedroom, central air conditioning throughout the apartment, 3 bedrooms with queen size beds, 3 full and spacious bathrooms with modern details and the kitchen equipped with everything you need to prepare your meals and continue enjoying this comfortable apartment.

Its location is ideal, on the imposing Las Palmas Avenue, on the second floor of the building there is a small square with Italian and Peruvian restaurants, a pharmacy, ATM and even a gym (for a fee) just a few steps away.

Guest access
The use of the terrace is free of charge. There is a gym on the side of the building for a fee.

Other things to note
For reservations shorter than 1 month:

IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR COLOMBIANS:

According to the tax statute, if you are a Colombian resident you will be subject to an additional 19% tax charge of the cost of the reservation. You will be contacted by us once your reservation is confirmed.

-It's mandatory to send in advance a passport photo and/or Colombian ID of all the guests who will be staying in the apt, for our registrations and to authorize your entrance to the building.

Registration number
84716
images/46/caption: Restaurants, pharmacies and ATM in the building.
locationDescriptions/0/content:
This project is located in Las Palmas, El Poblado; one of the main and most vibrant avenues in the city, where the connection between the nightlife, the airport, the suburbs and the heart of the city converges. It is also popular in the city for its viewpoints overlooking the Valley and for its exclusive restaurants.

In the ground floor of this 13-story building, you will find several restaurants, an ATM, pharmacy, gym and other stores.
And just 5 minutes walking distance you will find 2 supermarkets, El Euro and Maxifruver.

It is only 6 minutes by car from the Provenza area, the most touristic area of El Poblado for its restaurants and nightlife.

description: We welcome you to an oasis of design and comfort just a few minutes' walk from the Provenza area and Parque Lleras. Our central location allows you to access the exciting nightlife and trendy restaurants while ensuring a quiet and relaxing stay away from the hustle and bustle of this area. Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located accommodation.The spaceWelcome to our unique property, surrounded by nature. This space features a 25 square meter (approximately 269 square feet) studio apartment, all in one integrated layout. It includes a queen-sized bed, air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a two-burner induction cooktop, and an incredible outdoor terrace spanning 18 square meters (approximately 194 square feet). htmlDescription/htmlText:
Apt with air conditioning, it is located in one of the most desirable areas of the city. Laureles Barrio, considered by the TIME OUT Magazine of Barcelona Spain, as "El Barrio Mas "Cool". It was awarded in 2023 to Barrio Laureles.

This strategic location offers a plethora of amenities and attractions nearby such as Unicentro Mall and lively areas of Laureles 1 and Laureles Parks 2. As well as, great supermarkets and restaurants.

The space
Welcome to this stunning loft-style apartment that redefines the accommodation experience with its combination of modern elegance and hotel amenities.

As you walk through the door, you will be greeted by a spacious and bright open space, characteristic of the lofts, with high ceilings and modern decor that creates a feeling of breadth and sophistication.

The thoughtfully designed living room features contemporary furnishings and a neutral color palette that brings a touch of relaxed elegance.

The kitchen, perfectly integrated into the space, is equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and designer countertops, offering the possibility to prepare delicious meals in a modern and functional setting.

The breakfast bar adds a cozy touch to the atmosphere, ideal for enjoying culinary delicacies.

The lounge area, located in a quiet nook, features a king-size bed with luxury bedding that promises restful nights of rest.

Large windows allow natural light to enter, and blackout curtains ensure privacy whenever you wish.

Whether you are traveling for business or enjoying a vacation, this space will envelop you in an atmosphere of sophistication and comfort.

Other things to note
Remember to check the messages that will arrive in the APP, so that you are fully aware, the step by step, to make your arrival and stay, the best experience.

Just 3 minutes away to find the Unicentro Center, famous for being located in the main cities of Colombia. A place to have an afternoon shopping.

This area offers an exciting and convenient life experience as well as a variety of attractions and amenities that make it one of the best areas to live in Medellin.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
3450 Living is easy to spot among the trees in Laureles. Designed like the bow of a ship, the angular combination of glass, brick, black metal, and concrete is conveniently located. The relaxed atmosphere is perfect for young professionals, students, couples, digital nomads, or friends looking for a cost-effective space in a prime location.
Four floors of modern-chic apartments feature expansive valley views from the balconies, residents also have access to the rooftop social area with jacuzzi.

The space
If you’re looking to share a space with a friend, fellow digital nomad, or even another couple, the one-bedroom apartments at 3450 Living offer ample space for four, including a complete kitchen. Two queen beds share the separate bedroom with en-suite bath, while a second full bath is conveniently located off the living space.

Enjoy two cozy balconies and window seats with floor to ceiling glass. Close the sound-dampening windows to block out the city below while two a/c units keep you cool in your living and sleeping areas. Or keep the windows open to welcome a fresh breeze.

You’ll find all the amenities you need including a fully stocked kitchen, bathroom products, hairdryer, and iron. With digital entry locks and secured main entrance, you’ll feel safe and secure at 3450 Living.

Guest access
You will have access to the rooftop social area with jacuzzi, outdoor kitchen space, and a 270° view of the heart of Medellín. To use it you must do a previous reservation at the front desk.

Other things to note
-For this apt only 3 visitors are allowed inside the apt at the same time, i.e. not exceeding the maximum capacity of 4 guests + 3 visitors inside the unit.

Two passes for dancing lessons are included in the price of your stay (please schedule with the host)
Transport service upon request
Extra cleaning service included upon request
Concierge service for reservations included according to employees schedule.

Registration number
92709
images/22/caption: Brand new building in front of a shopping mall
locationDescriptions/0/content:
3450 Living is situated in the heart of Laureles, directly across from Unicentro shopping mall and the UPB University. Walking is easy on the valley floor and everything you need is nearby. Grocery stores, shopping, movie theaters, and some of the finest restaurants in Medellín, are within walking distance. Or you can order in and have everything delivered.

Conveniently located near the major traffic routes of Avenida Bolivariana and Avenida 33 it’s easy to catch a taxi or bus to visit the rest of the city. Take a quick trip to Pueblito Paisa and Cerro Nutibara to enjoy an open-air theater, outdoor sculpture park, gardens, and a quaint replica of a historic Colombian village. Or spend a quiet afternoon in one of the many parks in Laureles.
locationDescriptions/1/content: Because Laureles is located on the valley floor, it is mostly flat and very walkable. Head to the local Estadio station to ride the clean, inexpensive Metro which connects you to the entire city through trains, buses, tranvia, and even cable cars. The Metro is the most convenient way to see and do all that Medellín offers during your stay. Also, taxis are metered, safe, inexpensive, and convenient.

-Bathroom with hot water.

-Wifi - 200 MB (fiber Optica).

Iron

The space
This room is on the third floor of the building and is accessed through some stairs. In total 3 keys are handled, one for the building, one for the apartment and one for the room
The person who greets the guests lives in the same building, so the attention is very timely
The guests have access to the entire apartment, except the other bedrooms and the drawers that the other guests have in the kitchen
Cooking is allowed.
The room has a window to the outside of the building.

Guest access
The apartment has no parking, in front there are some pay cells per hour. Near the apartment there is a public parking lot where you can leave the car at night.

During your stay
I don't live in the apartment but I do have a co-host that lives in the same building.

Other things to note
Respect the space that other guests have in the kitchen, do not take the belongings of others.
Wash the dishes after using them.
Please respect others in the same house, fix after use, keep the environment clean.
Persons other than those registered during the reservation may not enter the room or apartment.
Prostitution, the use of alcohol or hallucinogenic substances are not allowed on this site.
If you wash clothes use the space indicated to dry and do not hang the clothes on the windows. When the clothes are dry, they should be collected so that other guests can make use of the space to dry their clothes.

description: Luxury apartment with AC located in one of the best neighborhoods in Laureles.  You can explore the area walking everywhere. "Unicentro mall" is just a 5-minute stroll away, and "Calle 70" is a breezy 15-minute walk. That's where all the local action happens - from awesome eats to meeting cool folks and tons of entertainment spots.  / Luxurious apartment located in one of the best residential neighborhoods in Laureles, 5 mins from the unicenter mall, close to restaurants and bars.The spaceHey there! This apartment is like a makeover magic trick - it's been totally renovated to create a chill and welcoming vibe just for you. Picture it: it’s located on the 6th floor of a building with 24/7 security, right in one of the best parts of Laureles.This apartment comes with AC, and it's like your trusty sidekick, especially when Medellin turns up the heat. So, when the weather gets sizzling, you'll be chilling in comfort. And guess what? You can explore the area walking everywhere. "Unicentro mall" is just a 5-minute stroll away, and "Calle 70" is a breezy 15-minute walk. That's where all the local action happens - from awesome eats to meeting cool folks and tons of entertainment spots. Oh, and there's a park practically around the corner - 2 minutes tops - where you can catch some fresh air, get your exercise groove on, or simply take a leisurely walk. You will also find a coffee shop right downstairs. To visit other areas in Medellin You've got many options  for getting around - taxis, Uber, buses, and the metro are all super wallet-friendly.This cozy pad is perfect for solo adventurers or couples. There's a comfy queen-size bed in the bedroom that feels like it's straight out of a 5-star hotel. The kitchen? It's locked and loaded, ready for your culinary masterpiece. You've also got 1.5 bathrooms, a roomy living area with a TV, a cushy desk, and blazing fast 300 MB WIFI for those work or binge-watching sessions.As a sweet bonus, we've got a free parking spot just waiting for your ride.———————SPANISH:This apartment has just been completely remodeled and decorated with the intention of offering a harmonious space to its guests, it is located on the 6th floor in a building with 24 hour security, in one of the best residential neighborhoods of Laureles where calm predominates.Its privileged location allows you to walk to the Unicentro shopping center (approximately 5 mins), you can also walk to multiple restaurants where you can appreciate a wide culinary offer and interact with locals, at 1 min you can find a park where you can perform physical activity or enjoy pure air and a pleasant walk, at 15 minutes walk you can reach the renowned 70th Street which is full of restaurants and bars. To transport yourself to other parts of the city of Medellín you can easily take a taxi, Uber or bus at a very low rate. The apartment is fully equipped for a single person or a couple, has 1 room with a very comfortable queen size bed, 5-star hotel type, two bathrooms, a shower, the kitchen is fully equipped so you can prepare your favorite dishes, a large television room, it also has a comfortable desk and WIFI of 300 MB and wide coverage which will allow you to work comfortably and without interruptions. You will have access to 1 private parking lot at no extra charge.Give us the opportunity to have you as one of our guests and give you the opportunity to spend a holiday in this luxurious apartment!Guest accessWhen you get to the building you will find a security guard that will assist you with the check in. Once you go upstairs you will be able to open the door with a code.Registration number46581

The space
Hey there! This apartment is like a makeover magic trick - it's been totally renovated to create a chill and welcoming vibe just for you. Picture it: it’s located on the 6th floor of a building with 24/7 security, right in one of the best parts of Laureles.

This apartment comes with AC, and it's like your trusty sidekick, especially when Medellin turns up the heat. So, when the weather gets sizzling, you'll be chilling in comfort.

And guess what? You can explore the area walking everywhere. "Unicentro mall" is just a 5-minute stroll away, and "Calle 70" is a breezy 15-minute walk. That's where all the local action happens - from awesome eats to meeting cool folks and tons of entertainment spots. Oh, and there's a park practically around the corner - 2 minutes tops - where you can catch some fresh air, get your exercise groove on, or simply take a leisurely walk. You will also find a coffee shop right downstairs.

To visit other areas in Medellin You've got many options for getting around - taxis, Uber, buses, and the metro are all super wallet-friendly.

This cozy pad is perfect for solo adventurers or couples. There's a comfy queen-size bed in the bedroom that feels like it's straight out of a 5-star hotel. The kitchen? It's locked and loaded, ready for your culinary masterpiece. You've also got 1.5 bathrooms, a roomy living area with a TV, a cushy desk, and blazing fast 300 MB WIFI for those work or binge-watching sessions.

As a sweet bonus, we've got a free parking spot just waiting for your ride.

———————
SPANISH:

This apartment has just been completely remodeled and decorated with the intention of offering a harmonious space to its guests, it is located on the 6th floor in a building with 24 hour security, in one of the best residential neighborhoods of Laureles where calm predominates.

Its privileged location allows you to walk to the Unicentro shopping center (approximately 5 mins), you can also walk to multiple restaurants where you can appreciate a wide culinary offer and interact with locals, at 1 min you can find a park where you can perform physical activity or enjoy pure air and a pleasant walk, at 15 minutes walk you can reach the renowned 70th Street which is full of restaurants and bars.

To transport yourself to other parts of the city of Medellín you can easily take a taxi, Uber or bus at a very low rate.

The apartment is fully equipped for a single person or a couple, has 1 room with a very comfortable queen size bed, 5-star hotel type, two bathrooms, a shower, the kitchen is fully equipped so you can prepare your favorite dishes, a large television room, it also has a comfortable desk and WIFI of 300 MB and wide coverage which will allow you to work comfortably and without interruptions.

You will have access to 1 private parking lot at no extra charge.

Give us the opportunity to have you as one of our guests and give you the opportunity to spend a holiday in this luxurious apartment!

Guest access
When you get to the building you will find a security guard that will assist you with the check in. Once you go upstairs you will be able to open the door with a code.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy this beautiful apartment, where comfort and luxury merge to create an unforgettable experience. Relax in the exclusive Jacuzzi and rest peacefully in our luxurious king beds. Located in the heart of Laureles in the first park. A few minutes away from restaurants, bars and cafes, or if you are looking to enjoy the nightlife, the famous "Calle 70" is less than five minutes away. This space is your haven of style and sophistication.

The space
Welcome to our luxurious 2 bedroom apartment, an oasis of indulgence and opulence in Laureles. Immerse yourself in luxury from the moment you enter, surrounded by elegant design and refined decor that ensure an exceptional stay.

Each of our two rooms features a sumptuous king-size bed, ensuring a restful rest. Enjoy the private Jacuzzi, where the tranquility is joined to the extravagance. In addition, you can relax in the cool and modern living room we offer.

Explore our fully equipped kitchen, a culinary sanctuary equipped with premium appliances. In our kitchen is a real pleasure for cooking.

For your comfort, each room has individual air conditioning, ensuring a perfect climate adapted to your preferences. The meticulous attention to detail is reflected throughout the apartment, creating an ambience of incomparable luxury.

Guest access
Welcome to this exceptional residential complex, strategically located in the heart of Laureles, where life flows with a diversity of dining options, entertainment and sports activities at your fingertips.

As you enter this vibrant neighborhood, you will be immersed in a lively and quite social atmosphere. Steps from your door, you'll find an eclectic selection of restaurants that will satisfy even the most discerning palates. From international cuisine to local delights, each corner offers a unique dining experience, ready to delight your senses.

At the end of the day, you will return to your home in this urban oasis, where comfort and elegance merge to create an atmosphere of relaxation and comfort. With access to an array of services and amenities.

Other things to note
It is also worth mentioning that Laureles, where the apartmento is left, has been named as one of the most "cool" bars in the world. One of the reasons is for its high offer of restaurants, cafes, co-working, nightlife in the 70s, international restaurants with food both from Colombia Peruvian, Argentine, Asian etc. All this has less than a 10-minute walk from the apartment.

Registration number
198893

locationDescriptions/0/content: The neighborhood is a charming and traditional place that combines residential tranquility with a wide variety of amenities and amenities. Located in the western part of the city, Laureles First Park is a popular destination for both local residents and visitors. The Park is at the heart of the neighborhood, green and wooded space, which is the meeting point for the community. Here, residents enjoy outdoor activities such as walks, games, exercise, and moments of rest. The park is also the setting for local cultural events and festivals, making it a lively and lively place. In addition, the neighborhood has a variety of dining options, from local restaurants offering local dishes to trendy international establishments. You will also find cafes and bakeries where you can enjoy delicious flavors and specialties. The neighborhood also offers a wide range of services and amenities, including supermarkets, pharmacies, health centers, and local shops. In addition, the area has schools, universities and recreational parks, which makes it ideal for families and students.
locationDescriptions/1/content: We highly recommend exploring the neighborhood on foot during your stay. The area is adorned with lush vegetation and beautiful trees, creating a nice and welcoming atmosphere. Being in a flat area of the city, it is very easy to walk around, which is especially convenient if you have a pet or a stroller. However, if you do need to travel to a place that requires transportation, we suggest downloading Uber or InDriver on your phone. These rideshare apps offer a safer option, providing detailed information about the driver and platform ensures a high level of customer service.

description: Enjoy comfort and style at Urban Studios, located in the heart of Medellín (Poblado). Our modern and fully equipped apartments are perfect for business travelers and tourists. -Just 5 min away from the action -AC in the room -No Airbnb's Fees -Luxury interior design, furnishings -FREE Washer & Dryer -Smart TVs -FREE Co Working Space -High Speed internet 300MB -Heated Pool / Jacuzzi / Steam Room -Complete GYM -24/7 Lobby & Security -Cafeteria & SPA on the 4th floorThe spaceOur space stands out for its contemporary open-concept design, seamlessly integrating the kitchen, living room, and balcony. This creates a spacious and inviting atmosphere that is perfect for relaxation and enjoyment. Additionally, we have completely renovated the apartment with modern appliances and stylish furnishings, providing a luxurious and sophisticated environment for our guests. To ensure our guests' comfort, we have equipped the apartment with thoughtful details. This includes adjustable ambient lighting with dimmers and LED strips, allowing guests to create the perfect atmosphere according to the time of day or personal preference. The bedrooms feature queen-size bed, ensuring a restful sleep. Moreover, the living room is furnished with a comfortable and elegant sofa for relaxation. The property has two bathrooms: one is a guest bathroom and the other is a private bathroom within the bedroom. Furthermore, the panoramic views from the balcony offer a stunning visual display of lush green mountains and city lights, enhancing our guests' experience. We strive to provide all necessary amenities, including high-speed WiFi, cable television, and a fully equipped kitchen. To maintain a fresh and clean environment, we have a strict no-smoking policy throughout the apartment. In summary, our goal is to ensure that every guest feels at home and enjoys a memorable and comfortable experience during their stay at our Airbnb accommodation.Guest accessGuests will have free access to all areas of the accommodation during their stay. This includes the entire apartment, including the kitchen, living room, bedrooms, and balcony, as well as any shared amenities such as the gym, swimming pool, steam room and parking facilities. However, it’s important to note that our condominium has specific rules and restrictions that guests need to adhere to: Common Areas: Guests are welcome to use shared facilities such as the gym and swimming pool during designated hours. Please respect posted rules regarding usage and cleanliness. By providing clear information about both the access guests will have and the condominium's specific rules and restrictions, we aim to ensure a comfortable and compliant stay for all our guests at our Airbnb accommodation.Other things to noteLocation: Our apartment is conveniently located in POBLADO, providing easy access to local attractions, dining options, and public transportation. Safety and Security: The building features 24/7 security and surveillance, ensuring a safe environment for our guests throughout their visit. Local Recommendations: We provide a curated list of local restaurants, cafes, and activities that guests can explore to enhance their stay and experience the culture of the area. Check-in and Check-out: Flexible check-in and check-out times are available upon request, accommodating guests' travel schedules whenever possible. Communication: We prioritize clear communication and responsiveness. Guests can reach us easily through Airbnb messaging or phone for any inquiries or assistance during their stay. Accessibility: The apartment is wheelchair accessible and suitable for guests with mobility needs. Please inform us in advance of any specific requirements so we can ensure a comfortable stay. House Rules: We kindly ask guests to respect our no-smoking policy and to adhere to quiet hours to ensure a pleasant environment for everyone in the building.Registration number198743

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy comfort and style at Urban Studios, located in the heart of Medellín (Poblado). Our modern and fully equipped apartments are perfect for business travelers and tourists.

-Just 5 min away from the action
-AC in the room
-No Airbnb's Fees
-Luxury interior design, furnishings
-FREE Washer & Dryer
-Smart TVs
-FREE Co Working Space
-High Speed internet 300MB
-Heated Pool / Jacuzzi / Steam Room
-Complete GYM
-24/7 Lobby & Security
-Cafeteria & SPA on the 4th floor

The space
Our space stands out for its contemporary open-concept design, seamlessly integrating the kitchen, living room, and balcony. This creates a spacious and inviting atmosphere that is perfect for relaxation and enjoyment.

Additionally, we have completely renovated the apartment with modern appliances and stylish furnishings, providing a luxurious and sophisticated environment for our guests.

To ensure our guests' comfort, we have equipped the apartment with thoughtful details. This includes adjustable ambient lighting with dimmers and LED strips, allowing guests to create the perfect atmosphere according to the time of day or personal preference.

The bedrooms feature queen-size bed, ensuring a restful sleep. Moreover, the living room is furnished with a comfortable and elegant sofa for relaxation. The property has two bathrooms: one is a guest bathroom and the other is a private bathroom within the bedroom.

Furthermore, the panoramic views from the balcony offer a stunning visual display of lush green mountains and city lights, enhancing our guests' experience. We strive to provide all necessary amenities, including high-speed WiFi, cable television, and a fully equipped kitchen.

To maintain a fresh and clean environment, we have a strict no-smoking policy throughout the apartment. In summary, our goal is to ensure that every guest feels at home and enjoys a memorable and comfortable experience during their stay at our Airbnb accommodation.

Guest access
Guests will have free access to all areas of the accommodation during their stay. This includes the entire apartment, including the kitchen, living room, bedrooms, and balcony, as well as any shared amenities such as the gym, swimming pool, steam room and parking facilities.

However, it’s important to note that our condominium has specific rules and restrictions that guests need to adhere to: Common Areas: Guests are welcome to use shared facilities such as the gym and swimming pool during designated hours.

Please respect posted rules regarding usage and cleanliness. By providing clear information about both the access guests will have and the condominium's specific rules and restrictions, we aim to ensure a comfortable and compliant stay for all our guests at our Airbnb accommodation.

Other things to note
Location: Our apartment is conveniently located in POBLADO, providing easy access to local attractions, dining options, and public transportation.

Safety and Security: The building features 24/7 security and surveillance, ensuring a safe environment for our guests throughout their visit.

Local Recommendations: We provide a curated list of local restaurants, cafes, and activities that guests can explore to enhance their stay and experience the culture of the area.

Check-in and Check-out: Flexible check-in and check-out times are available upon request, accommodating guests' travel schedules whenever possible.

Communication: We prioritize clear communication and responsiveness. Guests can reach us easily through Airbnb messaging or phone for any inquiries or assistance during their stay.

Accessibility: The apartment is wheelchair accessible and suitable for guests with mobility needs. Please inform us in advance of any specific requirements so we can ensure a comfortable stay.

House Rules: We kindly ask guests to respect our no-smoking policy and to adhere to quiet hours to ensure a pleasant environment for everyone in the building.

Registration number
198743

locationDescriptions/0/content:
Nestled in the affluent and secure neighborhood of El Tesoro in Medellin, this area offers unparalleled convenience:

Leaving the building, to the left side you can walk straight and you will first find the Amsterdam Plaza mall, then you will find the Mall Del Este and right next to it's the El Tesoro shopping center.

- Just a 2-minute drive or a 7-minute walk away, you'll find Carulla, your go-to supermarket!
- Looking for shopping and entertainment? El Tesoro Mall is only a 5-minute drive or a short 10-minute walk away.
- To experience the vibrant nightlife and culinary scene of the city, Parque Lleras awaits just a 7-minute drive or a 15-minute walk away.
- Additionally, being slightly uphill provides cleaner and cooler air, away from the tourist buzz of Parque Lleras but still close to all the action.

Top 10 Restaurants:
1. Relato (Fusion of Mediterranean, Asian and Latin food)
2. Dos Santos
3. Ritwal
4. Colosal
5. Bamba Negra
6. Toro
7. La Matriarca (Colombian food)
8. Bárbaro Cocina Primitiva.
9. Colosal.
10. Mamasita Medallo.

Top 10 Clubs:
1. Sci
2. La Oculta
3. La Chula Palmas
4. Gusto Club
5. Perro Negro
6. Neutro
7. Cromantic
8. La House
9. Teatro Victoria
10. Salon Amador

Welcome to your new home in El Tesoro, where comfort and lifestyle are perfectly balanced!
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Uber and other transportation platforms work great here.

You can also request reception to order you an official taxi as well.

Simply turn left out of the building and walk along Carrera 25 to arrive at El Tesoro Mall

Turn right out of the building, then your first left to head down Calle 10 to arrive at Provenza and Parque Lleras.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Escape to a nature filled oasis in the heart of El Poblado, Medellin's trendiest neighborhood! Relax in your private jacuzzi surrounded by lush greenery. Two cozy bedrooms, a spacious living and dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen await. Perfect for nature lovers seeking tranquility near Medellín's vibrant city life.

The space
- No Airbnb’s Fees
- Private jacuzzi and deck surrounded by abundant nature, equipped with sun loungers.
- Air-conditioned bedrooms.
- Private security
- Cleaning services
- Smart TVs in all rooms.
- Ultra-fast internet connection.
- Fully equipped kitchen.
- Luxury furnishings.

Guest access
Guests are granted exclusive access to the entire property, ensuring privacy and comfort throughout their stay. This includes unrestricted access to all rooms, amenities, and outdoor spaces. The highlight of their stay is the private jacuzzi, nestled within the tranquil surroundings of the property. This jacuzzi is reserved solely for the enjoyment of the guests, providing a secluded retreat to unwind and relax.

Whether lounging on the deck, soaking in the jacuzzi, or exploring the lush surroundings, guests can enjoy the entirety of the property at their leisure

**Additionally, guests will share only the main entrance with other visitors, ensuring their privacy is maintained within the confines of their own space.**

Other things to note
Tranquil Retreat: Escape to a serene oasis nestled amidst abundant nature, offering a peaceful sanctuary away from the hustle and bustle of city life.

Nature's Haven: Immerse yourself in the sights and sounds of the natural world, with lush greenery and soothing sounds providing a tranquil backdrop for relaxation.

Perfect for Relaxation: Whether you're looking to unwind with a good book, meditate in solitude, or simply soak in the serene ambiance, this space offers the ideal environment for relaxation and rejuvenation.

Secluded Sanctuary: Enjoy the privacy and seclusion of a tranquil retreat, where the only interruptions are the gentle rustle of leaves and the chorus of birdsong.

Opportunities for Reflection: With ample outdoor spaces and secluded corners to explore, guests can take time to reflect, recharge, and reconnect with nature and themselves.

Unwind in Nature: Spend your days basking in the sunlight on the deck, enjoying leisurely walks through the surrounding greenery, or simply lounging in the jacuzzi as you let your worries melt away.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
El barrio Alejandría en El Poblado, Medellín, is a high-end residential community known for its tranquil and exclusive atmosphere. Located in one of the city's most prestigious areas, Alejandría offers a sophisticated and comfortable lifestyle for its residents.

The streets of Alejandría are lined with trees and well-maintained gardens, creating a serene and pleasant environment. The homes in this neighborhood are primarily modern and elegant, featuring a mix of luxury apartments, townhouses, and single-family residences. Many of these properties offer stunning views of the city and surrounding mountains.

Security is a priority in Alejandría, with private surveillance and security systems providing peace of mind for residents. Additionally, the neighborhood's infrastructure is well-developed, with paved streets, reliable utilities, and convenient access to public transportation.

Alejandría also boasts a variety of nearby amenities, including shopping centers, supermarkets, gourmet restaurants, and cozy cafes. Residents can enjoy a wide range of entertainment and dining options without having to travel far from home.

Furthermore, Alejandría's strategic location provides easy access to parks, green areas, and recreational spaces, allowing residents to enjoy outdoor activities and maintain an active and healthy lifestyle.

In summary, the neighborhood of Alejandría in El Poblado, Medellín, is an exclusive residential enclave that offers security, convenience, and a high quality of life for its residents, making it one of the most sought-after places to live in the city.
locationDescriptions/1/content: In the vicinity of Poblado Alejandría in Medellín, you'll find a variety of fascinating places to explore. Just a 10-minute walk away, you can discover the vibrant Parque Lleras and Provenza known for their lively nightlife and wide selection of bars and restaurants. If you prefer a more relaxed atmosphere, within a 10-minute walk, you'll find the Santa Fe shopping center, Oviedo shopping center, which offers a wide range of shops, restaurants, and relaxation spots. Additionally, a short drive away, you can visit the Museum of Modern Art of Medellín and Parque Explora, ideal for a dose of culture and educational fun.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Spacious room, cozy, double bed, closet, chair, fan.
The house has a living room, dining room, two patios, garden, large kitchen, good lighting, A lot of peace and quiet is breathed, there are many plants and lots of natural light. It is cozy and quiet. We have hotel insurance.
Coworking area with desk, chair, 500MB internet.
Coffee, tea, or aquapanela are offered.

The space
It is a family space, with a sober decoration. You can use the kitchen, the living room, the dining room, the patio, the rest areas that you find throughout the house. No pets, and no smoking. If you want to smoke, the house has a large sidewalk with 2 planters where you can sit and smoke.

The house is a first floor and has a second floor independent of ours.

Guest access
Inside the common areas are the living-dining room, patio, backyard, kitchen and bathroom. CoWorking area. Space to store your food in the kitchen and refrigerator, in addition to cooking your own food, washing machine area with a cost of $10,000 use or hand washing if you want, there is a large patio where the direct sun enters to dry clothes.

During your stay
We are a family of two adults, in the house there is one person, available for whatever you need, we love to welcome guests to our house, to meet at the time they want, to tell them the stories of our beautiful city. Otherwise, very respectful of their spaces.

Other things to note
The house is very large and cozy, quiet, with many plants and furniture to relax...

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Luxurious and spectacular apartment Located in an exclusive and quiet area of Poblado.

The apartment has a large balcony with a spectacular view that you will enjoy while you are in the jacuzzi and BBQ zone. A huge bright and fresh living room and equipped kitchen. There is a washer and dryer.

Temporarily from February to March, one of the apartments is under renovation. Because of this, you might hear some noise during your stay.

Guest access
The building has a 24-hour doorman, swimming pool, gym, Jacuzzi, sauna, coworking and games area.

Other things to note
The building is still finishing the construction but doesn't affect your stay. The construction is noise only during the day.

The wet areas can be used with a reservation from 9:30am to 5:30pm.

The Swimming pool is only missing the heating

description: • Amazing Location. El Poblado. The best area in Medellin. Steps to great restaurants, cafes, 24/7 supermarket• Private hot tub in your Loft + Hot Tubs in common areas• 15 min walk to Provenza, Lleras and Poblado Parks• Air Conditioning• Fast 300 Mb WiFi• Modern, independent, fully furnished Loft in a building with other private Lofts• On site 24/7 staff• 43" Smart TV with Smart Apps• Equipped kitchen• Strictly cleaned• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxesThe space- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. Forget about needing taxis/Uber for enjoying great food, cafes, or shopping.- PERFECT HOME BASE FOR YOUR PLANS IN MEDELLIN: Enjoy the convenience of staying in a prime sector of El Poblado, where everything you need is within arm's reach. Besides, easily access popular attractions like "Lleras Park" and "Provenza" with just a 20-minute walk or a short 5-minute taxi/uber ride. Other tourist spots like "Comuna 13", "Laureles" and more are approximately a 20-minute cab ride away (Medellin is not that big, and easily accesible from a central place like ours).- FULLY EQUIPPED LOFT IN BUILDING WITH OTHER LOFTS: You'll have great amenities for a great stay at a great price: The entire Loft (small apartment) is only for you: Private Hot Tub, Ultra fast internet & ethernet port, 43″ Smart TV, Queen bed (1.60 m wide), fully equipped kitchen, safe lock, etc. Our 24/7 staff is always ready to help and provide what you needEASY CHECK-IN: Very convenient and seamless check-in process facilitated by our 24/7 staff. Simply bring your physical ID (passport or cedula). For the comfort and safety of all guests, kindly ensure your visitors also have their physical IDs readily available.- VERY FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET: We are software engineers and we are obsessed with super fast and very reliable internet. Every Loft has its own router (AP) to guarantee the best WiFi signal possible, plus it has ethernet connection available. Geek note: we have 2 fast, independent internet service providers balanced and each one configured as a backup link of the other, that means it's very reliable and fast- AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICES: There are not hidden fees or extra charges, the final price is the one you pay on Airbnb. We don't charge visitor fee, taxes, service or cleaning fee. You can have one visitor at a time, absolutely no under 18 years old- FREE LAUNDRY SERVICE: On-site staff can wash and dry your clothes at no extra cost (tips are voluntary and go 100% to them). One load of laundry per night of your stay. Your clothes will be ready at the latest by the following day.- SAFE LOCK, ROUTER WITH ETHERNET, CLOTHES IRON, HAIR DRYER, CLOTHING STORAGE: Those are among the most requested amenities from our guests, and you have them all. If you don't see them in your Loft, just reach out to our 24/7 staff. Thinks like clothing storage are provided upon request (not many use them and takes space from the loft). Also Iron and Hair dryer are provided upon request since Colombian Law doesn't allow tho leave them inside the rooms, because of the fire riskGuest accessYou are booking Loft (small apartment), exactly the one shown in the pictures. The Loft is in a building with 3 floors and with other Lofts. Your Loft is totally independent and equipped. Only you can access your Loft with your access card (given to you upon check-in)You can also enjoy the common areas of the building: Hot tubs in the common area on the third floor and the living room on the common area on the first floor.Registration number201283

• Equipped kitchen
• Strictly cleaned
• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxes

The space
- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. Forget about needing taxis/Uber for enjoying great food, cafes, or shopping.

- PERFECT HOME BASE FOR YOUR PLANS IN MEDELLIN: Enjoy the convenience of staying in a prime sector of El Poblado, where everything you need is within arm's reach. Besides, easily access popular attractions like "Lleras Park" and "Provenza" with just a 20-minute walk or a short 5-minute taxi/uber ride. Other tourist spots like "Comuna 13", "Laureles" and more are approximately a 20-minute cab ride away (Medellin is not that big, and easily accesible from a central place like ours).

- FULLY EQUIPPED LOFT IN BUILDING WITH OTHER LOFTS: You'll have great amenities for a great stay at a great price: The entire Loft (small apartment) is only for you: Private Hot Tub, Ultra fast internet & ethernet port, 43″ Smart TV, Queen bed (1.60 m wide), fully equipped kitchen, safe lock, etc. Our 24/7 staff is always ready to help and provide what you need

EASY CHECK-IN: Very convenient and seamless check-in process facilitated by our 24/7 staff. Simply bring your physical ID (passport or cedula). For the comfort and safety of all guests, kindly ensure your visitors also have their physical IDs readily available.

- VERY FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET: We are software engineers and we are obsessed with super fast and very reliable internet. Every Loft has its own router (AP) to guarantee the best WiFi signal possible, plus it has ethernet connection available. Geek note: we have 2 fast, independent internet service providers balanced and each one configured as a backup link of the other, that means it's very reliable and fast

- AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICES: There are not hidden fees or extra charges, the final price is the one you pay on Airbnb. We don't charge visitor fee, taxes, service or cleaning fee. You can have one visitor at a time, absolutely no under 18 years old

- FREE LAUNDRY SERVICE: On-site staff can wash and dry your clothes at no extra cost (tips are voluntary and go 100% to them). One load of laundry per night of your stay. Your clothes will be ready at the latest by the following day.

- SAFE LOCK, ROUTER WITH ETHERNET, CLOTHES IRON, HAIR DRYER, CLOTHING STORAGE: Those are among the most requested amenities from our guests, and you have them all. If you don't see them in your Loft, just reach out to our 24/7 staff. Thinks like clothing storage are provided upon request (not many use them and takes space from the loft). Also Iron and Hair dryer are provided upon request since Colombian Law doesn't allow tho leave them inside the rooms, because of the fire risk

Guest access
You are booking Loft (small apartment), exactly the one shown in the pictures. The Loft is in a building with 3 floors and with other Lofts. Your Loft is totally independent and equipped. Only you can access your Loft with your access card (given to you upon check-in)
You can also enjoy the common areas of the building: Hot tubs in the common area on the third floor and the living room on the common area on the first floor.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
This building is located in one of the most centric zones in Medellin, It is Comfortable and 24/7 Check-In, and is located very close to Mall Molinos, which makes it a perfect place to visit Medellin and see the most tourist places in the city, central location near to principal avenues, Metro Plus, Restaurants, ATMs, Supermarkets, Laundry among others. The flat area makes your walking trips very easy

The space
This modern and safe apartment is located in a very elegant building, with high-speed unlimited wifi.

The apartment range from 100m2 and has 3 bedrooms each with a queen bed size, A bathroom, and a closet. The Kitchen has a refrigerator, stove, coffeemaker, blender, and basic tools you need to cook or entertain at home with a table with 4 chairs and a bar table with two chairs to enjoy your meals.

The building is located in Santa Gema neighborhood very close to Molino's shopping center, avenue 33, and Laurles Parks, where you will find a large number of recognized restaurants, banks, pharmacies, supermarkets, shopping stores, and others. With easy access to the public transport routes that go to the south, the center, and the metro station. Also, you will find tourist attractions such as Cerro Nutibara, Pueblito Paisa, and Parques del Río are just 5 min away by car.

Guest access
Guests will have access to a complete and private apartment, located in a safe area of the city. We offer unlimited wifi, a kitchen equipped with basic utensils to prepare your meals (Gas/electric stove, glasses, plates, cutlery, pots, blender, coffee maker, refrigerator and spatulas). You can also find a bed with sheets, blankets, pillows, towels, and TV.

Capacity: 6
rooms: 3
type of accommodation: apartment
bathrooms: 2.5
beds: 3

Other things to note
- Colombian law requires reporting your information to migration. You must complete a form on the Hospy platform, you will get an email for it. Access to the property will only be granted if all guests are duly registered on the 'Hospy' platform, which is our official means for guest registration with the Ministry of Tourism. (Photos of the documents are requested)

- In reception, original documents of guest and visitors are requested.

- Minors must enter with one of their parents and present their printed identification and civil registration of the child's birth. Admission is prohibited as long as they do not enter with their parents. In case of traveling without the parents, a notarized permit with photocopies of the parents' cards is required.

- As property managers intended for tourism, we welcome Law 1336 of 2009 that fights against exploitation, pornography and sex tourism with children and adolescents.

-Only one visitor is allowed at a time in the apartment. Before check-in, please share your visitor's details (name, ID, and photo) with our host.
Please note that only current legal documents are accepted: cédula para Colombianos and passport for foreigners.

- The use of Netflix is with personal accounts, not provided by us

- Only one person to visit per apartment is allowed
