host/about: My daughter, wife and I currently live and host in Colombia. We love travelling the world to absorb new experiences, cultures, foods, sounds, architecture, meet new people and simply have a good time. We typically stay at Airbnb's to absorb more of the local vibe in order to give back to the Airbnb community we also host at our place.
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Spectacular apartment in 2nd to last floor of a high rise with breathtaking 360 degree views of Medellin.

Tastefully decorated and stocked with everything you need for an optimal stay.

Strategically located within walking distance to all the boutiques, bars, coffee shops, malls, supermarkets, restaurants and nightlife in the Lleras / Provenza / Manila / Astorga neighborhoods of El Poblado. This unique place has a style of its own.

The space
The apartment is located at 2nd to last floor of a modern building with 24 hour doorman, perimeter security, elevators, plenty of guest parking and on the 5th floor you will have access to swimming pool, sun deck, steam room and fitness center.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms; the master suite has a a king size bed and the junior suite has a queen size bed, both beds have super comfy orthopedic grade mattresses dressed with high thread count bed linen to ensure you get a proper rest. Both suites have en-suite bathrooms, hair dryers, walk-in closets, high definition smart TV's, air conditioner and ceiling ventilators.

There's a studio area separated by curtains from the rest of the apartment for privacy; this area is ideal for work but can also double up as a room for an additional guest on a high grade self inflatable mattress. The studio has easy access to the social toilet but shower would need to be shared with one of the suites.

The living room is fitted out with a 65" high definition smart TV.

Guests have a choice of eating at the dining table or at the balcony bar though both areas command spectacular views.

Unwind at our spectacular balcony with unobstructed breathtaking views of the mountain range and city, complete with bar, gas BBQ, and rocking chairs.

The kitchen is fully fitted out with refrigerator, stove, traditional oven, microwave oven, dishwasher, juicer, blender, coffee machine, cookware, cutlery, dishware, and all cooking utensils.

Laundry area boasts a modern washer / dryer, vacuum cleaner, iron, iron board.

Last but not least there's highspeed broadband internet with WiFi coverage throughout the whole apartment.

Guest access
Guests will have key-less access to the entire penthouse to themselves and will also have access to the building common areas (parking, gym, pool, steam room, sunbathing area).

Other things to note
As of last year the Colombian government requires airbnb hosts to fill out certain information about the guests that they're hosting in their apartments, taking this into account we, as responsible hosts that follow the law, will require that our guests provide certain information to make sure we can comply with this requirement such as: full names, ID's, travel motive, etc.

1. The pool & Sauna are closed on Mondays due to maintenance.
2. Potential for noise due to a construction relatively close to the building

Registration number
177173
locationDescriptions/0/content:
El Poblado is an upscale neighborhood with a population of roughly 125,000; home to several boutique stores and Medellín’s highest-end shopping malls: El Tesoro, Oviedo and Santafé.

El Poblado is also home to the Zona Rosa, which surrounds Parque Lleras; this is a nightlife area full of clubs, restaurants and bars.

El Poblado is popular with foreigners visiting town due to its strategic location with easy access to tourist attractions in and beyond the city, business travelers have most corporate centers in the vicinity, medical tourists will find the best clinics, hospitals and doctors and all travelers can enjoy the shopping malls, nightlife and restaurants nearby.

El Poblado has a strong police presence and the area is considered one of the safest neighborhoods in Medellin.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Parque Lleras is the epicenter of all entertainment options in the Poblado area; Our building is located close to the action (10 minutes walk) but far from the noise. Alternatively, you can order an Uber or hail a cab and the 6 minute ride will cost aprox. USD 2.
All other main attractions in the city can be easily reached by car and will take between 10 min - 20 min.
Though Medellin has a great public transport system composed of buses, trams, metro and cable cars; we recommend getting around by Uber or Taxi as it is straight forward and the fares are cheap.

host/about:
Hi, my name is Juan Manuel and people used to call me “Juanma”. I love reading, playing the Ukelele and watching indie movies. Also, I enjoy running, walking the city and certainly meeting new people.

I have traveled around the world as many times as I could, and I have lived abroad, but my heart belongs to Medellín. I’m sure you will love it too.

¡Our guest’s happiness is our priority!
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Stop looking, here you have all you need:

-High-speed internet great for remote work
-Brand new A/C
-Luxury and good quality furniture
-Balcony with breathtaking views of Medellín and surrounded by nature (two-in-one view)
-Unbeatable location in Poblado near to Provenza and Lleras Park
-Modern amenities
-(2) Smart TV
-Fully equipped kitchen
-Washer and dryer
-Pool
-Gym
-Coworking space
-Restaurant inside the building
-Private parking lot
-Smart lock for self check-in
-24/7 Security

The space
Located in one of the highest luxurious and safe neighborhood in Medellin, this place will have the most strategic location adjacent to the popular attractions and nightlife in Medellín. The airport is only a 20-minute drive (if you need a shuttle let us know and we will set it up for you for and additional fee).

- The building offers a double high lobby, free private parking lot, Heated pool, jacuzzi, solarium, steam room, fully equipped gym, pool table, terrace, Coworking space, laundry service (may apply additional charges), conference room, restaurant and tea & coffee lounge. Enjoy all the services as a luxury rental.

- Renting this place, we will offer you our special attention as your personal manager for all doubts, recommendations while your stay (tourist reservations, suggestion for restaurants, procedures in our city, best ways to get in a place and so on).

- We provide 2 firm and 2 soft pillows for each bed for your comfort.

- For stays of more than 7 days we offer a complementary cleaning service whenever you want (Additional charges apply and subject to availability).

- The apartment has perfect natural light, ideally for reading or working remotely.

- 24 hour security at our front desk and easy communication with the front man.

- Secure digital door and personalized access code that belongs only to you. ¡No carrying keys around!

- There is a delicious café and restaurant just downstairs on the 4th floor for breakfast, brunch, lunch, dinner or just a meal.

- Feel free to ask If you need more information. Our guest’s happiness brings us joy.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment, as well as shared access to the building's communal areas.

Passport (for foreigners) or "Cédula id" (for Colombian citizens) in physical version and originals are required to check in.

Other things to note
Most popular routes and time by car and distance:

To Provenza 5 min / 2 km – 1 mi
To Parque Lleras 6 min / 2.1 km – 1.1 mi
To Poblado's metro station 7 min / 2,8 km – 1,8 mi
To City center 15 min / 6,3 km – 3,8 mi
To airport 20 min / 19,7 km – 12,2 mi

The TV provided has access to the main streaming platforms, however the guest should use their own account.

Please always be respectful of your neighbors and surroundings.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
We welcome you to an oasis of design and comfort just a few minutes' walk from the Provenza area and Parque Lleras. Our central location allows you to access the exciting nightlife and trendy restaurants while ensuring a quiet and relaxing stay away from the hustle and bustle of this area. Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located accommodation.

The space
Welcome to our unique property, surrounded by nature. This space features a 40 square meter (430 square feet) studio apartment, all in one integrated layout. It includes a king-sized bed, air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a two-burner induction cooktop, and an incredible outdoor terrace spanning 56 square meters (600 square feet). On this private terrace, you'll find a fabulous jacuzzi, perfect for relaxing and taking in the natural beauty that surrounds you.

Registration number
178576
locationDescriptions/0/content:
Welcome to this spectacular accommodation in Medellín, nestled within a charming complex of only 9 exclusive studio apartments. Here, you'll find the perfect balance between tranquility and the vibrant heartbeat of the city.

Our property is strategically located in the heart of El Poblado, one of Medellín's most lively areas. Additionally, you'll be residing in a residential haven that offers a genuine oasis, surrounded by nature. Just a delightful 4-minute stroll away, you'll discover Provenza, a hub brimming with restaurants, bars, and trendy boutiques. You'll be at the epicenter of the action, all while enjoying the peace and serenity that our exclusive complex provides.

We invite you to savor a unique stay in our accommodation and explore all that this exciting city has to offer. We hope your experience in Medellín will be truly unforgettable!
locationDescriptions/1/content: We recommend exploring the area on foot; a car is not necessary, and Uber service is very affordable. If you arrive by car, there is complimentary parking available. The neighborhood is safe and conveniently located near restaurants, grocery stores, and bars

htmlDescription/htmlText:
•THE SPACE

Enjoy your stay in this modern and chic 2 bedroom apartment located on the 10th floor of Medellin’s most up and coming neighborhood of Laureles-Estadio. The space offers modern finishes, 2 bedrooms each equipped with a 40 inch tv, 1 bathroom, fast and reliable WiFi for a convenient stay, amazing picturesque views with plenty of large windows ensuring a stylish and comfortable stay.

Other things to note
THE AREA

Laureles-Estadio is an exclusive neighborhood in the heart of Medellin, Recently named Time Out Magazine’s “Coolest neighborhood in the world 2023” is conveniently located to anything you might need and are looking for, very centralized area ,la 70 avenue which is home to many restaurants and bars and one of the city’s main attractions is just a 1 block away walk from the apartment for entertainment and night life, during the day you also have just steps away El Estadio Atanasio sports complex with its many sports amenities as well as soccer events and concert events, also steps away is a gym and various stores and supermarkets such as el Éxito.
10th floor - amazing views, mountain sunset
Laundry included

Getting around

5 mins walk to Estacion Estadio subway as well as many buses to take anywhere In The city
Various bike paths and city bikes to rent
1 block away from gyms
5 mins walk to super market (Éxito la 70)
5 mins walk to El Estadio (Atanasio Giradot)
15 drive to El Poblado
15 min drive to La Comuna 13
3 min walk to La 70 (many restaurants, bars and bakeries)
Shopping malls -Los molinos , Unicentro, El Obelisco, El Diamente
La Macarana Event Center
Parque Laureles
Home Center
Jumbo

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Energy Living is the coolest building in Medellin.
apt 704 is a corner studio apartment with a covered balcony. 68 square meters of apt with 20 square meters of balcony. walking distance to parque lleras, supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, las palmas highway.
infinity roof pool, jacuzzi, steamroom and gym are really nice with amazing views of medellin. RESTAURANT and BAR in lobby with ROOM SERVICE
***a PRIVATE jacuzzi has just been installed on the balcony***
Registro Nacional Turismo# 101427

The space
always meticulously cleaned with disenfectants. private jacuzzi on balcony, super chic studio apt with 2 sided, covered balcony. Enormous walk-in bathroom, nice furniture, comfortable and cozy apt in best building in medellin. Infinity pool, Jacuzzi, steam room and gym on roof with spectacular views of medellin. 1 AC, 100 MB internet, 40inch cable tv, landline. RESTAURANT and BAR in lobby with ROOM SERVICE.

Guest access
all of the apt and common areas in the building. The pool, jacuzzi and steam room close for cleaning on Mondays (or Tuesday if Monday was a holiday) .restaurant has room service and Bar.

todo el apt y los zonas communes. la piscina, jacuzzi y turco se cierran para limpieza todos los lunes (o martes si lunes fue festivo).

Other things to note
Early check-in, IF AVAILABLE, is an extra $20.

Late check-out, IF AVAILABLE, is an extra $20.

host/about:
Hey there!  This is Susana, Property Manager at Casacol, the largest foreign real estate advisor and property management in Medellín. We pride ourselves on managing some of the finest apartments in Medellin in the best locations while providing the best customer service in the city. 

I am here not only to find you a great place to stay but also to ensure you have a great time. I can personally direct you to the best the city has to offer whether that's the newest and best restaurants, latest nightlife trends or day trip activities in or outside Medellin. 

Casacol is also a full service real estate advisory firm and active member of the Real Estate Association of Medellin, La Lonja. Every apartment you see on Airbnb is owned by one of our investors and many of our guests have found Medellín not just a wonderful city but a highly profitable place to invest in. 

I look forward to having you in one of our more than 400 furnished rental options to suit every style, location and budget. Don't hesitate to get in touch for rentals and investment opportunities. 

Susana.
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Indulge in luxury at Medellin nestled in the vibrant heart of the Provenza neighborhood. Enjoy opulent furnishings, private Jacuzzi, views of the city skyline, and cutting-edge amenities. Each meticulously designed 2 bed/2.5ba residence provides ultimate comfort and sophistication. Immerse yourself in Provenza's cafes, boutiques, and renowned nightlife, all just steps away. Experience Medellin's finest at our building, where every detail is curated for an unparalleled stay.

The space
✨OUR HIGHLIGHTS ✨

🌟> Free cleaning 7 days a week on request
🌟> Private key card elevator access to every floor
🌟> Private Jacuzzi on every floor
🌟> AC throughout
🌟> Fully equipped kitchens w/ Ice Maker and Nespresso
🌟> Projector screen in living room, Smart Frame TVs in bedrooms
🌟> Oppulent king size beds
🌟> Luxuriously appointed bathrooms with steam shower
🌟> Front/Rear terrace in every unit
🌟> Private 24 hour security
🌟> All services on request like private chef, massage, transportation, medic.

Guest access
🌟> Self Check-in or arrange the check-in with your host and apartment tour
🌟> Key coded front door access
🌟> Key coded private elevator acess to your floor
🌟> 24h security

Other things to note
Your reservation includes a free ticket to the Modern Art Museum, if that's something you'd enjoy, ask me for them!

We have strict visitor policies and registration protocols for everyone entering the building, please get fully informed if you're planning on bringing guests.

Minors are not allowed under any circumstances.

Zero Tolerance against sex tourism.

description: Indulge in the epitome of modern living at this stylish, newly remodeled 2-bedroom apartment. Nestled in the heart of Medellin's trendy Barrio Manila, you're just steps away from the city's best dining, nightlife, and cultural attractions.Designed with comfort and sophistication in mind, this apartment features plush bedding, high-speed Wi-Fi, a sleek kitchen, a refreshing rain shower, and stylish décor. Enjoy the perfect blend of relaxation and convenience, all within a vibrant urban setting.The space✭ The Bedrooms:Experience the ultimate in luxury and comfort in our well-designed bedrooms. The master bedroom boasts a spacious queen-size bed, perfect for a restful night's sleep. The guest bedroom is equipped with a comfortable double bed. Both beds are topped with plush Sleep Rite pillows for ultimate comfort. Adjust the lighting to your preference with multiple options available. Ample closet space and 55-inch smart TVs provide added convenience. The master bedroom features an ensuite bathroom with a luxurious rain shower that will leave you feeling rejuvenated. High-quality soaps, shampoo, conditioner and other toiletries are provided for your convenience, making your stay with us even more enjoyable. Both bedrooms also have air conditioning units.✭ The Kitchen:Experience culinary magic in the fully-equipped kitchen, featuring modern LG appliances such as a fridge-freezer with ice and water dispenser, dishwasher, GE microwave-oven, 5-burner stove top, coffee maker, French press, NutriBullet blender, and more. Cook like a professional chef with all the tools you need at your fingertips. Whether you're whipping up a quick breakfast or a gourmet dinner, our kitchen has everything you need to make your meal-making experience a breeze.✭ The Nook:Our cozy corner nook offers the perfect blend of function and style. This versatile space can be used as both a dining area and a workspace.✭ The Laundry RoomOur laundry room is designed to provide guests with maximum convenience and comfort. It is equipped with modern and efficient appliances such as a washer and dryer, vacuum cleaner, iron, and additional storage closets. You'll find everything you need to keep your clothes and linens fresh and clean. The room is also stocked with an extensive assortment of cleaning supplies, including laundry detergent, fabric softener, and ironing spray, to make your stay even more comfortable.Other things to note✭ Gyms: For those looking to stay active during their stay, there are two gyms conveniently located just a 2-minute walk from the apartment. Whether you prefer cardio or weightlifting, both gyms have a variety of equipment to meet your fitness needs. Don't let your workout routine take a vacation, take advantage of this great location and stay on track!Registration number136827

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Indulge in the epitome of modern living at this stylish, newly remodeled 2-bedroom apartment. Nestled in the heart of Medellin's trendy Barrio Manila, you're just steps away from the city's best dining, nightlife, and cultural attractions.

Designed with comfort and sophistication in mind, this apartment features plush bedding, high-speed Wi-Fi, a sleek kitchen, a refreshing rain shower, and stylish décor. Enjoy the perfect blend of relaxation and convenience, all within a vibrant urban setting.

The space
✭ The Bedrooms:

Experience the ultimate in luxury and comfort in our well-designed bedrooms. The master bedroom boasts a spacious queen-size bed, perfect for a restful night's sleep. The guest bedroom is equipped with a comfortable double bed. Both beds are topped with plush Sleep Rite pillows for ultimate comfort. Adjust the lighting to your preference with multiple options available. Ample closet space and 55-inch smart TVs provide added convenience. The master bedroom features an ensuite bathroom with a luxurious rain shower that will leave you feeling rejuvenated. High-quality soaps, shampoo, conditioner and other toiletries are provided for your convenience, making your stay with us even more enjoyable. Both bedrooms also have air conditioning units.

✭ The Kitchen:

Experience culinary magic in the fully-equipped kitchen, featuring modern LG appliances such as a fridge-freezer with ice and water dispenser, dishwasher, GE microwave-oven, 5-burner stove top, coffee maker, French press, NutriBullet blender, and more. Cook like a professional chef with all the tools you need at your fingertips. Whether you're whipping up a quick breakfast or a gourmet dinner, our kitchen has everything you need to make your meal-making experience a breeze.

✭ The Nook:

Our cozy corner nook offers the perfect blend of function and style. This versatile space can be used as both a dining area and a workspace.

✭ The Laundry Room

Our laundry room is designed to provide guests with maximum convenience and comfort. It is equipped with modern and efficient appliances such as a washer and dryer, vacuum cleaner, iron, and additional storage closets. You'll find everything you need to keep your clothes and linens fresh and clean. The room is also stocked with an extensive assortment of cleaning supplies, including laundry detergent, fabric softener, and ironing spray, to make your stay even more comfortable.

Other things to note

✭ Gyms: For those looking to stay active during their stay, there are two gyms conveniently located just a 2-minute walk from the apartment. Whether you prefer cardio or weightlifting, both gyms have a variety of equipment to meet your fitness needs. Don't let your workout routine take a vacation, take advantage of this great location and stay on track!

host/about:
Hi Danielle and Victor, your hosts! Victor and I love to travel the world discovering unique places but always looking for the same comfort we would have in our own home. I am an interior designer, hence my passion in creating a unique space in which every corner makes you vibrate. And, thanks to all the world trips Victor makes for work, we've created the perfect space to cover all your needs and feel like you've never been to such a comfortable place to rest or discover one of the most vibrant cities in the world.

Now we want you to live unique experiences that make your visit an indelible souvenir in your memory. Here you will have a space designed for you, in which each corner will make you feel at home every time you return from a new adventure in Medellín. Welcome!
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy a luxurious experience in this central home. Fully furnished suite and fabulous spaces for: kitchen, independent bathroom, desk, dining room, sofa, with air conditioning and wifi. It has a spectacular view of the city and the mountains. You can make use of the coworking area, gym and cafeteria.

The space
The place is in one perfectly distributed environment. It has a private bathroom, kitchen, 2 spacious closets to locate your clothes and belongings. Instead, it has cabinets under the window where you can store your bags.
It has an area for working and eating and a sofa for resting and/or reading.

Guest access
The building has a spectacular cowork with open internet, located on the second floor, right there you can enjoy an outdoor terrace, the coffee area and the gym.
You can also make use of the reception to comfortably wait for your transport, your guests, or home.

Other things to note
The building has a parking lot inside the property, monitored 24 hours. There are also laundry rooms, located on floors 9, 10 and 11. Each load of washing and drying is worth $8,000, it works only with $2,000 bills.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Stay next to the newly remodeled Calle de la Buena Mesa, Envigado, just steps away from several cafes, restaurants and bars but in a neighborhood that keeps the original Envigado barrio life style.

The room is large with 3 different separated spaces: bedroom with private bathroom, patio and kitchen.

The apartment has 3 independent small apartments so you can share with others as much as you want as you will have all what you need in your own space.

Balcony is amazing, lots of life to see.

The space
Apartment with all you need, private bathroom, kitchen, patio. Outside the apartment there’s a common area with living room, table, laundry and balcony.

Guest access
Common areas are living room and balcony

Other things to note
This is a small apartment inside a big apartment, so living room and balcony are shared

Steps to great restaurants, cafes, 24/7 supermarket, etc.• 15 mins walk to Provenza and Poblado Parks• A/C• High speed 300 Mb WiFi  (router inside your Loft)• Modern, independent, fully furnished Loft in a building with other private Lofts• On site 24/7 staff• Extremely safe neighborhood• 43" Smart TV with Smart Apps• Hot Tubs in common areas• Equipped kitchen• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxesThe space- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. Forget about needing taxis/Uber for enjoying great food, cafes, or shopping.- PERFECT HOME BASE FOR YOUR PLANS IN MEDELLIN: Enjoy the convenience of staying in a prime sector of El Poblado, where everything you need is within arm's reach. Besides, easily access popular attractions like "Lleras Park" and "Provenza" with just a 15-minute walk or a short 5-minute taxi/Uber ride. Other tourist spots like "Comuna 13", "Laureles" and more are approximately a 20-minute cab ride away (Medellin is not that big, and easily accesible from a central place like ours).- FULLY EQUIPPED LOFT IN BUILDING WITH OTHER LOFTS: You'll have great amenities for a great stay at a great price: The entire Loft (small apartment) is only for you: Ultra fast internet & ethernet port, 43″ Smart TV, Queen bed (1.60 m wide), fully equipped kitchen, safe lock, etc. Our 24/7 staff is always ready to help and provide what you need. Also, you have access to hot tubs in a shared space on the third floorEASY CHECK-IN: Very convenient and seamless check-in process facilitated by our 24/7 staff. Simply bring your physical ID (passport or cedula). For the comfort and safety of all guests, kindly ensure your visitors also have their physical IDs readily available.- VERY FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET: We are obsessed with super fast and very reliable internet. Every Loft has its own router (AP) to guarantee the best WiFi signal possible, plus it has ethernet connection available. Geek note: we have 2 fast, independent internet service providers balanced and each one configured as a backup link of the other, that means it's very reliable and fast- AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICES: There are not hidden fees or extra charges, the final price is the one you pay on Airbnb. We don't charge visitor fee, taxes, service or cleaning fee. You can have one visitor at a time, absolutely no under 18 years old- FREE LAUNDRY SERVICE: On-site staff can wash and dry your clothes at no extra cost (tips are voluntary and go 100% to them). One load of laundry per night of your stay. Your clothes will be ready at the latest by the following day.- SAFE LOCK, ROUTER WITH ETHERNET, CLOTHES IRON, HAIR DRYER, CLOTHING STORAGE: Those are among the most requested amenities from our guests, and you have them all. If you don't see them in your Loft, just reach out to our 24/7 staff. Thinks like clothing storage are provided upon request (not many use them and takes space from the loft). htmlDescription/htmlText:
• Amazing Location. El Poblado. The best area in Medellin. Steps to great restaurants, cafes, 24/7 supermarket, etc.
• 15 mins walk to Provenza and Poblado Parks
• A/C
• High speed 300 Mb WiFi (router inside your Loft)
• Modern, independent, fully furnished Loft in a building with other private Lofts
• On site 24/7 staff
• Extremely safe neighborhood
• 43" Smart TV with Smart Apps
• Hot Tubs in common areas
• Equipped kitchen
• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxes

The space
- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. Forget about needing taxis/Uber for enjoying great food, cafes, or shopping.

- PERFECT HOME BASE FOR YOUR PLANS IN MEDELLIN: Enjoy the convenience of staying in a prime sector of El Poblado, where everything you need is within arm's reach. Besides, easily access popular attractions like "Lleras Park" and "Provenza" with just a 15-minute walk or a short 5-minute taxi/Uber ride. Other tourist spots like "Comuna 13", "Laureles" and more are approximately a 20-minute cab ride away (Medellin is not that big, and easily accesible from a central place like ours).

- FULLY EQUIPPED LOFT IN BUILDING WITH OTHER LOFTS: You'll have great amenities for a great stay at a great price: The entire Loft (small apartment) is only for you: Ultra fast internet & ethernet port, 43″ Smart TV, Queen bed (1.60 m wide), fully equipped kitchen, safe lock, etc. Our 24/7 staff is always ready to help and provide what you need. Also, you have access to hot tubs in a shared space on the third floor

EASY CHECK-IN: Very convenient and seamless check-in process facilitated by our 24/7 staff. Simply bring your physical ID (passport or cedula). For the comfort and safety of all guests, kindly ensure your visitors also have their physical IDs readily available.

- VERY FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET: We are obsessed with super fast and very reliable internet. Every Loft has its own router (AP) to guarantee the best WiFi signal possible, plus it has ethernet connection available. Geek note: we have 2 fast, independent internet service providers balanced and each one configured as a backup link of the other, that means it's very reliable and fast

- AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICES: There are not hidden fees or extra charges, the final price is the one you pay on Airbnb. We don't charge visitor fee, taxes, service or cleaning fee. You can have one visitor at a time, absolutely no under 18 years old

- FREE LAUNDRY SERVICE: On-site staff can wash and dry your clothes at no extra cost (tips are voluntary and go 100% to them). One load of laundry per night of your stay. Your clothes will be ready at the latest by the following day.

- SAFE LOCK, ROUTER WITH ETHERNET, CLOTHES IRON, HAIR DRYER, CLOTHING STORAGE: Those are among the most requested amenities from our guests, and you have them all. If you don't see them in your Loft, just reach out to our 24/7 staff. Thinks like clothing storage are provided upon request (not many use them and takes space from the loft). Also Iron and Hair dryer are provided upon request since Colombian Law doesn't allow tho leave them inside the rooms, because of the fire risk

Guest access
You are booking Loft (small apartment), exactly the one shown in the pictures. The Loft is in a building with 3 floors and with other Lofts. Your Loft is totally independent and equipped. Only you can access your Loft with your access card (given to you upon check-in)
You can also enjoy the common areas of the building: Hot tubs in the common area on the third floor and the living room on the common area on the first floor.

Other things to note
- Your private Loft has a small patio/balcony (as shown in the pictures). It is protected with a fence for your privacy and safety, and it has no views
- If you have any issue, please let us know. We will do everything we can for you to have a great stay

locationDescriptions/0/content: Downtown Medellin is vibrant and diverse. It is full of historic and modern buildings, with magical  and surprising streets that house a mix of shops, restaurants and places of cultural interest. You can easily get around on the tram and find amazing places, squares with sculptures and fountains, as well as ancient churches and buildings that reflect the history of the city. The varied architecture and bright colors of the buildings create a unique atmosphere. The lifestyle is energetic and varied. The area is a melting pot of cultures and activities. During the day, the streets are filled with people working in local businesses, students, and tourists exploring the shops, restaurants, crafts, and cultural attractions. You'll find street markets and plenty of dining options, from traditional food stalls to more stylish restaurants. Nightlife is also lively, with bars, nightclubs, and cultural events often taking place in plazas and public spaces. It's important to note, as in any city center, it's a good idea to be on the lookout for safety and take precautions. In short, the neighborhood offers a mix of activities, experiences, and people reflecting the city's diversity and vitality.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
1. Identify your starting point: Make sure you know where you're starting your trip from. It may be helpful to use apps to get accurate directions in real time.

2. Use the public transport system. To get to the Bicentenario station, you must arrive at a metro station and then combine with the tram.

3. Take the subway: If you're not close to a subway station, head to the nearest one. The Medellin subway has several lines. If you're on Line A (blue), be sure to head towards the north direction.

4. Transhipment to Tram: Once at a San Antonio subway station, look for directions or ask the station staff how to transfer to the Bicentennial Tram. Exit the metro station and follow the signs in the area to get to the station and take the tram.

5. Arrival at the accommodation: when you arrive at the Bicentennial of the tram station (4th stop), exit the station and head northwest on Av. Ayacucho/Cl. 49 towards Cra. 38. Turn left with direction to Cra. 38 and walk 50m. You'll find your destination right at the Aiana Verde building.

6. Access to the accommodation: enter the building by the concierge and record your information with the security guard, indicating that you will be staying in apartment 402. Take the left tower elevator up to the 4th floor and locate the bottom of the hallway. Tap the digital lock board until the keypad is activated, enter the passcode sent by the host followed by the # key, and that's it...

Enjoy your time!!

Remember to check updated times and routes before starting your trip as there may be changes due to maintenance or other circumstances.

The space
One bedroom apartment, in space of 75 m2 and generous spaces. Its large balcony covers the social area and the room, so from your bed you can have an exclusive view of the city, you can also swim in a comfortable hammock enjoying the same view.

This brand new loft is ideal for two or 3 people , it has a double bed and semi-double sofacama, it has an equipped kitchen, bathroom with hot water, it has a 500 megabyte fiber optic internet work studio, tV and Netflix channels, it has a nice balcony to sit down for coffee; we also have a private rooftop with an incredibly beautiful panoramic view of the city, where you can make BBQ and enjoy the sunset...

Other things to note
We offer antioque and American homemade breakfast service, very delicious; for an additional price.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in our Airbnb room, nestled just moments away from the lively Viva Envigado Shopping Center. As our valued guest, you'll not only enjoy a cozy private room and bathroom but also have the added convenience of on-site laundry facilities.

The space
Step into a thoughtfully designed space, adorned with cozy furnishings and bathed in natural light. Your room is a peaceful haven where you can unwind after a day of exploration in Antioquia. Sink into a plush bed, and make use of the modern amenities that make your stay enjoyable.

Guest access
Private Bathroom:
Adjacent to your room is your private bathroom, ensuring that you have the convenience and privacy you desire. Freshen up with ease in this well-appointed space, equipped with all the essentials for a relaxing shower.

Air Conditioning:
Beat the tropical heat with the added luxury of air conditioning in your room. Whether you're returning from a day of sightseeing or just want to relax in a cool, comfortable space, the air conditioning ensures your comfort throughout your stay.

Laundry Facilities:
We understand the importance of convenience during your travels, which is why we provide on-site laundry facilities. Feel free to refresh your wardrobe at your convenience, making your stay even more enjoyable and stress-free.

Location:
Situated in the heart of Antioquia, our Airbnb is strategically placed for you to explore the vibrant surroundings. With Viva Envigado Shopping Center just a stone's throw away, you'll have easy access to a plethora of shopping, dining, and entertainment options.

Other things to note
We offer transport service (private car) from the international airport to the loft ask for cost. We will waiting you at the flight exit, with a sign with your name at any time. If you prefer other way to get the loft, Metro station is just three streets away. Uber or taxis also are great idea because loft great location, close to all.

host/about:
Hi, my name is Juan Manuel and people used to call me “Juanma”. I love reading, playing the Ukelele and watching indie movies. Also, I enjoy running, walking the city and certainly meeting new people.

I have traveled around the world as many times as I could, and I have lived abroad, but my heart belongs to Medellín. I’m sure you will love it too.

¡Our guest’s happiness is our priority!
host/highlights/1: Most useless skill: I don't feel tickly
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Stop looking, here you have all you need:

-Unbeatable location, walkable and close to everything
-Laureles is “the coolest neighborhood in the world” according to Timeout
-Close to "La 70" boulevard
-High speed internet access ideal for remote work
-Gym
-Cool and fresh apartment
-Modern loft
-Industrial and elegant design
-Rooftop terrace on the top floor of the building with view to all Medellin.
-24/7 security
-Fully equipped kitchen
-Smart lock
-Washing machine
-Parking

The space
Located in one of Medellin's most popular and touristic neighborhoods, this apartment has a strategic location close to the most popular attractions as well as to Medellin's famous nightlife. The airport is only 24 km away (if you need to hire a shuttle service from the airport we can help you with this for an additional charge).

- The building offers a double height lobby, free private parking, top floor terrace overlooking the entire city, sauna, Turkish bath and gym.

- Staying in our apartment, we will offer you our special attention as your personal manager for all the doubts, recommendations during your stay (tourist reservations, suggestion of the best restaurants, procedures in our city, best ways to get to a place and so on).

- We provide 2 firm and 2 soft pillows for your comfort.

- For stays longer than 7 days we offer a complementary cleaning service upon request (additional charges apply and subject to availability).

- The apartment has very good natural light, which is ideal for reading or working.

- The building has 24 hour security.

- Secure digital lock with personalized access code. No keys, no hassle!

- There is a delicious restaurant and cafe right on the 1st floor.

- Feel free to ask if you need more information. We enjoy making our guests' stay enjoyable.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment for their use, as well as shared access to the common areas of the building.

Passport (for foreigners) or identity card (for Colombian citizens) in physical version and originals are required for check in.

Other things to note
Most popular routes by car in time and distance:

To Centro Comercial Unicentro 2 min / 0.3 km - 0.2 mi (Literally 5 minutes walk!).
To UPB University 4 min / 0,7 km - 0,4 mi
To Parque de Laureles 6 min / 1.9 km - 1.2 mi
To Parques del Rio 4 min / 1.2 km - 0.8 mi (Literally 11 minutes walk!)
To Provenza/Lleras 14 min / 6.1 km - 3.8 mi
To the city center 12 min / 3.5 km - 2.2 mi
To the airport 35 min / 24 km - 15.4 mi

The TV has access to major streaming platforms, however, the guest must use their own account.

Please always be respectful of your neighbors and your surroundings.

Registration number
46581

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Enjoy a stylish experience at our new centrally-located apartment with a cozy ambiance, patio and fully equipped kitchen. Close to Arkadia shopping mall, supermarkets, restaurants, bars and health services within walking distance.
This brand new place combines a modern style with lots of details and natural light that makes the space unique and comfortable. You can also work from home with our high speed internet.
Enjoy your stay with us! Also find us as Loto Airbnb Medellin.

The space
This 5 story building is a stand out in the neighborhood. It’s black color facade and plants makes this place unique and eye catching. Newly built you’ll find in Loto a very confortable and stylish way to live the city.
In this place, you can relax yourself with a double size bed, high speed internet and a 50 inches smart tv where you can watch your favorite streaming services. Don’t forget this great apartment has it’s own private patio for you to enjoy our beautiful sunny weather.

Guest access
Loto has its own autonomous keypad lock to the main entrance and apartments so you don’t have to worry about keys. Prior to your arrival we’ll send you a brochure with all the instructions and details to make your check in as smooth as we can. If any questions, let as know! We’re happy to help you.

Other things to note
-A picture or photocopy of your passport will be required before your check-in. You need to show your original and physical passport document or physical Colombian ID (Cedula) at the check-in time. Same for visitors. Fotocopy of the cedula/Passport, contraseña, and complaint are not allowed.

-If you are traveling with a minor, remember to bring civil registration and a document specifying that it is your child. Otherwise, the minor won’t be allowed to stay.

- Only one visitor at the same time.

- Late check out will be charged if you do not leave at the established time

-Reservations for third parties are prohibited.

-The use of Netflix is on your own account

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Loft apartment with elements that make it stand out and give it a sophisticated and distinctive air ideal for rest, it is located in one of the most touristy and central areas of Medellín near the Laureles neighborhood, the Boulevard la 70 and the main events sites of the city . High speed internet up to 400mb Ideal for working as if it were your home office. Easy access to public transportation, restaurants, nightlife, supermarkets, among others.

The space
Discover the charm of our cozy 18-20m2 apartment, where every detail has been carefully selected to offer you an unforgettable stay.

The bedroom features a 1.40m wide double bed dressed in soft, fresh sheets, perfect for a restful rest. At your disposal you will find towels, pillows, and a large closet to store your belongings. Relax by watching your favorite shows on the flat screen TV, or if you need to work, the desk with its comfortable chair will give you the ideal space.

The private bathroom, thought of with taste and style, offers privacy and comfort with all the necessary amenities. The fully-equipped kitchen is ready to inspire your culinary skills, with all the basic utensils you might need. Enjoy the fresh air and a perfect space to rest or share unforgettable moments.

Come and feel at home in our corner of tranquility and comfort.


WELCOME TO MEDELLIN!.

Guest access
- Guests have access to the entire private apartment.

- Capacity: 2 people

- Beds: 1

- Bathrooms: 1

- Ownership: Apartamento

- No Air Conditioning

- Portable Fan

- No elevator

- There is no parking in the property

Other things to note
* CHECK-IN is at 3 pm, online and totally autonomous. Prior to this and to reduce the waiting time you must at least 1 hour in advance:
* Diligentiate guest registration via the link on our HOSPY platform, which you will receive after your reservation has been confirmed.
* Once you have verified that your registration is correct on the same day of your arrival you will receive the access codes to the building and your apartment, and all the additional information to be aware of during your stay.
* Documents Valid for guests and visits:
Foreigners: Pasaporte Físico with the entrance seal to Colombia.
Colombianos: Original Cédula or Digital Legally issued.
Visitors: You'll need to provide a valid physical document in order to enter the building.
* If you are traveling with a minor, remember to bring a civil registration and a document specifying that he or she is your child. Otherwise, you must show an authenticated power of attorney specifying their parents' permission to travel with you.
* Identity documents will not be valid those that are presented in a photocopy.
* By policies of the property only one card will be delivered per apartment (which enables you all the energy and lighting of the same and additional will work as your key, so * always take it with you)
* Late check out will be charged if you don't check out time.
* Only 1 visitor is allowed at the same time (maximum 3 hours)
* Guest under the age of 18 must be in the company of their parents.
* No drug consumption permitted.
* Sexual Tourism is prohibited entirely and strangers entry into the building.
* Quiet hours after 10 pm.
* Use of coworking is only for guests and the hours are from 8:00 am - 9:00 pm.
* We do not have cable TV.
* Use of NetFlix and/or any other digital platform is with your own account.
* Inside the building you have a self-driving Laundry service at an additional cost (Monday to Sunday from 7am-9am; 12pm-3pm and 5pm-7pm)
* CHECK-OUT is no later than 12 midday.

112826

host/about:
Hi! I’m Luisa, Property Manager for Blux at Casacol and Airbnb Superhost in Medellín, Colombia. I manage beautifully Classic apartments in a green, relaxed neighborhood, blending modern comfort with local charm. My goal is to create memorable stays.

As a yoga enthusiast and nature lover, I seek balance between city life and nature. I love to try healthy recipes, with guacamole being a personal favorite!
host/highlights/1: I spend too much time: Working, cooking, going out
htmlDescription/htmlText:
This beautiful apartment in El Poblado is waiting for you. Enjoy a coffee cup on the balcony with a nature view, and work from the apartment with our fast wifi and the desk. On the King size bed, you can rest from the fun nights and sleep well hearing the bird sounds in the morning. It is perfect for a couple get away.

*Zero Tolerance against sex tourism.
*Si eres residente Colombiano debes pagar el IVA adicional.
*Please see our house rules

The space
301 is a beautiful, modern 50m² studio is ready for you. 300 MG wifi speed, 1,5 bath, hand shower, king size bed, washer and dryer and full equipped kitchen will be the perfect getaway for a couple.

The building is located across from a tranquil park, away from traffic and the building itself is also quiet with many resident owners living in the building.

Located in close proximity to Park Lleras, Provenza, and an array of top-notch restaurants, our apartment puts you in the center of all the action. Blux is the best in El Poblado location, comfort and 24/7 check in.

Groceries are just 200 meters away at the Carulla grocery store when needed. Also there are more than 10 restaurants and all major ATMs located directly across the street at the Mall Interplaza.

>>>If you are A COLOMBIAN RESIDENT and you are going to book, PLEASE NOTE that you must pay the ADDITIONAL 19% VAT as it IS NOT INCLUDED or in the AIRBNB payout < <<<

Guest access
But that's not all—we offer exceptional amenities to enhance your stay. host/about: Hello! I'm passionate about hosting and traveling. Creating a welcoming space for guests and exploring diverse cultures are my driving forces. htmlDescription/htmlText:
Discover the best combination beetwin convinience and elegance!

The space
Step into the heart of Medellin's vibrant energy with this conveniently located studio.

Designed for the modern traveler, it's equipped with a speedy 300mb internet connection and workspace, making it an ideal spot for digital nomads. The interior is a fusion of contemporary design, ensuring a welcoming ambiance that truly feels like a second home.

Unwind on the plush king-size bed, and let the air conditioning provide a cool retreat after a day of urban exploration.

Enjoy a nice coffe and breakfast at the nice coffe shop located in the first flor of the building, Just a short walk away from Los Molinos commercial mall offers a plethora of shopping options, restaurants and a delightful movie theater experience.

Within 8 minutes, you'll find yourself in the lively district of Laureles, surrounded by the city's finest restaurants and attractions.

The nearby La Palma Metroplus station ensures easy access to Medellin's must-see places, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in the city's rich culture. This studio is more than just accommodation; it's your perfect base for an enriching and convenient Medellin experience.

Guest access
Feel free to use all the facility and get around the shops at the first floor!

Other things to note
A nice place to inmerse in Medellin and with easy access to public transport!

description: PAY 0% OF THE AIRBNB SERVICE FEE! AN EXCLUSIVE BENEFIT FROM Amoblados Velásquez FOR OUR GUESTS.Queen bed and sofa bed, located in a residential neighborhood in the center of Medellín, which will allow you to travel to the best tourist sites easily, 2 blocks from the "Pabellón del Agua" Tranvía station that connects you to the Metro. Fast and stable Wi-Fi, autonomous entrance, hot water and parking for motorcycles. All you need at your fingertips!The spaceComfortable accommodation with Smart TV, private bathroom with hot water, Wi-Fi, queen bed, fully equipped kitchen and in an excellent location.Guest accessThe building has a washing machine and dryer for a fee.It is located on floor -1 with an elevator.We have motorcycle parking that must be requested in advance.Other things to noteLocated in the vibrant heart of the city where culture and history intertwine around every corner. If you are looking for an authentic experience, you have come to the right place. Our accommodation in Tranvía 40 places you just a few minutes from the most exciting areas of the city. From here, you can immerse yourself in Plaza Botero, where the monumental sculptures of Fernando Botero welcome you with their rounded shapes and unique charm. Right next door, Parque Berrio invites you to mix with local life, enjoying the music, street art and relaxed atmosphere. The imposing Palace of Culture, which rises majestically on the horizon, is a mandatory stop for lovers of history and architecture. And if you have time, don't miss the San Alejo Market, where you can find all kinds of local treasures, from crafts to gastronomic delights. Of course, we cannot forget the delicious Colombian food that you can enjoy in the restaurants and street stalls in the center. How about a freshly made arepa or a natural juice to recharge your batteries before continuing exploring? In short, the center of Medellín is a place full of life and color, where each street hides a story to discover and each experience is an adventure. With our accommodation in Tranvia 40, you will have all this and more at your fingertips. Do not miss it!Registration number217473

htmlDescription/htmlText:
PAY 0% OF THE AIRBNB SERVICE FEE! AN EXCLUSIVE BENEFIT FROM Amoblados Velásquez FOR OUR GUESTS.

Queen bed and sofa bed, located in a residential neighborhood in the center of Medellín, which will allow you to travel to the best tourist sites easily, 2 blocks from the "Pabellón del Agua" Tranvía station that connects you to the Metro. Fast and stable Wi-Fi, autonomous entrance, hot water and parking for motorcycles. All you need at your fingertips!

The space
Comfortable accommodation with Smart TV, private bathroom with hot water, Wi-Fi, queen bed, fully equipped kitchen and in an excellent location.

Guest access
The building has a washing machine and dryer for a fee.

It is located on floor -1 with an elevator.

We have motorcycle parking that must be requested in advance.

Other things to note
Located in the vibrant heart of the city where culture and history intertwine around every corner. If you are looking for an authentic experience, you have come to the right place. Our accommodation in Tranvía 40 places you just a few minutes from the most exciting areas of the city. From here, you can immerse yourself in Plaza Botero, where the monumental sculptures of Fernando Botero welcome you with their rounded shapes and unique charm. Right next door, Parque Berrio invites you to mix with local life, enjoying the music, street art and relaxed atmosphere. The imposing Palace of Culture, which rises majestically on the horizon, is a mandatory stop for lovers of history and architecture. And if you have time, don't miss the San Alejo Market, where you can find all kinds of local treasures, from crafts to gastronomic delights. Of course, we cannot forget the delicious Colombian food that you can enjoy in the restaurants and street stalls in the center. How about a freshly made arepa or a natural juice to recharge your batteries before continuing exploring? In short, the center of Medellín is a place full of life and color, where each street hides a story to discover and each experience is an adventure. With our accommodation in Tranvia 40, you will have all this and more at your fingertips. Do not miss it!

description: • Amazing Location. El Poblado. The best area in Medellin. Steps to great restaurants, cafes, 24/7 supermarket, etc.• 15 mins walk to Provenza and Poblado Parks• A/C• High speed 300 Mb WiFi• Modern, independent, fully furnished Loft in a building with other private Lofts• On site 24/7 staff• 43" Smart TV with Smart Apps• Hot Tubs in common areas• Equipped kitchen• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxes• Small Loft Apartment, great location at a great priceThe space- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. Forget about needing taxis/Uber for enjoying great food, cafes, or shopping.- PERFECT HOME BASE FOR YOUR PLANS IN MEDELLIN: Enjoy the convenience of staying in a prime sector of El Poblado, where everything you need is within arm's reach. Besides, easily access popular attractions like "Lleras Park" and "Provenza" with just a 15-minute walk or a short 5-minute taxi/Uber ride. Other tourist spots like "Comuna 13", "Laureles" and more are approximately a 20-minute cab ride away (Medellin is not that big, and easily accesible from a central place like ours).- FULLY EQUIPPED LOFT IN BUILDING WITH OTHER LOFTS: You'll have great amenities for a great stay at a great price: The entire Loft (small apartment) is only for you: Ultra fast internet & ethernet port, 43″ Smart TV, Queen bed (1.60 m wide), fully equipped kitchen, safe lock, etc. Our 24/7 staff is always ready to help and provide what you need. Also, you have access to hot tubs in a shared space on the third floorEASY CHECK-IN: Very convenient and seamless check-in process facilitated by our 24/7 staff. Simply bring your physical ID (passport or cedula). For the comfort and safety of all guests, kindly ensure your visitors also have their physical IDs readily available.- VERY FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET: We are obsessed with super fast and very reliable internet. Every Loft has its own router (AP) to guarantee the best WiFi signal possible, plus it has ethernet connection available. Geek note: we have 2 fast, independent internet service providers balanced and each one configured as a backup link of the other, that means it's very reliable and fast- AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICES: There are not hidden fees or extra charges, the final price is the one you pay on Airbnb. We don't charge visitor fee, taxes, service or cleaning fee. You can have one visitor at a time, absolutely no under 18 years old- FREE LAUNDRY SERVICE: On-site staff can wash and dry your clothes at no extra cost (tips are voluntary and go 100% to them). One load of laundry per night of your stay. Your clothes will be ready at the latest by the following day.- SAFE LOCK, ROUTER WITH ETHERNET, CLOTHES IRON, HAIR DRYER, CLOTHING STORAGE: Those are among the most requested amenities from our guests, and you have them all. If you don't see them in your Loft, just reach out to our 24/7 staff. Thinks like clothing storage are provided upon request (not many use them and takes space from the loft). Also Iron and Hair dryer are provided upon request since Colombian Law doesn't allow tho leave them inside the rooms, because of the fire riskGuest accessYou are booking a Loft (small apartment), exactly the one shown in the pictures. The Loft is in a building with 3 floors and with other Lofts. Your Loft is totally independent and equipped. Only you can access your Loft with your access card (given to you upon check-in)You can also enjoy the common areas of the building: Hot tubs in the common area on the third floor and the living room on the common area on the first floor.Registration number201283

host/about: Hello! I'm a full-time host and a devoted husband and mother. I love creating welcoming, comfortable spaces for my guests and making sure they have everything they need for an unforgettable stay. Family time is everything to me, and I bring that same warmth to hosting. Looking forward to sharing my space with you!
htmlDescription/htmlText:
• Amazing Location. El Poblado. The best area in Medellin. Steps to great restaurants, cafes, 24/7 supermarket, etc.
• 15 mins walk to Provenza and Poblado Parks
• A/C
• High speed 300 Mb WiFi
• Modern, independent, fully furnished Loft in a building with other private Lofts
• On site 24/7 staff
• 43" Smart TV with Smart Apps
• Hot Tubs in common areas
• Equipped kitchen
• Transparent prices. No extra guest fee (see rules), no extra taxes
• Small Loft Apartment, great location at a great price

The space
- PRIME LOCATION. EL POBLADO, BEST SECTOR: Medellin is an amazing city, and the best neighborhood is El Poblado, but it's a big neighborhood, and many listings in El Poblado are in areas where you can't walk for your daily errands. Our property is in "Alejandria" sector (near "Mall Zona Dos"), where you are literally just a few steps away (1-minute walk) from great restaurants and malls. A 24/7 supermarket is almost next door, and great cafes/brunches just steps away. It's a very safe and beautiful area. Forget about needing taxis/Uber for enjoying great food, cafes, or shopping.

- PERFECT HOME BASE FOR YOUR PLANS IN MEDELLIN: Enjoy the convenience of staying in a prime sector of El Poblado, where everything you need is within arm's reach. Besides, easily access popular attractions like "Lleras Park" and "Provenza" with just a 15-minute walk or a short 5-minute taxi/Uber ride. Other tourist spots like "Comuna 13", "Laureles" and more are approximately a 20-minute cab ride away (Medellin is not that big, and easily accesible from a central place like ours).

- FULLY EQUIPPED LOFT IN BUILDING WITH OTHER LOFTS: You'll have great amenities for a great stay at a great price: The entire Loft (small apartment) is only for you: Ultra fast internet & ethernet port, 43″ Smart TV, Queen bed (1.60 m wide), fully equipped kitchen, safe lock, etc. Our 24/7 staff is always ready to help and provide what you need. Also, you have access to hot tubs in a shared space on the third floor

EASY CHECK-IN: Very convenient and seamless check-in process facilitated by our 24/7 staff. Simply bring your physical ID (passport or cedula). For the comfort and safety of all guests, kindly ensure your visitors also have their physical IDs readily available.

- VERY FAST AND RELIABLE INTERNET: We are obsessed with super fast and very reliable internet. Every Loft has its own router (AP) to guarantee the best WiFi signal possible, plus it has ethernet connection available. Geek note: we have 2 fast, independent internet service providers balanced and each one configured as a backup link of the other, that means it's very reliable and fast

- AFFORDABLE AND TRANSPARENT PRICES: There are not hidden fees or extra charges, the final price is the one you pay on Airbnb. We don't charge visitor fee, taxes, service or cleaning fee. You can have one visitor at a time, absolutely no under 18 years old

- FREE LAUNDRY SERVICE: On-site staff can wash and dry your clothes at no extra cost (tips are voluntary and go 100% to them). One load of laundry per night of your stay. Your clothes will be ready at the latest by the following day.

- SAFE LOCK, ROUTER WITH ETHERNET, CLOTHES IRON, HAIR DRYER, CLOTHING STORAGE: Those are among the most requested amenities from our guests, and you have them all. If you don't see them in your Loft, just reach out to our 24/7 staff. Thinks like clothing storage are provided upon request (not many use them and takes space from the loft). Also Iron and Hair dryer are provided upon request since Colombian Law doesn't allow tho leave them inside the rooms, because of the fire risk

Guest access
You are booking a Loft (small apartment), exactly the one shown in the pictures. The Loft is in a building with 3 floors and with other Lofts. Your Loft is totally independent and equipped. Only you can access your Loft with your access card (given to you upon check-in)
You can also enjoy the common areas of the building: Hot tubs in the common area on the third floor and the living room on the common area on the first floor.

Sworn House is a house with 70 years of construction. It was completely renovated and rescued the charms of a traditional house of the country families.
Spaces were designed to be able to enjoy the whole house. (TV room, outdoor terrace, 2 common kitchens, dining rooms)

Guest access

During your stay
Don't hesitate to ask us. If we can help you and guide you through your stay in Medellin, we will do it with pleasure. We love learning and learning new cultures.

locationDescriptions/0/content:
We're in the heart of the city. Laureles is a charming neighborhood. Nearby we have a large area of restaurants and bars, adjacent to the house a mini Market and fruit shop where you can find everything if your choice is to prepare your food.
The closest metro station is the stadium station. We are just 5 minutes from the center of the city.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
If you get through the subway. The nearest station is the stadium station. On which you will have to get off and take a laurel bus (190) that will leave you a block away. Or if you prefer you can walk from the stadium station, it's just over 10 blocks.
If you arrive from the airport, you'll need to get off at the San Diego Mall. And take a taxi that will drop you off at the jury house.

host/about:
Hi, my name is Juan Manuel and people used to call me “Juanma”. I love reading, playing the Ukelele and watching indie movies. Also, I enjoy running, walking the city and certainly meeting new people.

I have traveled around the world as many times as I could, and I have lived abroad, but my heart belongs to Medellín. I’m sure you will love it too.

¡Our guest’s happiness is our priority!
htmlDescription/htmlText:
Stop looking, here you have all you need:

-High-speed internet great for remote work
-A/C in bedroom
-Fully renovated design apartment
-Breathtaking views of Medellín and nature
-Unbeatable location in Poblado near to Provenza and Lleras Park
-Modern amenities
-Spacious living area
-Smart TV in living room and master bedroom
-Fully equipped kitchen
-Washer/dryer
-Pool
-Gym
-Coworking space
-Restaurant inside the building
-Private parking lot
-Smart lock for self check-in
-24/7 Security

The space
Located in one of the highest luxurious and safe neighborhood in Medellin, this place will have the most strategic location adjacent to the popular attractions and nightlife in Medellín. The airport is only a 20-minute drive (if you need a shuttle let us know and we will set it up for you for and additional fee and subject to availability).

- The building offers a double high lobby, free private parking lot, Heated pool, jacuzzi, solarium, steam room, fully equipped gym, pool table, terrace, Coworking space, spa, conference room, restaurant and tea & coffee lounge. Enjoy all the services as a luxury rental.

- Renting this place, we will offer you our special attention as your personal manager for all doubts, recommendations while your stay (tourist reservations, suggestion for restaurants, procedures in our city, best ways to get in a place and so on).

- We provide 2 firm and 2 soft pillows for each bed for your comfort.

- For stays of more than 7 days we offer a complementary cleaning service whenever you want (Additional charges apply and subject to availability).

- The apartment has perfect natural light, ideally for reading or working remotely.

- 24 hour security at our front desk.

- Secure digital door and personalized access code that belongs only to you. ¡No carrying keys around!

- There is a delicious café and restaurant just downstairs on the 4th floor for breakfast, brunch, lunch, dinner or just a meal.

- Feel free to ask If you need more information. Our guest’s happiness brings us joy.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment, as well as shared access to the building's communal areas.

Passport (for foreigners) or "Cédula id" (for Colombian citizens) in physical version and originals are required to check in.

Other things to note
Most popular routes and time by car and distance:

To Provenza 5 min / 2 km – 1 mi
To Parque Lleras 6 min / 2,1 km – 1,1 mi
To Poblado's metro station 7 min / 2,8 km – 1,8 mi
To City center 15 min / 6,3 km – 3,8 mi
To airport 20 min / 19,7 km – 12,2 mi

The TV provided has access to the main streaming platforms, however the guest should use their own account.

Please always be respectful of your neighbors and surroundings.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
This beautiful loft is located in an excellent and very safe area, two minutes from the tram metro, near the center of Medellín, it is a new building, it has all the amenities so you can enjoy the best of your stays in Medellín.

The space
This place has hot water, all kitchen utensils, refrigerator, coffee maker, blender, airfrayer, rice cooker, sandwich maker, oil, salt, sugar, coffee, seasonings (turmeric, pepper, garlic powder) baking soda, cinnamon powder , 1 double bed of 1.40, 1 sofa bed, smart TV, wifi, washer and dryer, air conditioning, safe, board games, Bluetooth speaker to listen to music, clothes iron, hair dryer and first aid kit .

Guest access
How to move

1. Identify your starting point: Make sure you know where you are starting your journey from. It can be helpful to use apps to get accurate, real-time instructions.

2. Use the public transportation system. To get to the Bicentenario station, you must get to a metro station and then combine with the tram.

3. Take the subway: If you're not near a subway station, head to the closest one. The Medellín metro has several lines. If you are on Line A (blue), be sure to head north.

4. Transfer to the tram: once at a San Antonio metro station, look for directions or ask the station staff how to transfer to the Tram Bicentennial. Exit the subway station and follow the signs in the area to get to the station and take the tram.

5. Arrival at the accommodation: when you arrive at the Bicentenario tram station (4th stop), leave the station and walk to the bottom, you must turn left where in approximately 30 seconds you will reach a single track, on the which you must go down to find your destination on the right in the BaseLoft building

6. Access to the accommodation: enter the building through the entrance and register your information with the guard, indicating that you will be staying in apartment 1201. Take the tower elevator to the fifth floor and locate the end of the hallway. Tap the digital lock board until the keypad activates, enter the passcode sent by the host followed by the # key and that's it.

Other things to note
The building is newly built, in a short time you will have the terrace with views of the city, enabled outdoor gym, BBQ area, jacuzzi.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Welcome to VIVVO SPACES - APARTAHOTEL CASTELLANA! All the Comfort in One Place We offer special rates for monthly stays and have a wide variety of apartments located in different areas of Medellín, Antioquia, to meet your needs.

The space
We have our main office in Laureles and a dedicated team that manages all aspects to ensure a comfortable and peaceful stay.

Guest access
Our guests enjoy full access to the reserved apartment, which includes a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, and a private bedroom.

Other things to note
Enjoy a pleasant stay in our loft, which features a comfortable double bed (1.40 m) and a bedside table for your convenience. The private bathroom offers hot water and is fully equipped with towels, toilet paper, and body soap.

The kitchen is equipped with natural gas and includes a microwave, refrigerator, pots, glasses, cups, and kitchen utensils, as well as a complete set of dishes. You will also find a coffee maker with coffee and sugar supplies to start your day with energy.

Relax while watching your favorite shows on the 32-inch TV, which includes a Netflix subscription and access to over-the-air channels. The closet is equipped with clothes hangers, and the dining table can be used for both enjoying meals and working comfortably.

Registration number
210428
locationDescriptions/0/content:
Ideal Location in a Peaceful Environment

Located in a quiet residential area, our accommodation is just minutes away from the vibrant Zona Rosa of Avenida 33. Only a 3-minute walk away, guests can access a "BANCOLOMBIA" ATM, as well as a variety of services and amenities, including supermarkets, courier services, barbershops, beauty salons, and pharmacies.

In addition, the proximity to nightclubs, restaurants, liquor stores, pet shops, and parks offers plenty of entertainment and recreational options. You'll also find parking, car wash services, the Santa Gema Parish, and casinos, ensuring that everything you need is within reach.
locationDescriptions/1/content: Excellent Connectivity and Access to Transportation We are located just one block from Avenida 33 and Avenida 80, in an area with great transportation options. In Medellín, guests can take advantage of ride-sharing apps (motorbike or car), as well as taxi services available in the area. While the accommodation does not offer private parking, there are options for street parking without any issues, as well as a nearby parking lot. Additionally, we are situated 26 kilometers from José María Córdoba International Airport in Rionegro and just 4 kilometers from Olaya Herrera Airport in Medellín. We are also conveniently located near two bus terminals: one in the south of the city, 5.4 kilometers away, and another in the north, 8.8 kilometers away.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
This apartment of 30 mts, has a strategic and central location, it is less than 3 minutes walk from the Atanasio Girardot stadium sports unit and the metro station, less than one block away you will find supermarkets, churches, restaurants, galleries, public transportation and areas suitable for work. It is a completely new accommodation designed with the comfort of the people who visit us in mind, it is an exclusive and comfortable space.

The space
Nice and comfortable apartment of 30 mts, located on the 5th floor that can be reached by elevator, it has 1 loft-style rooms, with a queen bed, smart TV, a kitchen with a large window, equipped with basic utensils, 1 shower bathroom with hot water, breakfast bar and a balcony with spectacular views, which provides plenty of lighting and ventilation. In addition, you can obtain internet service via Wi-Fi, fiber optics and Ethernet cable.

Guest access
Access to different bus routes from the main entrance of the place, it is a 3-minute walk from the metro station and in front of the building there are bicycles for rent.

Other things to note
It is a new, modern building with 24-hour surveillance service and 24/7 security cameras. It is a city place, on a quiet residential street, where you can sometimes hear cars, planes or trains at certain times.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Casa Hotel "La Bonita" a unique place for your rest and comfort.
Stay in a stylish place close to everything you want to visit.
✅️One of the best neighborhoods for its safety and peace of mind.
✅️Walking distance to Restaurant, Supermarkets, Banks, Parks, Atanasio Stadium, Avda 80, Avda.70 Comuna 13.
✅️WIFI 800 megas for your days of work and connection to all the delivery APPS at home 24 hours / 7 days.
✅️Disinfection and Cleaning.
✅️ Cozy environment, spacious. Good natural lighting.

The space
Discover the new lodging gem in the city! La Casa Hotel "La Bonita" we are located in the Barrio La Floresta, one of the best neighborhoods for quality of life and comfort.

We are strategically located just 5 minutes from the Santa Lucía and La Floresta metro stations, giving you easy access to explore all of Medellin. In addition, we are just 15 minutes from the Atanasio Giradot Stadium and the vibrant Comuna 13.

Just 10 minutes away is the lively Laureles neighborhood, known for its varied gastronomic offer and cozy bars. We are also only 15 minutes away from Avenida 70, a prominent area of the city to enjoy its nightlife.
Casa Hotel "La Bonita" has opened its doors in February 2024 to offer you an unparalleled experience. With 9 rooms spread over 3 floors, each with private and shared bathrooms, we guarantee your comfort at all times.

Our spacious social areas and common areas give you the perfect space to relax and socialize. In addition, we have additional kitchen and laundry services to make your stay even more enjoyable.

Enjoy the panoramic view of our terrace, from where you can contemplate the wonderful city that surrounds us.
Come and be part of this one-of-a-kind experience at Casa Hotel "La Bonita"! Your home away from home awaits.

We have a free parking lot for motorcycles.

Guest access
The guests have access to the terrace, with a beautiful view of the city.

Other things to note
Located 5 minutes from Nutibara Avenue, Lsureles neighborhood.

htmlDescription/htmlText:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located STUDIO. Fully furnished near Parque Lleras and 2 supermarkets.

The space
The studio counts with a small kitchen that contains laundry zone, a kitchen bar with two stools, a small balcony with a table a two chairs, a private bathroom, a closet and an integrated space where the bed and the living room are. The building has laundry services and a shared dining room area where you can buy snacks and beverages.

Guest access
Because of the excellent location you can get to the building by car, public transportation, taxi or uber. There is one private parking available for the guest and parking for the visitors. You have various services walking distance and a bus stop near the building.

Other things to note
The building has a gated entrance and 24 hour surveillance. The tap water in Medellín in drinkable.

host/about:
Hi!

We're Mario and Cata. We're from Medellín and your Colombian hosts. We're both software engineers, but more importantly, we're a couple passionate about living life to the fullest! We loved Airbnb when we first used it on a trip through South America, and now we love to host, just as we would want to be hosted ;) 

Through AirBnB, we've found a whole new way to experience the joys and learnings of travelling from our own city of Medellín- we love meeting and learning from new friends, cultures, languages and stories!
 
More than your hosts, we offer you our friendship. We love to help out with a smile. Hey, we are from Medellín after all, that's what we are known for :)

We love Medellín and we love our beautiful properties, which we take so much pride in keeping in tip top shape! We really enjoy sharing them with you, so you can have the best experience in this wonderful city.
htmlDescription/htmlText:
• Amazing location in heart of Poblado: "Oasis in the middle of the best part of the city, walking distance to everything”
• High speed 200 Mb WiFi
• Loads of nature around
• A/C
• Pool, Jacuzzis & outdoor furniture in common areas
• 5 mins walk to best restaurants, cafes, malls. 22 mins walk to Poblado and Lleras Park
• Fully stocked kitchen
• 43" Smart TV
• Transparent prices: No guest fee, no service or cleaning fee
• On site 24/7 staff
• Luggage storage
• Washer & dryer (paid, self-service)

The space
This is a big property with multiple Lofts (small, independent apartments). You have access to our great common areas with lots of nature, jacuzzis, pool, places to lay down, sit, work, etc.

We have 24/7 staff to help you in anything you might need

Add my listing to your wishlist by clicking the ❤ in the upper-right corner.

host/about:
Hi friends ! 

Our family is made up of Diego from Colombia, and Alicia from France and our daughters Gabriella and Giulia who are a mix of the two countries and the different cities around the world in which we have lived.

We have met a lot of places and wonderful people from around the world, which inspire us to give our best and to make the stay of our hosts full of happy moments that they can remember with love.

Each space of the apartments was imagined and built , so that the people who visit us feel the energy of Casa and the support of a local family.


We like to be connected with people and exchange experiences which is one of the reasons for we becoming and Airbnb host!

description: Beautiful and spacious duplex with 1 bedroom and located in one of the most centric areas of the city, just next to Los Molinos shopping mall. htmlDescription/htmlText:
The Hummingbird is a ROMANTIC and VINTAGE cabin, perfect for resting, sharing and enjoying life♡.

It is the opportunity to experience COUNTRY life with the greatest COMFORT.

The space
50 minutes from the center of Medellin, our 28-meter cabin with a UNIQUE atmosphere includes a double bed, private bathroom, jacuzzi, katamaran mesh, kitchenette and table, coffee area. Outside you find a space for campfires and/or barbecues, as well as a garden and green area to ENJOY♡.

☀ The stay is specifically for 2 people.

☀ We are PET-FRIENDLY (please include pets in your reservation).

☀ The reservation includes use of ALL areas PRIVATELY, kitchenette equipped with the basics for cooking, wood for the campfire, firewood, and charcoal for the barbecue.

OUR SCHEDULES (Season September-November 2024)

❀ Reservations in week (Revenue MONDAY TO THURSDAY)
Check IN: 12PM* - CHECK-OUT: 6:00PM*

❀ Reservations in week (FRIDAY Revenue, SATURDAY Departure)
Check IN: 12 PMm* - CHECK-OUT: 12 PMm*

Weekend ❀ reservations (Saturdays and Sundays with festive Mondays)
Check IN: 3:00PM - CHECK-OUT: 6:00PM.

*In the case of Sundays with a Monday holiday, it is necessary to book until Monday to check out at 6:00pm; in case it is only booked from Saturday to Sunday, check-out is at 12:00pm.

Guest access
The cabin is located in the San Miguel part Alta, Barro Blanco, Santa Elena, Medellín. We have a private parking lot for motorcycle and car.

You will receive the location in Google maps, a map and we will also give you directions to get from different places (from the Aeropuerto-Oriente Antioqueño, on the Via las Palmas, by the Via de Santa Elena). In general the roads are in good condition, but there are fragments in which the roadway is in regular condition. In the access to the cabin, 650 meters must be covered by unpaved track, that is to say UNPAVED. In this section it is necessary to pass slowly and with caution, however, the state of the road is suitable for any type of vehicle including motorcycles.

The parking lot is approximately 100 meters from the cabin. The terrain is sloped, accessed by a trail with concrete steps.

Other things to note
El Colibrí is an ecoCabana: the lighting, refrigerator and appliances work with SOLAR POWER, and heating of the water from the Jacuzzi and the shower by SOLAR THERMAL SYSTEM.

In addition, the cabin has AN ALTERNATIVE SYSTEM with EPM power as well as GAS heating system for Jacuzzi water and shower.

Registration number
153140
locationDescriptions/0/content:
Santa Elena is the preferred tourist site of those who want to connect with nature, have fun and rest.

500 meters from the cabin there is a walking path near the forest.

700 meters away there is a silletera estate where tours and experiences take place (subject to availability)

1.5 km (22 minute walk) away, you'll find a convenience store and a homemade restaurant, as well as the Church on the sidewalk.

At 3.7 km (10 minutes by car) you will find a gastronomic corridor with a varied offer of restaurants (7-10 places with delicious food).

7.4 km (19 minutes by car) you arrive at Santa Elena Park., where you can find hairdresser, restaurants, cafes, soccer field, bars, etc.

11 km away (20-25 minutes by car) away you can enjoy Arví Park, including Piedras Blanco Park and Comfama Arví Park, as well as Metrocable.
locationDescriptions/1/content:
Entrance by Vía Santa Elena, Vía Las Palmas, and Oriente Antioque.
PRIVATE park.
This cabin is part of the QUIMULÁ Countryside Connection; a fully fenced-in FAMILY property with outdoor security cameras.
650 meters from the cabin, BUSES from SANTA ELENA - MEDELLÍN and GUARNE arrive. Particular transportation services TO and FROM Medellín must be scheduled in advance, we have a trusted driver.
